description: Voici l'application officielle du site http://www.ragecomic.fr dans laquelle vous pourrez visionnez les derniers Rage Comics (Troll faces) postés sur le site, avec son titre et sa date. Vous pourrez naviguer entre les différentes images postées et le partager sur facebook ou par mail etc. Plus de 7000 Rage Comics disponibles ! Une fonction aléatoire vous permet d'afficher un Rage comic au hasard et un bouton permet de visionner ce rage comic sur le site, mettre un like ou poster un commentaire. Vous pouvez visionner les rage comics publiés ou en modération en choisissant dans le menu respectivement "derniers" ou "modération". Utilisez les boutons précédent et suivant pour naviguer dans les comics / troll faces du site ! Les ragecomics (certains les appellent des troll faces) sont des petites histoires comiques sous forme de bande dessinées représentant des évènements de la vie quotidienne. Rage Comic Francais Troll Face représente la plus grande base de données de rage comics français ! Il y a une fonction de marque page permettant de garder en mémoire la position actuelle pour y revenir plus tard (utile si vous voulez regarder tous les ragecomics, pour éviter de devoir faire "suivant" pendant 3 heures quand vous relancez l'appli plus tard). NOTE : Pour mieux voir le rage comic, vous pouvez "pincer" pour zoomer. Pour info : Les permissions "voir l'état et l'identité du téléphone", "Lire le contenu de la mémoire de stockage USB" et "Modifier ou supprimer le contenu de la mémoire de stockage USB" ne sont actuellement plus utilisées dans l'application. Aucune info personnelle (numéro de téléphone, fichiers sur la SD/USB) ne sera utilisée. Here is the official application site http://www.ragecomic.fr where you can watch the latest Rage Comics (Troll faces) posted on the site, with title and date. You can navigate through the pictures posted and share it on facebook or email etc. Over 7000 Rage Comics in stock! A random function lets you view a Rage comic at random and a button to view this comic rage on the site, put a like or post a comment. You can view the published comics Rage or moderation by choosing the respective "last" menu or "moderation". Use the previous and next buttons to navigate through comics / troll faces the site! The ragecomics (some call them troll faces) are small comic stories as comics depicting events of everyday life. Rage Comic French Troll Face is the largest base of rage Data French comics! There is a bookmark function to keep the current position in memory to come back later (useful if you want to watch all ragecomics, to avoid having to "next" for 3 hours when you restart the app later ). NOTE: To see more of the comic rage, you can "pinch" to zoom . FYI: The permissions "see the status and identity of the phone", "read the contents of the USB storage" and "Change or delete the contents of the USB storage" now no longer used in the application. No personal info (phone number, files on the SD / USB) will be used.

description: -Battle robots and save humanity from all out robot war We all know, deep down, that humanity will soon be taken over by robots. The robot uprising is something that you need to be ready for and that's why you should download this app. Play a choose your own adventure style text based story that takes you through the robot apocalypse. You work at a robot testing laboratory and you are at the heart of the action when the robots become sentient and decide they want to take over humanity. You and your pet robot, Bob, have to fight back against the robots and The Mainframe which seems to be controlling them. THE STORY Chapter One - Things start going wrong and the robots attack, you've got to fight for survival. Chapter Two - You make it to the city and you're still having to battle robots Chapter Three - You start fighting back against the army and kind some survivors to join you Chapter Four - You become the leader of a human army and fight back against the robot armies Chapter Five - Includes a really odd bit where you have to dance off for humanity to survive Chapter Six - Your final showdown with The Mainframe - includes eight possible endings PREMIUM EDITION / FREE EDITION This is the PREMIUM version Robot Uprising You Decide. It's awesome and it has all six chapters of the story. If you'd like to give the story a game then you can play the first three chapters for free in Robot Uprising You Decide FREE. DOWNLOAD THIS APP IF YOU LIKE... iRobot, Blade Runner, AI, Robopocalypse, any of the Terminator films, Shot Circuit and all those sorts of things. Basically, if it has a robot in it, that's the kind of thing this app is like. YOU DECIDE GAMES These are choose your own adventure games which don't take themselves too seriously. While the low tech style is hardly going to blow your mind, the the funny story lines will keep you entertained. They're written by James Winterbottom, author of the novel Someone Else's Dream. WARNING This game is rated as mature - it contains violent descriptions of robots getting messed up and the writer's attempts at humor (or humour if you're English) are sometimes a bit rude. GET IN TOUCH http://www.facebook.com/youdecidegames http://www.twitter.com/youdecidegames http://plus.google.com/+Youdecidegames http://www.youdecidegames.com

description: Do you know who the sex offenders are in your neighborhood and where they live? With Safe Neighborhood, you have access the National Sex Offender Registry right in the palm of your hand. Keep your family safe and informed, using GPS technology to locate all the sex offenders in your area. New features including list, and more results (up to 100). Search by your address or current location(US Only) to see if any sex offenders are registered in the area. View on a map and see their personal info + photos. Safe Neighborhood is dependent on existing sex offender registries and cannot guarantee accuracy of data. If something is incorrect please contact us and we will attempt to correct a record. Coming Soon: ability to share offenders other parties, and search by name. The Read Phone State permission is used for the ad network, and no personal information is sent. This does not allow the app to read call logs or contacts or anything like that. Ads are used for a little compensation for the time it took to write the app. A professional ad-free version is also available.

description: Spystagram Anti-Theft Alarm is an Android stealth application that takes a silent snapshot from the front facing camera of anyone peeking, snooping, stealing or using your cell phone without permission. After your cell phone's password is entered incorrectly, Spystagram Anti-Theft Alarm notifies you via email or text message with the perpetrator's location, picture and time stamp. Have you ever had your girlfriend/boyfriend, friend or family member browse through your cell phone without permission? Has your cell phone or tablet ever been stolen? If so, you can now catch the thief with Spystagram - The Silent Snapshot App! **Spystagram Anti-Theft Alarm ONLY works on cell phones. We plan to release another Spystagram App for tablets soon!** --------WHAT IS SPYSTAGRAM?-------- Spystagram Anti-Theft Alarm is a 100% stealth application that takes a silent snapshot of anyone peeking, snooping, stealing or using your cell phone without permission. Spystagram features: - Easy app to set up and use - Secretly take snapshots - Full size image capture - Receive Spystagram email alerts - Receive Spystagram text message alerts - Monitor incorrect password attempts - Activate device’s alarm even if muted via SMS command - Request device location via SMS command - Request phone call back via SMS command - Hidden icon or NO icon on phone - 100% Stealth application ** Dial ‘0’ from your phone’s dial pad to open Spystagram upon download ** --------WHY SPYSTAGRAM?-------- With Spystagram Anti-Theft Alarm, you can easily take part of your own investigation. Spystagram is the ONLY stealth silent snapshot application on the Android market! We developed this app to help you quickly catch any person accessing your cell phone without permission. If your significant other is snooping around your cell phone, you can catch them with proof! If your cell phone is stolen, you can forward Spystagram alerts to your local authorities and catch the criminal before it is too late. Spystagram is a 100% stealth application. The only way to gain access to Spystagram is to dial a pin number (0) on your device’s dial pad to open it. You can change the pin number at any time. Spystagram is a standalone application and WILL NOT send data to remote servers like other apps do. We have tested this app on many Android platforms. If you run into any problems, please contact us directly www.spystagram.com . Please note that due to the nature of Android, certain manufactures have made it difficult to manipulate the front facing camera. If you happen to receive Spystagram alerts with no picture or map attachments, this simply means that your manufacturer limits front facing camera and notification manipulations. If this is the case for you, you will still receive an email/text Spystagram alerts with the location and time stamp of where your cell phone's password was last entered incorrectly. GIVEN THAT THIS APP MAY NOT WORK ON ALL DEVICES, PLEASE DOWNLOAD IT FIRST TO MAKE SURE IT WORKS FOR YOU. EMAIL US IF IT DOES NOT WORK ON YOUR PHONE. PLEASE DO NOT LEAVE ANY ISSUES YOU HAVE IN THE COMMENTS SECTION AS WE WILL NOT BE ABLE TO CONTACT YOU TO FIX THEM. CONTACT US DIRECTLY AT WWW.SPYSTAGRAM.COM AND WE WILL WORK TOGETHER TO GET YOUR ISSUES RESOLVED. DO THIS FIRST BEFORE LEAVING A NEGATIVE COMMENT FOR US. WE WILL RESPOND WITHIN 48 HOURS (OUR STANDARD SLA TIME). --------AFFILIATION?-------- Spystagram is not affiliated with GotYa (FYI - Spystagram is less expensive with our current promotion), Hidden Eye, HiddenEye Plus, Sheriff Lite: AntiTamper Alarm or Cerberus anti theft. --------CONTACT US / FAQs?-------- If you have any problems/errors please contact us at support@spystagram.com . Feel free to visit www.spystagram.com to to leave suggestions and new features.

description: System Info Droid provides smart system & hardware information about your Android device (smartphone, tablet, android laptop, etc..) and a useful CPU Widget. This app gives you the possibility to see in real time interesting parameters ( processor frequency, device temperature, etc... ) and to export your system report by e-mail or share it with your favourite messaging app. A smart widget is included in this app. The widget provides info about your CPU: Temperature, Frequency and CPU Usage ( % ). It's optimized to spend very low battery and it can also be turned ON/OFF with a single click on the widget. Note that if you move the app to the SD Card, the widget will not be available. ABOUT REQUIRED PERMISSIONS ( recently some users are giving bad reviews because of the required permissions ): All the required permissions of this app are necessary to show the user all the info about his device, including picture permission. This app doesn't take photos or videos, only requires those permissions to detect and show the information about the camera. MAIN FEATURES: - Share your Report to your friends with your favourite Messaging App! - CPU Widget with Temperature, Frequency and CPU Usage ( % ). - Processor info ( Cores, Max Frequency, Real Time Frequency, etc... ). - Device info ( Android version, Kernel, Compilation, etc... ). - Graphics Processing Unit info ( GPU, OpenGL, Vertex and Texture Units, etc... ). - Audio Chipset Info ( Audio Chip, Audio Codecs, Radio Chip, Audio Modes, etc... ). - RAM Memory info ( Total RAM, Avaiable RAM etc... ). - Storage Space info ( Internal, External, SD Card, etc... ). - Display info ( Screen Resolution, Screen Size, Density, Refresh Rate, etc...). - Camera info ( Megapixels, Flash Modes, Focal Length, Focus Modes, Effects, etc... ). - Temperature info ( System temperature and Battery Temperature ). - Battery info ( Battery level, status, type, etc... ) - Sensors info ( Accelerometer, Orientation, Magnetic Field, GPS, Light, Gravity, etc... ). - Export your System Report by E-mail. - Share your System Summary with your favourite messaging app. If you enjoyed this app, please, rate it in Google Play. It will only take a second and it will be very helpfull for the developer. Note that if you have found errors in the app, you should send us an email with the problem instead of putting a negative review. The app will be updated as soon as possible.
release_text: - Improved Performance. - Minor bugs solved.

description: TafMetar is a brand new software that gives you instantaneous acces to aeronautical weather messages (TAF and METAR) from all over the world! The time anlyser "TimeTAF" allow you to instantaneous analyze the weather predicted at a given time very instinctively and intuitively! A powerful tool to analyze longest and most complex TAF in a second! THE tool to prepare your flights!!! Fly Safe! ------------------------------------------- "TimeTAF" is only available on Android 3.0 and more. METAR and TAF messages from all over the world. Consulted airports automatically saved to have messages as soon as the app is launched! ------------------------------------------- Verify all aeronautical information given in TafMetar (in particular the date and time of the message). The developer cannot be responsible for any damage due to erroneous data on TafMetar.

description: Put thousands of FREE webcomics, manga, webtoons, and visual stories in your pocket and connect with their creators using our beautifully redesigned app. Join Tapastic’s growing community of 1,000,000+ comic readers and 5,000+ creators today! Got a minute to kill at the bus stop, the bathroom (don’t worry, we won’t tell), or on your lunch break? Sounds like you need a mobile comic snack! Enjoy a quick laugh or get lost in a captivating story created by one of the thousands of artists on Tapastic. * Read the Daily Snack to enjoy comics handpicked by our editors each day. * Join the community and interact with creators when you like, comment, or share comics. * Discover new, popular, and trending series, or explore our ever-growing collections. There’s something for everyone! * Use the + button to subscribe to comics, then be the first to read updates as soon as they’re released. * Support your favorite creators to earn rewards. Download Tapastic and get started today—it’s FREE! PRESS THE WALL STREET JOURNAL “Tapastic is the “YouTube of Comics” TECHCRUNCH “Tapastic is unique in its approach and its treatment of the medium.” COMIC BOOK RESOURCES “...Tapastic is worthy of notice. It aims to be the central location, sort of a YouTube of webcomics” THE NEXT WEB “[Tapastic is] a destination where readers can find serialized webcomics” GET IN TOUCH Mail us: hello@tapastic.com Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/tapastic Tweet us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/tapastic Snap us on Instagram: http://instagram.com/tapastic MORE INFO If you like The Oatmeal, SMBC, xkcd, or Cyanide and Happiness, you’re going to love the comics on Tapastic! Series such as The Awkward Yeti, The GaMERCaT, HJ Story, Sarah’s Scribbles, Fisheye Placebo, Fail by Error, Randomphilia, PHD Comics, Cheer Up Emo Kid, Lunarbaboon, Owl Turd Comix, Up and Out, Channelate, Safely Endangered, and thousands more are all here to read! If you’re into manga and webtoons, there’s an extensive collection of series for you to explore. Some of these include JuJu’s Diary, Treehouse, Jack The American Ghost, Stray Dog, Like a Wolf, Season of Su, and Subway Line 1. From quick gag comics to beautiful long form dramas, there’s something for everyone! Creators work hard to make awesome comics for you to enjoy, and Tapastic lets you directly support their passion. For less than a cup of coffee each month, you can help a creator make the comics you love! In exchange for continued support, you’ll earn rewards like access to bonus content or other thank-you gifts from the creator. Are you a comic creator interested in uploading comics on Tapastic? Check out the benefits of publishing with us at http://tapastic.com/creators , then start uploading for free on our website! Tapastic is made with love in San Francisco and Seoul by an awesome team of comic fans: http://tapastic.com/team All of our comics are uploaded by their original creators. Content Policies: http://tapastic.com/policies/content Terms of Service: http://tapastic.com/tos Please note that Tapastic is only available in English at this time.

description: This application is dedicated to The Wounded Marine Fund whose mission states: Our mission is to help combat wounded Marines returning from the "War on Terror." description: Tinder is a fun way to connect with new and interesting people around you. Swipe right to Like or left to Pass on the people Tinder recommends. If someone likes you back, it’s a match! Chat with your matches and get to know them inside of Tinder. Tinder is FREE. Download now and see why over 6 billion matches and counting have been made on Tinder. Tinder in the press: “The world’s hottest app” - Forbes “Tinder solved online dating for women” - New York Magazine “Tinder has become something of a cultural phenomenon” - TIME Magazine “Tinder is perfect for women” - ELLE How Tinder works: 1. Tinder shows you interesting people you should meet. 2. Swipe right to like and left to pass on each recommendation (your swipe is anonymous). 3. If you like someone, and they like you back, you're both notified that it's a match! You can chat with your matches inside of Tinder. ---------------------------------------------------- Tinder is - and always will be - free. If you choose to unlock some new features with Tinder Plus, such as Passport (swipe anywhere in the world) and Rewind (bring back your last swipe), you can purchase optional Tinder Plus packages as an in-app purchase. If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus, payment will be charged to your Google account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to the Play Store app after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

description: Top Race Manager is the best online racing manager game! - Create your own team; - Compete in a league with 19 other teams and follow the races live! - Setup your car, participate in auctions and hire the best drivers and staff; - Buy new and improved components for your car and make it unbeatable! - Improve the facilities of your autodrome; - Earn money and tickets by signing contracts with sponsors, selling television rights and winning races; - Upgrade and compare with your friends! - Experience the excitement of TRM and become part of our community! Top Race Manager is the result of years of hard work and development. Its aim is to share its passion with millions of other people for racing, competition and the entire world that revolves around the engines. The players will compete with new people every month, over 15 challenging circuits with different characteristics, and at the end of the season the rankings will decide who will go to the next level and who will be demoted. Players will have to manage all aspects of a team, from buying vehicle parts to participating in auctions for the best drivers and team members. The auction are made more difficult by happening around the clock and require smart use of your tickets. Players will have to setup the car before qualifying and the races, and at the end of the championship, only the best will be able to win the title of world champion! Create affiliations with other players to win the constructors' championship and earn millions! Who will get to level 60 to become the world champion of Top Race Manager??? Advice: If you like F1 or you are passionate about sports management games .. attention causes addiction! Visit our FB page: https://www.facebook.com/topracemanager Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/topracemanager Do you want to share new ideas or report an bug? Visit our forum: http://topracemanager.com/forum Contact us: support@topracemanager.com

description: This App is special use case of TrackView. It turns your smartphones, tablets and PCs into a connected mobile video surveillance & monitoring system with location tracking and remote recording capabilities. The Windows PC version is available for free download at: www.trackview.us. It can replace hardware IP Camera for video surveillance and baby monitoring. It is also a home security system that sends instant alerts to mobile phones. It also turns your phones and tablets into a GPS tracking device that lets you remotely tracking in real time. TrackView is the ONLY app that can simultaneously do event detection, GPS location tracking, video surveillance, remote video recording and much more! Imagine what TrackView can do for you: find my phone, track your car, track your family members for safety, anti-theft, fire and smoke alarm, video surveillance, baby monitor, nanny and pets monitor... This app can replace your expensive home security systems and IP camera, for FREE! No equipment to buy, no messy wires, you can install TrackView on your device in less than one minute! Main Features: ***************** 1. GPS Location tracking in real-time 2. IPcam for Video and audio monitoring 3. Event detection and instant alert to your mobile devices 4. Remote audio and video recording 5. Two-way audio 6. Remote buzz that rings a missing device, even if it’s in silent mode 7. App works in background and sleep mode that conserves your battery 8. High reliability and excellent video quality at low bandwidth that saves you money 9. Super easy to install and one click connection from anywhere in the world 10. Remote control of Front and Rear camera switch 11. Integration with Google Gmail account 12. Secured access: You are the only one who can access your connected devices. 13. Always on: devices are accessible even in sleep mode. 14. Multi-network support: TrackView supports all types of networks: Wifi, 2G, 3G, 4G etc. 15. Automatic network switch: When the network switches, TrackView will auto switch to the network available. 16. Real-time and low latency: to ensure you get updates on events immediately and watch video in real time. 17. Universal accessibility: Access any of your devices from anywhere in the world. and much more! Three easy steps to get started in less than ONE minute: **************************************************************** 1. Installation  TrackView is easy to install. Just a couple of clicks, and you are there. 2. Login You can use your existing gmail account user name and password to login to TrackView. Please use the SAME account to login to all devices. Before login, please also give a device name to your device so that you can distinguish them. 3. Enjoy your protection  Once you have multiple devices logged-in, you can monitor, track, or buzz a remote device by one click. You can also check the alert messages, record and playback your clips. Support ********* E-mail: support@trackview.net . If you have any issues or suggestions. We'd love to hearing from you.

description: TV Guide’s new official app for Android is your one-stop, 24/7 TV companion and our best listings guide ever. It makes TV simple again – anywhere, anytime. Your feedback was instrumental in the creation of many cool new features and we’re excited for you to see them. Please keep your feedback coming – what you love, what you don’t and what you want to see next. Highlights: • Watchlist - your super-personalized TV Guide: Organize your favorite shows, sports teams, movies, and actors and find where you can watch them – on TV, on demand, streaming and DVD. • Video: Link to watch TV and movies instantly on Crackle, The CW, HBO GO, Hulu Plus, and MAX GO. Watch now, anywhere, anytime. • New Tonight: What's new in prime time with three handy filters: 1. All new shows 2. Trending – a social hot list based on what TV Guide users are watching 3. Watchlist – only your favorite shows • Listings: Detailed info about every airing with the ability to: 1. Set up alerts and never miss a live airing 2. Easily personalize your Watchlist 3. Filter by HD-only and favorite channels 4. Check-in and share what you're watching with your friends on Facebook, Twitter and more • Exclusive content: The best in breaking news, features, videos and photos, curated by TV Guide's editors • News Watchlist filter: Get news customized just for you • One account: TVGuide.com users can enjoy the convenience of one linked account for TVGuide.com and TV Guide for iPhone, iPad and iPod touch and Android. Set up individual accounts for every member of your family. CBS Interactive does not allow registration by users under the age of 13 and will not knowingly collect personally identifiable information from users under the age of 13.

description: UberSocial: With so many easy-to-use features, it’ll make you feel like an octopus with 8 swiss army knives. “A must have for any Twitter user” – BuildMobile “An incredibly savvy Twitter management app that’s packed with features” – Mobilewalla "Check out Ubersocial – we’re convinced once you start using it you won’t go back to the Twitter client you were using before" - Nightmaircreative.com "King of the mobile Twitter Apps" - Berryfix Key Features: − Inner Circle: Don’t miss Tweets from your BFFs -- Create a "favorite users" list and save yourself hassle searching for their Tweets in your timeline. − Mute -- Tired of hearing about a certain topic? Mute hashtags or users for a period of time. Like, forever. − Menu Customization -- For quick & easy access, add your most-used features to the UberMenu. − Facebook and Gchat status Cross Posting -- Connect your app to post Tweets to Facebook or edit your status on Gchat. One simple step. − Multiple Accounts -- Have a split personality? So do we. Seamlessly manage multiple social accounts all in one place. − Conversation View -- Stay atop the conversation better by seeing the previous Tweets and replies for a given chat; really know who's said what so far. − LivePreviewTM -- View rich media in real-time. Check out links, videos and images in your main timeline without having to leave the app. − Pull & Shake-to-Refresh -- We recognize the international gesture for “I want the latest and best NOW!” In other words, all you have to do to refresh your feed is pull on it or shake it. − Themes -- UberSocial comes with color themes to enhance your Tweeting experience. − Extra Services -- Choose from the best services to upload photos, videos, shorten links, or send Tweets over 140 characters with TMI.me. − The fun don’t stop -- We offer even more great features, like customized notifications, location services, advanced search, edit profile, and of course the full Twitter functionality set (Tweet, ReTweet, Direct Message, @Mention, lists) and more! UberSocial supports inline viewing of photos and videos from the following services: twitpic, mypict.me, yfrog, pic.gd, tweetphoto.com, lockerz, flickr, mobypicture, twitvid, twitgoo, twitsnap, imgur, instagram UberSocial was previously known as Twidroyd. For more info about UberSocial, check out http://www.ubersocial.com

description: Uber is your private driver in more than 40 countries. An entirely new and modern way to travel is at your fingertips. - Request a ride using the app and get picked up within minutes. Get connected to your personal driver and check the progress of your car at any time. - Sit back, relax, and go anywhere you want. We'll email you a receipt when you arrive at your destination. description: When people of similar frequencies come together – output is not a simple sum of individual work, but exponential. In science we term this phenomenon as resonance. Output at this stage is beyond any logical limit. Three young kids, with different family backgrounds and outlook meet during their graduation days at IIT-Bombay campus and become close friends. Although, individually they are in sync, but the same is not true for their interaction with the world. How will their relation withstand the conflict of family and society pressure? How do their characters shape out, as they traverse from an educational environment through the corporate world to the realm of the social-political world? Inspired by the real events across the globe from the last decade, Ravindra Shukla brings you the characters based story – struggle and triumphs of a young generation and their relevance in the current socio-eco-political era.

description: At WestJet, we really like our guests – so much that we want to go everywhere with you. Our app lets you book trips, view upcoming trips, view flight status, check in, reference travel info and connect with us on the go. Book trip You asked for it. Search and book your next flight, vacation car or hotel while you are on the go from the app. The app provides you quick access to book your next trip. View WestJet Rewards Sign in to see your WestJet dollars balance, monitor your tier status, review your earn rates, and view your current qualifying flight spend toward your next reward. Also, if you have booked any trips using your WestJet ID we’ll automatically add them to the app. View trips You can now add trips that you’ve booked to the app. Sign in with your WestJet ID and trips will automatically be added. Keep a list of all the great places you’ve been under past trips and view the real-time countdown for your next getaway. Add trips to your calendar and email your flight details to your contacts. Flight status Whether you’re heading to the arrivals lane or departures drop off, our flight status tool can help you plan your trip ahead. Save your flights to your home view for real-time updates and we’ll let you know if flights are running early, delayed or cancelled. Unfortunately, it can’t help you predict traffic to the airport. Check in Be the first to check in for your flight, without waiting in line. Our app lets you check in up to 24 hours before departure – and you don’t have to go to the airport. You can also send your boarding pass to your email so it’s available from your mobile device. Just show it at the airport and you’ll soon be on your way. Travel info Whether you’re a first-time flyer or a daily jet-setter, we provide quick access to information about checking in, service fees, baggage allowance and much more. Get helpful information to make your next trip as smooth as possible. Did you know? There’s always something going on at WestJet, and we want to keep you in the loop. Receive travel tips, WestJet fun-facts and the latest deals straight to your hand. Share feedback Have you been on a recent flight or vacation? Have a question, suggestion or something to share about our app? Good or bad, we want to hear from you. Our app lets you send us feedback in a matter of seconds. Device support Our Android app is currently optimized for Samsung Galaxy S3, S4, S5 and Google Nexus 5.
release_text: What’s new 2.0 This release includes changes to support Android Lollipop. Also includes a refreshing update to Material Design. Here is what’s new: · Rolling out Material Design updates to key features in the app · The use of location services to identify nearby airports; making flight status searches even easier · In preparation for our upcoming inflight entertainment and connectivity system, WestJet Connect, you’ll see new features to access the system. Stay tuned for more information!

description: WomanLog is a menstrual and fertility calendar for women. User interface languages: English, Deutsch, Français, Italiano, Español, Português, Dansk, Eesti, Latviešu, Lietuvių, Magyar, Nederlands, Norsk, Polski, Svenska, Suomi, Čeština, Русский, 日本語, 简体中文, 繁體中文, 한국어 , العربية, Українська, Türkçe, Ελληνικά, עִבְרִית, ภาษาไทย, हिन्दीة Key features: Menstrual cycle and the period Ovulation and fertility forecast 3-month summary on one screen BMT chart Password protection Backup Weight Tracking Symptoms Pill Mood (5) Pregnancy mode Notifications (Menstruation, Weight, BMT) Skins Tracking multiple calendars Note Statistics Widget (1) WomanLog Pro: Circular calendar Luteal phase Ovulation date Mood (29) Cervical mucus monitoring Notifications (Menstruation, Weight, BMT, Contraceptive pill, Multivitamin pill , Breast self-exam, Ovulation, NuvaRing) Cycle Overview (Send PDF file to an e-mail) Note + Event time + Reminder Moon phases Ovulation test Pregnancy test Blood pressure/Pulse Widget (2) No ads All the main functions are accessible via the calendar. Tapping a finger on the calendar date, you can add and edit the settings for each day. Turn the phone horizontally and you will switch to the 3-month summary on one screen. Application developers are not responsible for any direct or indirect losses which have arisen or may arise related to using this application. Menstruation, ovulation and fertility day forecast have to be understood as theoretical predictions which may not coincide with the actual menstruation, ovulation and fertility days. General technical data such as phone model, etc., are transferred to www.womanlog.com solely for testing purposes and for statistics. contacts: womanlog@womanlog.com www.womanlog.com © 2014 Keywords: menstrual, woman, fertility, ovulation, menstruation, pregnancy, period, cycle, period tracker

description: ENTIRELY NEW AND HIGHLY ADDICTIVE VERSION JUST RELEASED. Please rate and comment if you like our word game!! Welcome to Word Worm!! If you like puzzle or word games, you'll love word worm! The goal is simple: form words by touching adjacent (connecting) letters. That is, you can move up/down and left/right as long as you are forming a word. When you have formed a word, press submit to score your word and watch the letters disappear. This game was designed natively for android as oppose to our previous version. It features full screen professionally designed graphics and “iPhone smooth” animations. This version includes an expanded dictionary and plural word support! Inspired by popcap’s classic game bookworm! *HD Graphics for supporting devices only (tablets, higher end phones). Otherwise normal graphics displayed. HD will automatically be displayed if supported. Images for xoom are 1280 x 800 (full HD resolution) Supports Android 3.1 (Honeycomb) and other tablets, including: Motorola Xoom Samsung Galaxy Tab And many more! Coming soon: Online High Scores and Rankings Please email us for suggestions! This is our first game so rate us 5 stars if you enjoyed it! -Spencer and Eric Keywords: word worm, wordworm, word, worm, bookworm, book worm, book, worm, word, game, puzzle, scrabble, text, anagrams, word search, word game, play, bonus, time trial, free play

description: Cast Video(Including Live Video), Audio(Including Live Audio) and Photo from Web, Local Device and Digital Media Servers(DLNA/UPNP) to ChromeCast, DLNA Media Renderer(Like XBMC, Smart TV/Bluray players etc) and Air Play. Cast live tv / live streaming / live radio from websites/Plex plugins to Chromecast, XBMC, Apple TV, and Other DLNA devices, if supported by DLNA device. Some of the websites we tested are ustvnow, nimbletv, tunein, shoutcast, twitch.tv, ilive.to(via channels) and many more. If you have a problem, please contact us at info@ytmoviesapp.com , we will solve/help or refund you (if, with in 24 hours of purchase), Please do not leave a 1 star review. Note: Flash streams are not supported. Simple interface to browse the web for media, with history and favorites option to easily bookmark your favorite websites. Just press play button, select your device to cast and enjoy your content. Please note, the browser is highly custom made for casting purposes, it may forceclose on some heavy javascript oriented sites, we are working on to fix this issue. Just reopen the browser, you will be on the page where you left. ★ Supports live video streaming(.m3u8) contents from websites, like twitch.tv, ustream.tv, youtube live etc. ★ Supports live audio streaming(.mp3) contents from websites, like tunein.com, shoutcast.com etc. ★ Supports casting picture(including .gif) from any website, just long press on the picture, select a device to cast. ★ Supports any audio/video content embeded in webpages, just press play button on the page, select a device to cast. ★ Supports playing embeded audio/video content to external players like MX Player (useful in watching unsupported formats in local device) ★ Easily bookmark your favotite websites, switch between different ★ Receive(including video links) links from other applications, like browser, chrome2phone or other apps or share the web page to other apps. ★ switch easily between common mobile user agents, very useful in finding suitable videos. (Tip: If you come across rtsp video for live streams, switch to other user agents to get .m3u8) ★ Search and send subtitles(only for Chromecast) from community moderated Opensubtitles. Easily cast your local audio/video/photo content to other devices in your network and browse content from other digital media server (such as plex, windows media player, XBMC, bubbleupnp, etc) contents. Channels, some of the popular video rss feeds from reddit, twitch.tv, justin.tv and other web based video feeds (more channels to come in future and also, we will add an option to create/add user's own channel(s) in future). Please note, Channels are aggregated RSS contents from external websites, availability may depends on the source web sites, some items may be offline during certain times and some contents may have geo restrictions. Note: some of the plex channels(like PBS, Justin.tv) are supported only via web interface(plex.tv/web). Following are the formats we tested and found to be working in respective devices: Chromecast: Live Video(.m3u8), Live Audio(only mp3 encoded), Video (mp4, webm), Audio(mp3), Image(.jpeg, .gif, .png) Apple TV: Live Video(.m3u8), Live Audio(AAC and mp3 encoded), Video (mp4), Audio(mp3 and AAC), Image(.jpeg) DLNA Media Renderers (XBMC): Live Video(.m3u8), Live Audio(AAC and mp3 encoded), Video (mp4, webm, flv, ogg), Audio(mp3, aac), Image(.jpeg) DLNA Media Renderers (Smart TV/Bluray Players): Video (mp4), Audio(mp3), Image(.jpeg) Please leave your feedback/suggestions at info@ytmoviesapp.com . website: www.ytmoviesapp.com We are not affiliated with any of the websites or products mentioned above. This app does not claim DLNA (or any other protocols mentioned above) certified. The contents listed by this app are not hosted/uploaded by us, This app only facilitates the search from web.

description: Mit diesem Programm hast du einen kompletten Schichtplaner und Schichtwecker in einem. Ideal für Nutzer in Schichtarbeit und wechselnden Arbeitszeiten. Bitte bei Fragen, Problemen und Anregungen den eingebauten InApp Support nutzen. Ich werde so schnell wie möglich antworten. Nach einem Testzeitraum von 30 Tagen deaktiviert sich der Schichtwecker und die Layouteinstellung wird auf Standardlayouts begrenzt. Alle weiteren Funktionen sind weiterhin uneingeschränkt lauffähig. Dieses Programm ist eine um die Berechnung entschlackte Version meines Verdienst Planers. Für alle, die keine Kalkulation des Lohnes möchten. Funktionen, die das Programm bis jetzt anbietet : Schichtplanung : - Volle Funktion eines Schichtkalenders. Frei konfigurierbar. - Schichten können unterschiedliche Zeiten zur Auswahl anbieten. - Unterschiedliche Layouts - Bequeme Backupfunktion - Notizfunktion - Feiertage für Deutschland und Österreich vorkonfiguriert. - Benutzerverwaltung - Schnelle Schichtzuweisung durch den Schnellplanung Funktion - Widget Schichtwecker Funktion : - Weckzeit für jede Weckervorlage auswählbar zwischen fester Uhrzeit oder "Minuten vor Schichtbeginn". - Nutze deine eigene Musik als Weckmusik. - Abschnittsauswahl : Jede Musikauswahl kann auch nur Abschnittsweise abgespielt werden. (z.B. 00:58Min - 02:22Min) - Klingellautstärke und Fading für jeden Weckton einstellbar. - Pro Weckervorlage sind mehrere Wecktöne einstellbar, die entweder nacheinander beim Schlummern oder zufällig abgespielt werden. Über ein Feedback würde ich mich freuen. Nutzer meiner anderen App "Verdienst Planer" haben diese Funktion schon integriert. Erstellt mit b4a. With this program, you have a complete layer planners and alarm clock in one layer. Ideal for users in shift work and changing working hours. Please with any questions, problems or suggestions use the built-app support. I will reply as soon as possible. After a test period of 30 days, deactivated the alarm and layer the layout setting is limited to standard layouts. All other functions are still fully operate. This program is a version of my entschlackte to the calculation of earnings planner. For those who do not want a calculation of wages. Functions offered by the program so far: Layer design: - Full function of a shift calendar. Freely configurable. - Layers can offer different times to choose from. - Different layouts - Convenient Backup function - Memo function - Holidays for Germany and Austria preconfigured. - User management - Fast layer assignment by the rapid planning function - Widget Layer alarm clock function: - Alarm clock template for each selectable between fixed time or "minutes before the start of the shift." - Use your own music as alarm music. - Section selection: Each music selection can only be played Sectional. (For example, 00: 58min - 02: 22min) - Ringer volume and fading for each alarm set. - Multiple alarm tones are adjustable Alarm Clock Pro template that can be either played sequentially or randomly during slumber. About feedback I would be delighted. Users of my other app "merit planners" have already integrated this feature. Created with b4a.

description: Your smartphone is always with you, so why carry unnecessary stuff? Let your smartphone in combination with DSLR Remote be a remote control, a timer or a HDR controller for your digital reflex camera. Whether via infrared, by wire or via Bluetooth, DSLR Remote enables you to take timer controlled exposure series (e.g. for time lapse), long time exposures or exposure sequences in the context of High Dynamik Range photography. If you are not using a device with a supported built-in IR sender (see below) all you need is a small, inexpensive and easy to build hardware, which is then connected to the ear phone jack of your smartphone (and a commercially available Bluetooth stereo headset if you want remote control via Bluetooth). You will find detailed instructions on how to build the required hardware on the authors website ( http://bitshift.bplaced.net ). Possible functions (among others) are: 1. Simple Remote control 2. Delayed Shots 3. Series of shots with fixed interval (e.g for time lapse) 4. Bulb exposures 5. Combinations from 2., 3. and 4. 6. High-Dynamic-Range-Sequences (HDR) 7. Time controlled HDR-Sequences (Combination of Timer and HDR) 8. Triggering of shots or start of Timer or HDR sequences by the ambient light sensor on your smartphone (keyword: light barrier) 9. Triggering of shots or start of Timer or HDR sequences by the internal or an external microphone In various models Canon seems to limit the precision of the bulb mode to one second. So HDR exposures below 1 second and/or with a fraction of a second (as 1.5 sec) are rounded to the full second. DSLR Remote can't do anything about that! Reported models so far: 400D, 500D, 550D, 5D II. Using a built-in IR sender: DSLR Remote should work with the built-in IR sender of the followig devices (don't forget to choose the right camera brand and to switch your camera into remote mode): Samsung - All Samsung devices with built-in IR sender There seems to be a bug in some/all Samsung devices: in power saving mode the IR blaster doesn't work correctly! So, make sure to switch your device into normal (non-power saving) mode before using DSLR Remote. HTC - All HTC devices with built-in IR sender LG The QRemote API Revision 4 should support sending raw IR data (neccessary for DSLR Remote to work) on the following devices: - G Flex2, G2, G3, G3 A, G3 Screen, G Pro2 (for more details see http://developer.lge.com/resource/mobile/RetrieveOverview.dev?categoryTypeCode=ANRS#supporteddev ) The QRemote API Revision 3 only supports sending raw IR data on the following devices: - G3 Sony Unfortunately, doesn't the Sony native IR API provide the feature needed by any remote app like DSLR Remote, as is deploying its own IR codes as data with the app. The only thing possible in the API is using codes learned from physical remotes or codes supplied with the phone/tablet. If your device doesn't run Android 4.4.2 (Kitkat) or higher or Android can not support the built-in IR hardware of your device for the above mentioned reason, please use a IR dongle or cable release hardware as described on the DSLR Remote website. Other Brands With integration of the Android 4.4.2 (Kitkat) IR API DSLR Remote should work with all devices with a built-in IR Blaster supported by the Kitkat IR API. Using DSLR Remote hardware: Caution: a few smartphone types do not output high enough volume on their ear phone jack to make the infrared harware work properly. In addition a few camera types (e.g. Canon EOS 550D) are still not properly controlled remotely via the infrared receiver. In that case you might want to choose the cable control (transistors) instead. Supported camera brands when using as an infrared remote: Canon, Fuji, Minolta, Nikon, Olympus, Pentax and Sony If it doesn't work for you, feel free to contact the author, instead of voting one star. Contact informations are given below and on the authors website ( http://bitshift.bplaced.net ).
release_text: - Olympus RC-300 IR codes added 1.12.1 - Bug-Fix for the "Sony"-Bug

description: It is the dark age. The kingdom is in peril. The fate of the kingdom lies on your hands. As the Knight, you will have to battle the demons and defeat the dragon. Be wary of dark magic as well. Prepare your sword and armor Knight, protect the castle and get ready to embark on the adventure full of magic and fantasy. This is Knight’s Tale in Dark Age game. In this game As the Knight, you will go on a quest to save the kingdom from dark magic and battle the demons. The kingdom is under siege from demons! Use your sword; seek the magic book where you can find the tale that will unlock the legendary King Arthur. The tale of cavalry has been seen for ages, it is a tale of chivalry and brotherhood. Get those diamonds and upgrade your armor as you prepare to battle with the demons. Dark Age really rocks! By the way, get ready Knight, an evil demon rider awaits you. Your tale just became harder and harder! Never fear as you are the Hero that will create your own tale! Demons are no match for you. This fps fight game is full of fantasy and magic. It reminds me of the tale of King Arthur and the Templar. Your fate depends on defeating the demons, brave Knight. Your kingdom depends on you! Battle the demons and destroy the dark age. Protect your kingdom at all cost! The King will help you in your quest to destroy the dark ages. Use magic to battle the demons. The Knight’s Tale in Dark Age Game lets you be the Knight who will be the hero of his kingdom and create his own legend, his own tale to spread across the kingdom. That is, to keep the princess safe from the demons. Beware of the dragon, it is secretly hunting for you. You will get additional magic once you find the dragon. It is a part of your legendary tale. Dark Age just makes this game more entertaining. Hurry Knight, carve your tale. Destroy the demons, end the dark age and rescue the kingdom!

description: Я не обладаю абсолютным слухом и выдающимися вокальными данными, да и на гитаре играю весьма посредственно. И все же порою хочется взять в компании гитару в руки и забацать что-нибудь такое, чтобы все подхватили. Или чтобы впечатлилась та самая, которая лучше всех... Да вот беда, то слова подзабыл, то аккордов не помню, и заветный блокнотик с песнями остался дома. Но теперь все это позади, потому как Андроид всегда со мной! А на Андроиде - песенник, где есть куча песен, и все с аккордами, и практически любую из них я могу спеть и сыграть! А если подзабыл мотив, то и послушать! Итак, друзья, вашему вниманию предлагается гитарный песенник для начинающих, в котором вы можете: - Видеть текст и аккорды песен, не отрываясь от гитары (автопрокрутка). - Редактировать текст, аккорды и скорость прокрутки песни. - Посмотреть видео-клип для каждой (нууу... почти для каждой) песни. - Добавлять в список свои песни. - Подключать к песням mp3 файлы. С вопросами, пожеланиями и предложениями обращайтесь к автору, не стесняйтесь! I do not have perfect pitch and outstanding vocal, and guitar playing mediocre. Yet sometimes you want to take the company a guitar in his hands and zabatsat something so that all picked up. Or to impress the one that best ... But the trouble, the words rusty, the chords do not remember, and treasured notebook with songs stayed home. But now it is all over, because Android is always with me! And on Android - songwriter, where there are a bunch of songs, and all the chords and almost any of them, I can sing and play! And if rusty motive, then listen! Hockey Radio also provides a schedule so you can easily listen to all hockey games! Hockey Radio Features: * Listen to NHL games live! * Updated schedule for the 2013 season! * Stream live pro hockey games directly to your Android device. * NHL schedule so you can instantly listen to streaming hockey games. * Stream live games in the background while you use other apps. * Never miss pro hockey scores again! * Enjoy listening to the following teams live: Colorado Avalanche Chicago Blackhawks Columbus Blue Jackets St. Louis Blues Boston Bruins Montreal Canadiens Vancouver Canucks Washington Capitals Phoenix Cyotes New Jersey Devils Anaheim Ducks Calgary Flames Philadelphia Flyers Carolina Hurricanes Winnipeg Jets Los Angeles Kings Tampa Bay Lightning Toronto Maple Leafs Edmonton Oilers Florida Panthers Pittsburgh Penguins Nashville Predators NY Islanders NY Rangers Detroit Red Wings Buffalo Sabres Ottawa Senators San Jose Sharks Dallas Stars Minnesota Wild

description: Created by two high-achieving students, the homework prioritizer seeks to make your studying as easy as possible. This app will change the way you do homework by keeping you organized and guiding your study habits. Paired with a good work ethic, this program is guaranteed to help you keep track of all that homework, score higher on tests, and become the student you've always wanted to be. Although this app is great and can help any student improve their grades, we are always open to constructive criticism and would love to hear how we can improve our app. If you have any questions, suggestions, please email us at HomeworkPrioritizer@gmail.com . About the Creators: We are two high school students from Dallas, TX just getting into app-design and programming. This is our first initiative. Although we have taken classes at our respective schools, most of this is done in our free time with information we’ve learned from the Internet. This particular project was created to help out with the often stressful volume of work we and our peers get. The hope is that it will alleviate some of the difficulties associated with being a well-rounded student. In the future, we will look to move on to bigger and more innovative apps that help people out in their daily lives.
release_text: Interface improvements and easier sharing! "Progress, march on." >> Upgrades for Homework Pro coming soon! After a devastating data loss, Homework Pro is finally back to development. A newer, better HP is under construction!

description: Baby vaccine reminder & tracker with vaccine descriptions and customized alerts for upcoming vaccinations. iVaccine is the first child vaccine reminder application of its kind, designed to ensure you don't forget or lose track of your child's shots, iVaccine uses your regions immunization schedule to automatically send out reminders for any upcoming vaccination! description: Wurdle is a fun, flexible and fast-paced word game, perfect for coffee breaks or the subway. Find and trace as many words as possible before time runs out. Can't find any more words? Shake the board to mix up the tiles! Rotate the board for a different angle! Customize Wurdle the way YOU like it, and see how you measure up against your friends and the world with online high scores and achievements. · "It's so darn addictive..." (Tom Merritt, Executive Editor, CNET TV) · "I'm obsessed with wurdle...wurdle is outstanding!" (Molly Wood, Executive Editor, CNET.com) · "It's just beautifully designed, easy to use and a heck of a lot of fun." (Chicago Tribune) The current version of Wurdle features: · full support for both phones and tablets of any size! · online leaderboards and achievements via Google Game Services · 4x4, 5x5, 6x6, 7x7, and 8x8 grids · customize your display with different colors and tile designs! · set timer, minimum word length and more · untimed mode · view all possible words at the end of a round · multiple background wallpapers · sound effects by ozonesound.com

description: 星座早見アプリケーションです。 日時・観測地をタッチする事で設定画面に変わります。 現在の表示対象は恒星・太陽・月・金星・火星・木星・土星のみです。 星座名は、IAU(国際天文学連合)が定めた88星座を表示しています。 恒星名は、主な恒星をリストアップして表示しています。 線で結ばれた星座は、南天の27星座を除く61星座を対象としています。 恒星の色は、スペクトル型（Ｗ～Ｍ）の８色で表示しています。 Ver3.13から表示対象にアステリズムと流星群の出現位置を追加しました。 表示されるアステリズムは春の大三角・春のダイヤモンド・夏の大三角・ 秋の四角形・冬の大三角・冬のダイヤモンドの６つです。 表示される流星群はしぶんぎ座流星群・こと座流星群・みずがめ座η流星群・ みずがめ座δ南流星群・ペルセウス座流星群・オリオン座流星群・ふたご座流星群・ こぐま座流星群の８つです。 設定のピックアップをタッチする事でアステリズムと流星群の出現位置を非表示に する事が出来ます。

description: You can record your IMPORTANT days (such as Marriage, Buying Car, Pregnancy, etc.) easily by using ‘Day Counter’. You can know how many days have been passed after an IMPORTANT day and you can also know how many days will be remaining before the IMPORTANT day arriving. A widget is also provided. Usage Hint: You can delete the default event after adding a new event. Permission Description: Storage (modify or delete the contents of your SD card) & System tools (test access to protected storage) : This App will try to read/write your SD card. You can set a photo for an event and this photo is read from the SD card. Besides, when you send a screenshot, the screenshot will be cached in the SD card. Network communication (full network access & view network connections) : Internet access permission is required for the 'Public Events' function. This app will fetch public events through Internet.
release_text: (1) More background styles are provided. (2) A larger picture will be shown when you click the event picture in the main page. (3) After creating/editing an event, the event will be shown on the main page now. (4) The option of 'Plus one day when counting past events' is recovered. (5) Some minor bugs have been fixed.

description: As seen on Cardplayerlifestyle.com ( http://cardplayerlifestyle.com/poker-notes-live-app/ ), Poker Notes Live - Premium is an enhanced note-taking tool that gives you an advantage over the other players at live poker tables. This utility poker app allows you to easily take and save notes on your opponents, just like you do online. Since poker is a game of incomplete information, it helps to have as much information as possible at your disposal. Recording and saving your poker notes will help you make better, more informed decisions at the table and thus enable you to win more money! This premium poker utility app will help you remember the moves, style, patterns, and tells you notice about other players at your table. In addition to writing notes, you can also utilize icons and customizable tags to speedily and effectively profile your opponents. With Poker Notes Live - Premium, you'll have all the information you need in the palms of your hands. Poker Notes Live - Premium is an excellent note-taking tool that comes loaded with a number of advanced features, including: ✓ Access, utilize, and expand your Player List, which will contain all data on every player you’ve ever taken notes on at the felt ✓ E-mail your notes to your PC for further, enhanced study away from the table between live poker sessions ✓ Keep detailed records of all your poker sessions ...as well as all the great features included in the free Poker Notes Live app: ✓ Real table simulation: Select the number of players, your seat position, and the relative table positions of your opponents ✓ Simple, speedy note-taking: Just click on your opponent and jot down your thoughts instantly! Icons and customizable tags speed note taking up even more ✓ Assigning names and chip counts to the other players at your table ✓ Personalize your poker note-taking experience by naming and choosing a theme for your virtual table ✓ Take notes on yourself, including win/loss per session, buy-ins, and tips given ✓ Optimized for both phones and tablets ✓ Use our Poker Odds - Range Calculator to get exceptionally accurate odds ✓ Available in 9 languages: English, Spanish, German, Russian, Italian, Dutch, Hebrew, Swedish, and French with more languages in the pipeline What are you waiting for? Download the Poker Notes Live - Premium note-taking tool now!
release_text: 1.6.2: - language added: Swedish 1.6: - new feature: profit graph - new feature: export/import database 1.5b: - bug fixed: sometimes the table disappeared after the app was paused 1.5: - Subscriptions removed - one-time lifetime price added - new feature: total profit 1.4.1: - new tool added: odds calculator 1.4.0: - incorrect behavior for the player and note list fixed 1.3.9: - bugs fixed - new language: Hebrew 1.3.8: - New language: Spanish

description: flashME will be your light notification in your Android phone. The flashlight embedded in your device will promptly blink as your phone is ringing, or a new text has been received. Moreover, you can set/unset the flashlight blinking for each different notification event (Facebook or Twitter update, calendar alert, any other apps events). You can decide to have your light notification only when your cell phone is upside down, and the light will continue blinking till you get the notification. This app is greatly helpful for people with hearing disabilities. Some features may require the full version. We are aware that flashME could not properly work with some device configurations. This is not a bug, and the issue could be fixed after a custom device configuration. Please contact the developer for any feedback and any further comments. (*) If you buy the full version with Jelly Bean 4.1.2 the following procedure is required to fix a problem with TalkBack: go to Settings -> Application manager -> All - Disable Google TTS (text to speech) - Disable Samsung TTS (text to speech). ---------------- Help me to translate flashME in other languages, please send an email to android.support@marlove.net for more informations. ----------------

description: Toddler Shapes is a shape sorting game aimed at 18 month to 3 year old children. It presents them with shapes and a matching hole to put the shapes into. The toddler then drags the shapes down into the correct location. It attempts to teach them to understand * the concept of different shapes * problem solving logic to put the shapes together * how to use touchscreens * coordination for the younger toddlers * shape names * colors (full version) * numbers, alphabets for older toddlers (full version) It contains shapes like squares, triangles, circles and stars (more in the full version). For older toddlers it contains number and alphabet modes to give them a head start in learning those (full version). It is Ad free with no special permissions and works on mobiles/tablets, so if you like it please upgrade

description: Russian checkers (also known as Shashki, Шашки, Russian draugths) is very popular logic game in Russia and in all former Soviet republics. Russian Checkers is a challenging board game that can train your logic and strategic skills. The application contains powerful algorithm of game and friendly classic interface. Challenge your strategic skills with this relaxing game. Now you can enjoy the game of checker anywhere you may be, directly from your smart phone. Features: * Accessibility - Adapted for people with visual impairments * Game openings * Ability to compose own game position * Ability to save games and continue later * Statistics * One or Two player mode - test your skills against the computer or challenge a friend * Human-like behaviour - application player always plays unpredictably * Auto-save * Attractive classic wooden interface * Undo move * Advanced AI engine * Sounds Your comments will help to improve this application in the future.

description: InTouch App is a simple, smart and FREE application for automatic contact backup, sync, and transfer. Stay in touch with those that matter - your contacts’ information will stay updated automatically so you never have to worry about your contacts again. Easily manage contacts across all your devices without losing any information or worrying about duplicate contacts. TRULY CROSS PLATFORM: Works across most devices including iPhone, iPad, Blackberry, Blackberry 10, Java phones, and all Android devices (Samsung, HTC, Nexus, LG, Sony, etc.). CONTACTS BACKUP & SYNC: Easily backup contacts to the cloud and sync contacts across all your devices. Edit information on one device, and see the changes on the others automatically. TRANSFER CONTACTS TO NEW PHONE: Easily sync contacts to your new phone by simply installing IntouchApp - hassle free - No PC / USB / Mac / Wires / Desktop Software, etc., required. Works across device formats with no loss of data. AUTO-UPDATING CONTACTS: Access the latest contact information. If any of your contacts changes their information, it will be automatically updated in your phonebook. When you update your information, it is updated for all your contacts as well! MANAGE CONTACTS ONLINE FROM MAC / PC: View and manage your phone contacts online at http://intouchapp.com from the comfort of the larger keyboard. MERGE DUPLICATES: Say goodbye to duplicate contacts. We manage and merge duplicates automatically for you. MEET & CONNECT: Easily exchange contact info with people you meet by typing in their IntouchID, using the integrated QR code scanner, or by simply giving a missed call. DIGITAL BIZ CARD: Go green with a virtual and professional business card, that can be easily shared with people you meet. SAFE, SECURE & PRIVATE: Contacts are your most important data on the phone. Their safety, privacy and security is our highest priority. Watch the video below to learn how the IntouchApp magic works. Learn about benefits of IntouchApp: http://intouchapp.com We, at Intouch, are committed to keep you in touch with the people that matter to you by ensuring you have each other's latest contact information accessible all the time. We promise to give you lots of exciting value-add features very soon! Do Stay In-Touch! Help us in spreading the word. Join us on Twitter: @intouchapp Facebook: https://facebook.com/intouchapp
release_text: New in version 2.0.5: - Fix invisible login button on Android 5.1 - New and improved interface - Separate contact list view for easier contact management - Multi select : tap and hold to select multiple contacts and delete in one go - Easily send a contact in human readable text to anyone via SMS, email, WhatsApp, Telegram, etc. - Improved display of search results - Bug fix: frequent sync on some devices - Bug fix: adding photo crashing on some devices - Many other bug fixes

description: FX File Explorer version 4.0 is now available with a new Material Design UI! FX File Explorer is a file manager with optional media, networking, cloud, and root capabilities. FX is designed to let you quickly and easily manage all content on your phone or tablet. FX has no ads. The free main module of FX File Explorer (this product) includes all file management features for working with files on your phone/tablet. The "FX Plus" add-on adds media management, network (FTP, SFTP, SMB, WebDAV) and cloud capabilities (Dropbox, Google Drive, SkyDrive, Box, SugarSync). The "Plus" add-on is a paid app (with a 7-day free trial). The free "FX Root" add-on is for developers and knowledgeable enthusiasts who need to make changes as the root user. General Features (included standard): * Material Design. * Productivity-oriented layout: The "Home Screen" shows bookmarks, storage, tools and (with FX+) media/network locations. You no longer have to wade through the garbage that apps store in the root folder of your SD card to get to the places you actually use. * Dual pane mode and unlimited windows (quickly switch between different locations) * Pinch-to-zoom in any "Explorer" window, zoom-in to see additional information about items * Intuitive swipe-to-select gesture for managing multiple items (Slide finger horizontally across items to select/deselect them; see YouTube Videos, web site documentation, or in-app help for more information) * "Usage View" mode analyzes storage space usage, enabling you to see total size of any folder * Indexed Search File Viewers / Editors (included standard) * Text Editor with Undo/Redo history, Cut/Copy/Paste, Find, and Pinch-to-zoom * Binary (Hex) Viewer * Image Viewer * Media Player, pop-up Audio Player * Zip, Tar, GZip, Bzip2, and 7zip Archive Extractor / Creator (.zip, .tgz, .tar.gz, .tar.bz2, .7z) * RAR Extractor (UnRAR) * Shell Script Executor Media Capabilities (FX Plus add-on required): * Browse image and video collections * Browse audio by artist, album, playlist, or all tracks * Create and rearrange playlists with drag and drop (multiple files can be rearranged by selecting them) Network / Cloud Capabilities (requires FX Plus add-on): * Windows networking (SMB) * FTP (including secure FTP-S and FTP-ES) * SSH FTP (Secure Shell FTP; password and public key auth) * WebDAV (see help for using WebDAV with OwnCloud) * Cloud Storage: Google Drive (incl. Google Docs), Dropbox, SugarSync, Box (Box.net), and SkyDrive (SkyDrive requires Android 2.2 or later) * Stream video and audio media files from SMB, FTP, SSH, Google Drive, Dropbox, SugarSync, Box, and SkyDrive to media player applications * Browse local network for Windows (SMB) shares * Find FTP and SSH FTP local network shares using multicast DNS (mDNS) service discovery (Bonjour/Zeroconf/Avahi) * Encrypted keyring (used to avoid entering sensitive passwords in public while not allowing access in event of device theft) * Download and convert Google Drive / Google Docs files into Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OpenDocument, PDF, and other formats Bluetooth Capabilities (FX Plus add-on required): * Bluetooth FTP Client * Discover / pair devices from within FX File Explorer Additional FX Plus Features: * AES-256, AES-128 Zip Encryption. Browse inside encrypted Zip files, viewing text documents, images, audio, and video without writing unencrypted data to SD card * App Management * Browse apps by permission NOTES: * Streaming video playback: Format support is based upon third-party playback software installed on your device. Android typically supports MP4 and 3GP. FX can play AVI, FLV, MKV, and WMV formats *IF* you install third-party players available from the Google Play Store. * GDrive / GDocs: Cut/pasted documents will be converted to Microsoft Office formats by default. Use "Open With" to download them in the format of your choice. Have a bug report or question? Please email android@nextapp.com .
release_text: (Lollipop Only) Fixed bug where enabling write access on SD cards failed to persist after reboot. You will need to perform the "Enable Write Access" procedure after installing this release to obtain write access to it.

description: Gnaural is a computer-based audio synthesizer capable of generating binaural beats, isochronic tones, pink noise, and many varieties of simulated nature sounds (including rain, waterfall, ocean waves, babbling brook, and wind). Gnaural is intended to be an aural aid to meditation and relaxation. Long available for Mac, Windows, and Linux, Gnaural allows you to use your computer to create, edit, and play your own "presets" - which are editable meditation sessions coded in to XML text files. Gnaural for Android is able to play Gnaural presets that you copy to your device, but can't edit them beyond the ability to turn on/off individual voices, specify number of "loops" (times to repeat the preset), and manually move forward-and-backward through the schedule. However, Gnaural presets, being simple text files written in Gnaural's XML language, can be edited by hand with any text editor and then opened by Gnaural for Android. The only issue you might run in to is that if your preset uses external audio files - in which case Gnaural for Android can only play external CD-quality WAV audio files, not the many formats open-able by the full computer-based Gnaural (such as FLAC and OGG). This should not be a real limitation, as any audio format can easily be converted to WAV using readily available software like Audacity. For people not interested in playing external Gnaural presets, Gnaural for Android also comes with 14 built-in presets, designed to explore a range of mental states with binaural beats and isochronic tones, as well as providing a range of soothing background sounds (like water or wind) that can be played continuously to help one relax or sleep. Unlike most audio players, Gnaural for Android is a true sound synthesizer, creating and mixing CD quality sound on-the-fly from user-programmable instructions without relying on any sound files. Generating live synthesized sound requires a lot of processing power. Most cellphones less than 2 years old should have enough horsepower to run basic presets. If you do experience stuttering, such as when processing complex multi-voiced presets, there are options to lower the processing load by either lowering the sample rate (under Preferences), or by turning off extra voices. It is strongly recommended that you use and get-to-know the free version of Gnaural well first before deciding to pay to support this version. The free version is available here: https://market.android.com/details?id=org.gnaural.lite
release_text: -Fixed access to external storage for users supplying their own Gnaural presets. It had gotten broken by Android OS updates. -Cleaned up some deprecated code

description: Test the quality of your fish ear, with this specific hearing test. The term fish ear is a non-scientific term referring to the phase-locking hair cells in your labyrinth. These hair cells can be found in the vestibulum and as inner hair cells in the cochlea. They are responsible for the coding of the low frequency fine structure of mechanical waves. This is in contrast to the outer hair cells in the cochlea which are responsible for the tonotopical coding of the higher frequencies, which are typical for speech sounds. The fish ear is responsible for the balance (equilibrium), for understanding one voice in the presence of multiple speakers, for appreciating music, etc. Abnormal results on this test are often seen in low frequency hearing loss, hydrops, Menière disease, stress related hearing loss, stress related balanced problems and vertigo. They often coincide with clinical symptoms like fullness, tinitus, hearing loss, hyperacusis (hypercusis), noise intolerance, drop attacks, muscle tension, irritable bowel syndrome, depressive disorders, burn out, etc. This app has been developed by Otoconsult for readers of the scientific journal Bio-Mens which has dedicated its March number of 2012 to hearing.

description: Официальное приложение от МВД России. Мобильное приложение позволяет связаться с ближайшим отделом полиции, найти своего участкового уполномоченного полиции, получить справочную информацию о деятельности органов внутренних дел Российской Федерации. ОСНОВНЫЕ ВОЗМОЖНОСТИ ПРИЛОЖЕНИЯ: -экстренный вызов полиции: приложение определяет местоположение пользователя и совершает вызов в ближайший отдел полиции. -информация об участковом уполномоченном полиции: адрес, контактный телефон, местоположение на карте, обслуживаемый участок. -информация о ближайших отделах полиции: списком и на карте отображаются ближайшие органы охраны правопорядка и их контактная информация. -прием обращений: с помощью приложения можно отправить обращение в территориальный орган внутренних дел либо в центральный аппарат МВД России. -справочная информация: КоАП РФ, штрафы ПДД, памятки о поведению в экстренных ситуациях и т.д. -новости с официальных интернет-сайтов региональных подразделений МВД России. ВЫЗОВ ПОЛИЦИИ Приложение определяет местоположение пользователя, находит ближайший отдел полиции и производит звонок в дежурную часть. В случае, если в телефоне отключена функция определения местоположения производится звонок на номер 112. Таким образом, в экстренной ситуации вероятность успешного дозвона до полиции или экстренных служб повышается. ИНФОРМАЦИОННЫЕ СЕРВИСЫ Приложение позволяет получить информацию о местоположении и контактах территориальных подразделений полиции, пунктах охраны порядка, участковых уполномоченных полиции по всей России. Все объекты отображаются на карте, имеется возможность изучить детальную информацию либо позвонить по контактным телефонам. Информация поддерживается в актуальном состоянии и берется с официального интернет-сайта МВД России. ПРИЕМ ОБРАЩЕНИЙ Пользователь может отправить обращение в любое территориальное подразделение МВД России, снабдив его необходимыми файлами, прямо из мобильного приложения. Кроме того, имеется возможность направления обращений в подразделения центрального аппарата МВД России, уполномоченные принимать обращения граждан и организаций. Official application from the Russian Interior Ministry. Mobile app allows you to contact the nearest police department, find your precinct police, get background information on the activities of the internal affairs of the Russian Federation. KEY FEATURES APPLICATIONS: -Police emergency call: The application determines the location of the user and makes a call to the nearest police department. -Information about the police precinct: address, telephone number, location map serviced plot. -Information on the nearest police departments: the list and displayed on the map nearest law enforcement agencies and their contact information. Reception of applications: using the application, you can send an appeal to the territorial authority of the Interior or the central office of the Russian Interior Ministry. -Background: Administrative Code, fines SDA, memos behavior in emergency situations, etc. News from the official websites of regional divisions Russian Interior Ministry. CALL THE POLICE The application determines the location of the user, finds the nearest police department and makes a call to duty section. If the phone is turned off location detection made the call to 112. Thus, the probability of successful emergency dialer to the police or emergency services increases. INFORMATION SERVICES The application provides information about the location and contacts territorial police units, points of law and order, the police precinct throughout Russia. All objects are displayed on the map, you can explore the details or call the contact phone numbers. Information kept up to date, and is taken from the official website of the Russian Interior Ministry. RECEIVING APPLICATIONS The user can send an appeal in any territorial division of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia, providing it with the necessary files, directly from the mobile application. Furthermore, there is the possibility of sending requests to the offices of the central apparatus of the Russian Interior Ministry, authorized to receive petitions from individuals and organizations.

description: БУКВАРЬ. АЗБУКА ДЛЯ МАЛЫШЕЙ Программа БУКВАРЬ создана для формирования глубоких знаний алфавита русского языка у детей от 3 до 7 лет. Использование принципов педагогики в программе позволяет в легкой игровой форме эффективно изучать, запоминать и повторять буквы, а также закреплять знания использования букв в словах. Ребенок, вовлекаясь в увлекательный не утомительный процесс игры, изучает не только алфавит, но и правила произношения букв, использование букв в словах, а так же слов в речи. Для эффективного освоения букваря программа задействует все существующие инструменты обучения: произношение, тактильная работа, адаптированные рисунки-иллюстрации, звуковые подсказки. Программа хвалит в случае правильного ответа и управляет процессом обучения. Главные педагогические принципы - наглядность, доступность, посильность и адекватность – реализованы в специфических особенностях приложения: рукописные картинки в «советском» стиле создают творческое настроение и интерес к учебе, озвучивание диктором именно положительной и оптимистичной интонации, тактильная работа мелкой маторики для выбора правильной буквы, Знакомство с каждой буквой происходит сразу на 3 различных уровнях усвоения и запоминания: образном - на рисунке, аудиальном – озвучанием диктором буквы и кратким четверостишьем, тактильном. Это позволяет задействовать сразу 3 органа чувств, что значительно повышает качество обучающего процесса. Primer. ABC FOR KIDS Primer program created to generate in-depth knowledge of the alphabet of the Russian language in children from 3 to 7 years. Using the principles of pedagogy in the program allows a playful form effectively learn, remember and repeat letters and retain new knowledge of use of letters in words. A child is not engaging in the tedious process of fascinating games, exploring not only the alphabet, but also the rules of pronunciation of letters, the use of letters in words as well as words in speech. Make effective use of the ABC program requires all existing training tools: pronunciation, tactile work adapted drawings, illustrations, audio prompts. Program praises right answer and manages the process of learning. The main pedagogical principles - clarity, accessibility, stronger and value - are implemented in application specific features: handwritten images in the "Soviet" style creates a creative mood and interest in learning, sounding speaker is positive and upbeat tone, matoriki tactile work fine for selecting the correct letters Familiarity with each letter occurs immediately on 3 different levels of assimilation and memorization: figurative - in the figure, the auditory - dubbing speaker letters and brief quatrain, tactile. This allows you to use immediately 3 sensory organ that significantly improves the quality of the learning process.
