description: Parrot Announcer will replace you usual boring ringtones with its cute voice announcing caller name and caller number with its cute Call Talker voice. Call Talker is created with custom voice rather than boring Text to Speech voices. Call Talker has its own Parrot voice to replace you boring call tones. Parrot Call Announcer is the best replacement of Caller Ringtone. When the call comes in if a known contact is calling Parrot will announce call like "Call from XYZ", if the call is from an unknown contact Parrot will do call announcement saying "Call from 1234567890". Best Caller replacement for Bird lovers with a Talking Parrot. The Talking Parrot voice is very sweet and suitable to replace Call voices.
release_text: 1. Improved Tutorial on how Parrot Call works. 2. Added support for Mute. If call is already muted, Parrot Call will not announce the call. 3. Better support for restricted numbers.

description: Mitt Schema är den smartaste appen för att visa dina skolscheman; den underlättar åtkomsten till Nova Softwares WebViewer. Facebooksida: https://www.facebook.com/MittSchema Google+ community: https://plus.google.com/communities/101199379030001938893 OBS! Appen kan bara visa dina skolscheman ifall din skola publicerar sina scheman med hjälp av Nova Software vilket de flesta skolor gör. En stor fördel med Mitt Schema är att den inte behöver en nätuppkoppling för att visa dina scheman. Man kan ladda ner dem när man har tillgång till en Wi-Fi nätverk och få dem sparade i mobilen om man nu inte vill att det ska kosta någonting. Man behöver inte längre oroa sig för att skolan inte ska vara med i den listan som finns över skolorna. Mitt Schema ger möjligheten att lätt och smidigt lägga till sin egen skola i listan. Man får även chansen att skicka skolans namn till mig så att jag lägger till det i appens nästa version. Då behöver man alltså inte vänta tills appens nästa version släpps. Appen behöver ditt personnummer för att visa dina personliga scheman ifall din skola ger ut sådana. Appen låter dig då lägga lösenord på Inställningar-sidan, så att ingen annan kommer åt dina personuppgifter. Appen kan även påminna dig när det är dags att ladda ner schemana på nytt för att inte missa någonting. Tiden kan du bestämma själv. My Schedule is the smartest app to show your school schedules; facilitating access to Nova Software WebViewer. Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/MittSchema Google+ community: https://plus.google.com/communities/101199379030001938893 NOTE The app can only show your school schedules if your school publishes their schedules by Nova Software which most schools do. A major advantage of My Schedule is that it does not need an internet connection to view your schedules. You can download them when you have access to a Wi-Fi network and have them stored in the cell phone if one does not want it to cost anything. You no longer need to worry that the school should not be included in the list that are over the schools. My Schedule provides the ability to easily and seamlessly add his own school in the list. You also get the chance to send the school's name to me so I add it to the app's next version. When one does not have to wait until the app's next version is released. The app will need your social security number to show your personal schedules if your school gives out such. The app allows you to then add password in the Settings page, so no one else can access your personal data. The app can even remind you when it's time to download the schemas again to not miss anything. Meanwhile, you can decide for yourself.
release_text: KRASH FIXATS! v1.7 - ny algoritm för automatisk bestämning av schemats storlek - 44 nya skolor har lagts till (totalt 435) v1.6 - en ny funktion för att undvika "Ogiltigt ID, period eller vecka" (ett alternativ för de som fick den gula sidan istället för sina höst- och vårterminsscheman) - 16 nya skolor har lagts till (totalt 390+) v1.5.3 - Google+ Community - fler än 230 nya skolor har lagts till (totalt 370+) - möjligheten att lägga till sitt schemas lösenord(för de scheman som kräver det)

description: The mail.com app gives you the best experience for your mail.com account and all your other accounts (e.g. hotmail, yahoo or googlemail). It is simple, fast and secure using advanced encryption technologies (TLS, SSL). Send and receive mails via IMAP, POP and SMTP from all of your mail accounts. You can simply attach a photo or several pictures to any mail. mail.com is the best fully functional multi mailer app for android. Your mail.com team

description: 이제 PC메신저 뿐만 아니라, 휴대폰에서도 고객문의에 실시간으로 답변하세요! PC앞에 앉아있지 않아도 OK! 바로 바로 답변이 가능하니 고객의 불만사항도 줄어듭니다! * 기존 PC메신저와도 함께 사용 가능합니다. [몰톡운영자 앱의 특징 및 주요기능] ★ 북마크친구관리 기능 : 몰톡앱에서 내 쇼핑몰을 북마크한 사용자들을 확인할 수 있습니다. ★ 채팅기능 : 톡하듯 스마트폰에서 바로바로 답변 가능합니다. 사진첨부 및 귀여운 이모티콘첨부도 가능! ★ 쇼핑몰 정보수정가능 : PC로 접속하지 않아도 앱에서 쇼핑몰 기본정보 수정이 가능합니다. ★ 부운영자 관리 : 외부쇼핑몰(메이크샵쇼핑몰이 아닌)의 경우, 부운영자를 앱에서 추가하여 부운영자에게 아이디를 부여할 수 있습니다. ★ 알림설정 : 채팅알림 및 알림시간 설정, 알림소리를 바꿀 수 있습니다. ★ 잠금기능 : 앱 비밀번호 잠금을 통해, 정보보안을 유지할 수 있습니다. ★ 리포트기능 : 메이크샵 상점(외부상점 불가)이라면, 어제 오늘의 주문금액 및 몰톡으로 인한 SMS할인금액등을 확인할 수 있습니다. 대표 참여 쇼핑몰 : 금찌, 난닝구, 소녀감성, 09우먼, 토모나리, 무지개솜사탕, 바닐라민트, 써니, 제이드, 쿠키하우스, 콩스타일 외 2000+개 이상의 국내 유명 쇼핑몰들이 몰톡 참여중입니다. (2014년 8월 현재, 계속 추가중) [몰톡 어플문의] 웹사이트: malltalk.kr 이메일: help@malltalk.kr

description: «ЗНО – Супергерой» – тренуйся завжди і всюди :) Мобільний додаток «ЗНО – Супергерой» дає можливість усім, хто готується до складання ЗНО, робити це мобільно, інтенсивно та по-сучасному! У додатку Ви знайдете: - велику базу тестів минулих років; - автентичну систему підрахунку результатів; - актуальну та корисну інформацію для абітурієнтів; - приємний дизайн і широкий функціонал додатка. Матеріали для тестів взяті з сайту Українського центру оцінювання якості освіти. "SET - Superhero" - trenuysya always and everywhere :) Mobile application "SET - Superhero" gives an opportunity to all who qualify to pass EIT, do it flexibly, rapidly and in a modern way! Attached you will find: - Extensive database tests of previous years; - Authentic scoring system; - Actual and useful information for students; - Nice design and broad functionality of the application. Materials for tests taken from the website of the Ukrainian Center for Educational Quality Assessment.
release_text: Незначительные улучшения

description: 공부, 빨리 끝내고 놀자! 기능 : 공부 ➤ 요약 ➤ 복습 효과 : 이해력, 집중력, 암기력 향상 대상 : 암기에 죽고, 암기에 살 자 이론 : 망각곡선, 초가속학습법 기능 설명서 (요약) : 1. 스톱워치 (학습하기) : 공부량을 늘리는 효율적 공부 2. 마킹 (SMART NOTE) : 암기 할 내용만 요약하는 스마트한 공부 3. 망각시점의 복습 알람 : 3분 x 10회 = 3년 암기 (에빙하우스의 망각곡선) 4. 음악 : 집중력을 올려주는 바로크 음악3분 (게오르기 로자노프의 초가속학습법) 빠른 합격을 기원합니다. p.s) 1. 공부에 필요한 기능 있으시면 리플 달아주세요. ========================================= 상세 사용설명서 (학습법의 핵심 요약) "공부, 빨리 끝내고 놀자" 스터디플래너_StudyPlanner는 시간의 질을 높임으로서 합격에 필요한 시간을 줄여(공부시간 절약) 준다. 이해력, 집중력 및 암기력을 향상 시키는 실용적인 공부 앱(어플리케이션)이다. 즉, 하루 12시간을 공부하는 것 보다, 8시간에 12시간의 학습량을 끝내고 4시간의 여유를 즐기는 공부의신 들의 숨은 비법이 녹아 들어 있다. 공부 잘하는 법을 알려주는 학습 도우미 1. 학습하기(1) : [20분 학습 -> 5분 휴식-> 5분 복습(사진 촬영, 마킹)] X 회수 공부는 엉덩이로 하는 게 아니다! 공부는 얼마나 ‘오래’ 가 아니라 얼마나 ‘효율적’으로 하느냐가 중요합니다. 1회 학습시 2번(학습 시작 및 종료 시점)의 회상력(암기력) 최고점을 갖는다(초두 효과, 마감 효과). 따라서 학습 시간 단위를 짧게 나누면 회상력의 최고점의 회수를 늘릴 수 있어 암기력을 높일 수 있다. 뿐만아니라 집중력도 높아진다. 효률적인 학습 시간 단위는 학습자의 집중력에 따라 차이가 있으나 통상적인 학습시간은 20~50분, 휴식시간은 2~10분인 것으로 알려져 있다. 경험상 학습시간 20분에 휴식시간 5분 후 5분 복습(1차)이 가장 적절해 보인다. (각각의 학습자는 자신에 맞는 시간을 찾기 위한 테스트를 여러번 하여 바탕화면의 '설정'에서 설정하면 됨. 학습자마다 학습시간 및 휴식시간이 다름) 학습시간과 휴식시간 및 반복 횟수를 입력하면, '예상 학습 시간'을 계산하여 시작 시간과 종료 시간을 보여줌으로서 계획적, 체계적, 주도적으로 시간을 지배 할 수 있도록 정보를 제공 한다. '학습시작'을 클릭하면, 설정된 학습시간 및 휴식시간에 알람을 준다. 자기주도학습(자습)의 이해학습(진도)에 효과적이다. 학습 전 5분 또는 학습 중 60Hz의 바로크 음악을 들으면, 암기력과 이해력 및 집중력이 향상된다. 2. 학습하기 (2) : 실전 대비 문제풀이 스탑와치 (백 타이머 back timer, 카운트 다운 countdown, 초시계) 실전은 연습처럼. 연습은 실전처럼! 최근의 시험 경향은 빠른 시간내의 답을 찾아내는 능력을 평가하는 방향으로 변화하고 있다. 따라서 반드시 문제풀이를 할 때에는 제한 시간내에 푸는 연습을 하는 것이 필수다. 지문을 포함한 문제만 시간내에 정확히 읽어도 정답을 찾을 수 있는 (지식의 깊이보다) 빠른 독해력을 요구한다. 특히, 대학입시 수학능력평가(대입 수능)의 언어 영억(국어), 외국어 영역(영어) 및 토익, 텝스, 토플 등에서 이러한 현상이 두드러 진다. 3. 스마트 노트 : 필기 노트 or 책 사진 촬영 -> 핵심 단어 마킹 기록은 기억을 지배한다! 강의를 듣고 난 후 or '학습하기'를 실행하지 않고, 필기 한 것 또는 기억해야 할 내용을 사진 촬영으로 저장하는 기능이다. 이 기능이 중요한 이유는 학습량을 줄여서 학습 시간을 줄여주기 때문이다. 중요 기능은 마킹이다. 빨간색과 노랑색의 마커(형광팬)으로 중요도를 분류하고, 이미 암기 한 것과 앞으로 암기 할 것을 구분하여 중요 핵심 단어에 마킹하고, 복습시 마킹된 부분만을 반복해서 확인하면 공부량과 공부시간을 줄일 수 있다. 이것이 바로 시간의 효율성을 극대화하는 핵심이다. 복습시에는 반드시 확인만 한다. 내용을 억지로 암기하려고 하지 말고 복습주기마다 내용을 확인만 해 주면 암기하려 하지 않아도 암기가 된다. 그리고 전체 내용이 머리 속에서 유기적인 마인드맵 Mind Map의 구조를 만든다. 4. 복 습 : 알람이 공부할 시간에 공부할 내용을 알려준다 뛰어난 재능은 반복된 학습에서 비롯된다! 에빙하우스 망각곡선의 복습주기를 기본으로 하였으나, 당일 저녁, 3일, 15일은 경험적으로 추가되었다. 당일저녁복습은 꼭 필요해 보인다. 그러나 3일, 15일은 옵션(선택사항)이다. 각 학습자에게 어려운 과목이나 암기를 철저히 해야 하는 과목에 한하여 추가적으로 실행 하면 된다. Study Planner가 특별한 것은 고시생을 위해 3년의 복습주기로 설계 되었다는 것이다. 시간이 지날 수록 공부량이 줄어 들 것이다. '공부 할 수록, 공부량이 줄이 들지 않고, 더 많아진다'고 고민하는 수험생들에게 제격이다. 5. 음 악 : 바로크 음악으로 암기력과 집중력을 높인다 뇌를 깨우는 음악! 게오르기 로자노프 Georgi Lozanov의 초가속 암시학습법(슈퍼러닝 Super-learning, Suggestopeadia, 유네스코의 지원을 받은 바 있음)으로 암기력과 집중력을 높일수 있다. 경험상 졸음이 올 때 바로크 음악을 듣는 것이 커피를 마시는 것보다 효과적이다. 학습시간에 60Hz(비트)의 바로크 음악 특히 작곡가 '바흐'의 클래식을 들으면, 우리의 뇌를 세타파 상태로 만들어 암기를 잘 할 수 있게 한다. 휴식시간에는 학습자 각자가 좋아하는 빠른 비트의 휴식 음악을 들으며 가볍게 분위기를 전환시켜주면 좋다. '학습시간음악'의 리스트에 듣기 음원 파일을 등록하여 리스닝 연습용 어학기로도 활용 할 수 있다. 추천 학습시간음악 : 가) Corelli, Concerti Grossi, Op. 6, No. 2, 8, 5, 9. 나) Corelli, Concerti Grossi, Op. 4, No. 10, 11. 12. 다) Handel, The Water Music. 라) J.S. Bach, Fantasy in G major, Fantasy in C Minor and Trio in D minor; Canonic Variations and Toccata. 마) Vivaldi. Five Concertos for Flute and Chamber Orchestra. 6. 설 정 : 모든 초기값을 이 곳에서 세팅할 수 있다 나만의 맞춤 공부 설정하기! 학습시간, 휴식시간, 반복회수, 학습시간 음악, 휴식시간 음악. 특히, 하루중 복습시간을 정하는 '복습시작시간'과 복습 주기를 체크하는 '복습일정'은 자신만의 스타일로 설정하되, 차후 학습을 해 나가면서 자신에 맞게 조금씩 조정하여 최상의 학습 조건을 찾아으면 된다. 개발자 웹사이트 : www.StudyPlanner.kr 구글 플러스 : google.com/+Myfamilypark1
release_text: Ver 1.3 update 2014. 4. 24. 업그래이드 내용(1) 1.시간 계산 오류 수정 2014. 3. 21. 업그레이드의 주요 내용 1. 스마트 노트(사진) 삭제 기능 추가 : 메인 화면의 복습' 클릭 -> '삭제' 클릭 2. 시간 단위 변경 : 분단위 -> 초단위 (실전 문제풀이용) : 사용법 : '학습시간' -> '학습시작' -> '계속학습' (문제 수 만큼 클릭 3. '학습하기' 중 '이미지 추가' 없이 다음 단계로 '넘기기' 추가 : 학습 -> 휴식 -> 'SMART NOTE' 클릭 -> '넘기기' 클릭 4. 카운트 기능 개선 : 홈버튼이나 화면잠금 후 카운트 정지 및 지연 -> 정상 작동 5. 알림 기능 개선 : '무음' -> '깜빡임' : 조용해야 하는 곳(도서관)에서 사용하면 좋겠죠. 6. 음악 파일 : wma 재생 가능 (자신의 음원(바로크 클래식)을 선택하면 됨, 별도의 음원을 제공하지는 않음)

description: This app helps you to remind when you have to take your birth control pill. If you forget your pill sometimes, this app is for you. If you want, this app will put a notification in the notification bar to remind you that the time to take the pill has come and it will also ring an alarm for you. "Birth Control Pill Alarm" is a virtual pill pack where you mark the state of your real pill pack. It's very easy to use: -When you buy a pill pack, tap the plus button in the action bar or in the center of the screen and configure it. Enter the start date, the active days, the rest days and whether it has placebo pills for the rest days. -Now you can swipe left or right to see the pack you want. -Whenever you take the pill, tap the pill in the screen and select "take the pill". -When you finish a pack, you can delete the pack by tapping the cross button in the action bar. You can configure the alarm at any time tapping the button with a gear shape in the action bar (settings). You can make notes in any pill if you want to remember something related to that pill or that day. This app has some ads, and you can remove it upgrading it to premium. So the features are: * Notification reminder * Alarm reminder (chose any ringtone you want) * Vibrator * Repeat alarm until pill is taken * Taking Notes * Customizable number of pills * Can upgrade to "premium" to remove the ads

description: Brought to you by Subaru. Makes walking the dog fun and informative! Track the route, time, distance, speed, pace and calories in real-time for fitness activities using your GPS enabled mobile device. New for 2014: Map Pins show where to find dog parks, dog-friendly restaurants, water fountains, and the all-important waste bag dispensers! * If your phone supports it, you can now connect via Bluetooth 4.0 LE to a compliant Heart Rate strap. Currently, this will work for Droid RAZR users! Buy a strap in our online store: mapmyfitness.com/shop dog walk, dogwalk, walk the dog

description: Map My Fitness – Track Workouts, Running, Cycling, Walking, and Calorie Counter Get fit with the MapMyFitness community. Log over 600 different types of workouts; record GPS-based activities to view detailed stats; log on to the web to join Challenges, connect devices and view 24/7 activity data. ALL THE FEATURES YOU NEED TO SUCCEED ☆ Gear Tracker - Add your athletic shoes and start tracking mileage with Gear Tracker. Help yourself avoid common injuries and get notified when it’s time for a new pair. ☆ 600+ Activities - Log and record workouts with the largest selection of activities, including running, cycling, walking, gym workouts, cross training, yoga and tons of others. ☆ Workout Stats - Record GPS-based workouts with customizable voice feedback for precise stats like pace, route, distance, calorie burn, elevation profile and more. SHARE FITNESS & NUTRITION DATA ☆ Share Data - Sync your account with other health and nutrition apps like MyFitnessPal and Google Fit. TRAIN LIKE A PRO WITH MVP MEMBERSHIP ☆ Go MVP - Be a premium member for an ad-free experience and access special features like heart rate analysis, personal training plans, audio coaching, and Live Tracking. ☆ MVP Members Only - Enjoy exclusive offers and promotions from our partners. JOIN THE COMMUNITY ☆ Activity Feed - Share your progress and see what friends are doing on your Activity Feed. Whether you’re a beginner, casually active, looking to rededicate yourself to fitness or an athletic enthusiast, you’ll fit in perfectly with our 30+ million member strong community. ☆ Social - Share your progress and workouts with friends on social media. MORE FEATURES ON THE WEB ☆ 24/7 Activity Graph - Connect devices to view steps, sleep, workouts and more, all in one expertly designed graph. ☆ Import Data - We make it easy to connect and import data from the best activity tracking devices in the industry. Connect devices from Jawbone, Misfit, Fitbit, Garmin, Withings and more (Bluetooth Smart™ and ANT+™). ☆ Challenges - Join Challenges for some friendly, virtual competition, climb the leaderboards and win prizes. Be sure to visit us at www.MapMyFitness.com for the full experience. Should you choose to upgrade to MVP, payment will be charged to your Google Wallet account at confirmation of purchase. The monthly subscription costs USD 5.99 per month while the yearly subscription costs USD 29.99 per year or USD 2.50 per month. Subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. There is no increase in cost when renewing. Subscriptions can be managed and auto-renewal turned off on wallet.google.com and click on ‘Update or cancel your subscription’ on the Transactions page after purchase. Once purchased, the current period cannot be cancelled. Any unused portion of a free trial period is forfeited if you choose to purchase a subscription to MVP. Under Armour Connected Fitness powers the complete digital product suite of MapMyFitness, including MapMyRun, MapMyRide, MapMyWalk, MapMyHike, and the Under Armour Record app. Our mission is to make all athletes better by providing the digital connected fitness products they need to train, perform and improve. Find the full terms and conditions, and our privacy policy, at http://www.mapmyfitness.com/terms_of_use and http://about.mapmyfitness.com/about/user-privacy-policy/ respectively.

description: Organize your life! Get It Done is a simple but powerful to-do list and project manager. Sync wirelessly with GetItDoneApp.com or just use this mobile app to organize your tasks. Based off the book, “Getting Things Done” by David Allen, Get It Done lets you focus on what is important for today and keeps everything else out of your way. - Add notes, tags (or categories), and due dates to each task - Rearrange lists with ease - Filter lists with tags or categories - Assign more than one tag to a task - Organize advanced lists with projects - Sync wirelessly with online app (sold separately) at GetItDoneApp.com This app is a mobile version of GetItDoneApp.com. You can sync wirelessly with the online app (sold separately) or you can use just the mobile app alone. Check out what people are saying about Get It Done: “New and Noteworthy” - Apple "Great interface by the way. I have looked at a lot of online gtd systems and Get It Done looks very impressive so far." "I've been digging around the web looking at evert GTD app out there. I'm a web dev so I'm looking for a webby interface. I love this." "Are you kidding me?? This is sooo cooool!!!!!! You have made me a customer!!" "I love it, it's the best online task manager yet" Visit our website at GetItDoneApp.com for more information on how Get It Done can help you organize your life once and for all!
release_text: New Widget to view your tasks!

description: Manage It allows your team to work on the same projects so there’s never a question of “Do you have this task on your list?” or “Did you finish the task yet?” Updates are synchronized to your team’s phones, tablets, and computers in real time. Give Manage It a try! It’s free to use up to two projects and unlimited users. Manage It can help you with: - Real-time Collaboration - See the same tasks that the rest of your team sees. Everyone in your team can see tasks get updated and checked off in real time. - Customization - Create task lists that make sense to you. It’s easy to create tasks and subtasks (and more subtasks under that). You can rearrange the order by simply dragging and dropping. - Private and Shared projects - You decide who can see which projects or keep projects completely private. - Portability - Access your projects wherever and whenever you want: tablet, phone, or computer. - Calendar View - Set due dates for your tasks and view them in a calendar format. - Attachments - Keep your information together by adding file attachments, images, links, and cloud files to your tasks and projects. Attach Evernote, Google Drive, Dropbox, Box, and OneDrive files, or upload your own files and photos. - People View - See an overview of what everyone is working on. - Reminders - Receive daily emails formatted with what's on the agenda for the day. - Search - Can’t find a task? Use the easy Search feature that will quickly find your tasks and attachments. - Chat - You can have a chat session over each task and keep the recorded conversation linked to the task for future reference. No need to dig into email threads. And much more! Manage It is free up to 2 projects. Customer feedback: “I love Manage It. There is no longer a question of what everyone in my company is working on. I can see everyone’s progress and I get an email when they finish a task I assigned them. ”
release_text: NEW! Company Activity Feed NEW! Duplicate tasks NEW! Updated calendar NEW! Subscribe to iCal feed of your tasks My tasks calendar and activity dashboards Undo support Archive Projects Dashboard of all the people in your company Attach OneDrive files to your projects and tasks Calendar overview of all your projects Take a photo and attach it to a task. Attach files and photos to a project

description: Become the King or Queen of block smashing in Fantasy Breaker! Keep your mighty wrecking balls moving to destroy all the obstacles in your path! Grab your mighty wrecking balls and lay siege to a medieval world filled with fantastic characters, colossal castles and magnificent monsters! Fantasy Breaker brings classic brick-smashing action kicking and screaming into the 15th Century with more destruction than you can shake a crossbow at! Forests, fortresses, towns, towers and more are all waiting to be mercilessly demolished in this addictive, arcade-style smash ‘em up. Features: - Highly detailed graphics: lay waste to your enemies in Fantasy Breaker’s full-colour, high definition world - More than 100 unique levels filled with danger, destruction and treasure - Fantastic characters: face off against knights, wizards, goblins, cyclops, pirates and many more! - Amazing power-ups: Cause even more destruction with an arsenal of upgrades including speed boosts, protective ropes and crossbows - Unlockable achievements! - Online Leaderboards to compare your skills against the world
release_text: v1.4.0 - Scoreloop is replaced with our own online high score system.

app_name: 聖 經 繁體中文和合本 China Bible
description: Chinese Bible Chinese Bible Read the Holy Bible in Chinese (Taiwan, Hong Kong, Macau) - Browse the books, chapters and verses. - Reading plans: Multiple reading plans for reading the Bible in 30, 45, 60, 90, 180 or 365 days. (Free/PRO) - Continue reading from the last verse you have read with a single click! - (NEW) Desktop Widget: read random verses every hour. - Settings section to easily configure the application. - Swipe from left to right to read the previous chapter/plan or drag from right to left to read the next chapter/plan. - Refurbished ActionBar design. Specially designed for tablets. - Copy verses to clipboard - New icon pack (renewed) - Search for terms clicking the search icon. You can search within whole Bible, a Testament, a Book or even a Chapter. - A long press over a verse will add it to favourites or let you share it on social media and messaging apps. - Browse your favourite verses. - You can delete each one of them making a long press. In order to get more features, purchase PRO version (聖 經 繁體中文和合本 China Bible PRO) - Read the Bible in landscape / horizontal or vertical. - All reading plans available - Three modes of contrast for easy reading: Day, night and sepia. - No ads. - Improved speed.
release_text: - Desktop Widget: read random verses every hour. - Improved Settings section: new parameters added. - UI improvements. - New reading plan available. - Corrections in some verses.

description: Bibbia in italiano - Facilità di accesso a versetti, classificati in Testamenti, Libri e Capitoli. - Testo RIVEDUTA 1927 (ITRIV). - Piani di lettura: più piani di lettura per leggere la Bibbia in 30, 45, 60, 90, 180 o 365 giorni. (Free/PRO) - Continua a leggere dall'ultimo versetto con un solo click! - (NUOVO) Desktop Widget: leggere i versetti casuali ogni ora. - Sezione Impostazioni per configurare facilmente l'applicazione. - Swipe da sinistra a destra per andare al precedente capitolo/piano e da destra a sinistra per passare al capitolo/piano successivo. - Rinnovato disegno con ActionBar. Appositamente progettato per le tavolette. - Copia versi negli appunti - Nuovo icon pack (rinnovato) - Navigazione tra capitoli. - Aggiunge versi favoriti. - Gestione centralizzata dei favoriti per una rapida accesso. - Condividi versetti sui social network e applicazioni di messaggistica. - Recerca all'interno di un capitolo (o un libro, o un testamento, o tutta la Bibbia) - Verse casuale in Home. - Dimensione dei caratteri configurabile per una facile lettura. Per ulteriori funzionalità, acquistare la versione "Bibbia in italiano PRO" - Tre modalità di contrasto per una facile lettura: giorno, notte e seppia. - Tutti i piani di lettura attivato. - Leggere la Bibbia in modalità orizzontale o verticale. - Nessun annuncio. - Maggiore velocità. Bible in Italian - Easy access to verses, classified Testaments, Books and Chapters. - Text REVISED 1927 (ITRIV). - Plans read more reading levels to read the Bible in 30, 45, 60, 90, 180 or 365 days. (Free / PRO) - Read the last verse with just one click! - (NEW) Desktop Widgets: read verses random every hour. - Section settings to easily configure the application. - Swipe from left to right to go to the previous chapter / floor and from right to left to move to the next chapter / next floor. - Renewed design with ActionBar. Specially designed for tablets. - Copy verse to clipboard - New icon pack (renewed) - Navigation between chapters. - Adds verses favorites. - Centralized management of the favorites for quick access. - Share verses on social networks and messaging applications. - Recerca within a chapter (or a book, or a will, or the entire Bible) - Random Verse in Home. - Font size configurable for easy reading. For more features, please buy the "Bible in Italian PRO" - Three modes of contrast for easy reading: day, night and sepia. - All reading levels activated. - Read the Bible in landscape or portrait mode. - No ads. - Faster.
release_text: - Desktop Widget: leggere i versetti casuali ogni ora. - Migliorata la sezione Impostazioni: nuovi parametri aggiunti. - Miglioramenti dell'interfaccia utente. - Nuovo piano di lettura disponibile. - Corretto errore sulla lettura piano che ha causato crash.

description: Русская Библия - Священное Писание - Полностью на русском языке, включает в себя весь текст Ветхого и Нового Завета. - Планы чтения: несколько планов чтения, чтобы прочесть Библию за 30, 45, 60, 90 или 365 дней. (Free/PRO) - Обновленный дизайн с панелью ActionBar. Специальный дизайн для планшетов. - (НОВОЕ) Desktop Widget: читать случайные стихи каждый час. - Установки секции легко настроить приложение. - Сделайте слайд слева направо для чтения предыдущей главы или плана. Сделайте слайд справа налево для чтения следующей главы или плана. - Копируйте стихи в буфер обмена. - Обновленный набор иконок. - Для загрузки Библии не нужно подключение к сети Интернет! (за исключением тех случаев, когда Вы хотите поделиться стихом в социальных сетях). - Выбирайте Ваши любимые стихи и легко находите их впоследствии. - На главном экране появляется произвольно выбранный стих дня - Различные возможности поиска: поиск по всей Библии, поиск в одном Завете, поиск в одной Книге, поиск по дню Плана или по конкретной главе. Слово, которое Вы ищете, будет выделено жирным шрифтом в найденных стихах. - Стихами, которые для Вас важны, можно поделиться через приложения для обмена сообщениями и через социальные сети. - Размер шрифта можно изменять, что делает чтение более легким и удобным. РАСШИРЕННЫЕ ВОЗМОЖНОСТИ в ПРОФЕССИОНАЛЬНОЙ версии - Читайте Библию в горизонтальном или вертикальном формате. - Доступны все планы чтения. - Три режима оформления для более легкого чтения: дневной, ночной и сепия. - Без рекламы. - Более быстрая работа. Russian Bible - Scriptures - Fully in Russian, includes the entire text of the Old and New Testaments. - Reading Plans: several reading plans to read the Bible for 30, 45, 60, 90 or 365 days. (Free / PRO) - Updated design with panel ActionBar. Special design for tablets. - (NEW) Desktop Widget: random read poems every hour. - Settings section to easily configure the application. - Make a slide from left to right to read the last chapter or plan. Make a slide from right to left to read the next chapter or plan. - Copy verses to the clipboard. - Updated icons. - To download the Bible do not need an Internet connection! (Except for those occasions when you want to share a verse in social networks). - Choose your favorite verses and easily find them later. - On the Home screen appears randomly selected verse of the day - Different search options: search the entire Bible in one search Testament, searching in a book, search by day plan or a specific chapter. The word that you are looking for will be highlighted in bold in the found poetry. - Poems that are important to you, you can share via messaging applications and through social networks. - You can change the font size that makes reading easier and more convenient. Opportunity PROFESSIONAL version - Read the Bible in a horizontal or vertical format. - Available all the reading plans. - Three modes of registration for easier reading: day, night and sepia. - No advertising. - Faster work.
release_text: - Desktop Widget: читать случайные стихи каждый час. - Улучшены раздел Настройки: новые параметры. - Усовершенствования пользовательского интерфейса. - Новый план чтения доступны. - Исправлена ошибка при чтении план, который вызвал сбой.

description: Deutsche Luther Bibel - Die Deutsche Luther Bibel: Altes und neues Testament (LUTH1545) - Lesepläne: Besondere Lesepläne um die Bibel in 30, 45, 60, 90, 180 oder 365 Tagen zu lesen (manche davon gibt es nur in der PRO version). - Weiterlesen vom zuletzt gelesenen Vers durch nur einen Klick! - (NEU) Desktop Widget: Lesen zufällige Verse jede Stunde. - Einstellungen zur einfachen Konfiguration der Anwendung. - Swipe von links nach rechts, um zum vorherigen Kapitel/Plan oder von rechts nach links, um zum nächsten Kapitel/Plan. - Neues Design durch ein Aktionsmenü. Spezielles Layout für Tablet-PCs. - Verse in die Zwischenablage kopieren. - Neue Icons. - Die Bibel Offline lesen. Es ist keine Internetverbindung notwendig! (Es sei denn Verse werden mit einem sozialen Netzwerk geteilt/ Messaging App). - Einfaches anlegen und aufrufen von Lesezeichen. - Zufälliger Vers auf dem Startbildschirm. - Kontextabhängige Suche: Suche innerhalb der ganzen Bibel, einem Testament, einem Buch, einem Kapitel oder innerhalb eines Tages von dem Bibelleseplan. Der Suchausdruck wird innerhalb des Suchergebnisses markiert. - Teile Verse in Sozialen Netzwerken / Messaging Apps. - Ändern der Schriftgröße für ein komfortables Lesen. Mehr Features in der kommerziellen Version "Deutsche Luther Bibel PRO" - Lese die Bibel in Quer- oder horizontalem Format. - Alle Lesepläne verfügbar. - Für ein einfacheres Lesen gibt es drei Kontrastmodi: Tagesmodus, Nachtmodus, Sepia Modus. - Keine Werbung. - Verbesserte Geschwindigkeit. German Luther Bible - The German Luther Bible: Old and New Testament (LUTH1545) - Reading Plans: Special Reading Plans to read the Bible in 30, 45, 60, 90, 180 or 365 days (some of which are only available in the Pro version). -
release_text: - Desktop Widget: Lesen zufällige Verse jede Stunde. - Verbesserte Abschnitt Einstellungen: neue Parameter hinzugefügt. - Verbesserungen der Benutzeroberfläche. - Neue Leseplan zur Verfügung. - Behoben: Fehler bei Leseplan, die verursacht Absturz.

description: Türkçe Kur'an-ı Kerim - Read the Holy Quran in Turkish - Resume reading from the last verse you have read with a single click! - (NEW) Prayer reminders: subscribe to notifications of your local prayer times. Auto-setup available. - Settings section to easily configure the app. - Swipe form left to right to go to the previous surah or from right to left to go to the next surah. - New design with ActionBar! - Copy ayat to clipboard. - Resume the audio playback from any ayat. - Browse suras, Ajiza' and ayat. - Search by clicking on search icon. You can search in the whole Quran, in a Juz or in any surah. - A long click over a verse will add it to bookmarks, share it on social media or messaging apps, or attach notes to it. - Listen to the arab recitation - by Abdullah Basfar- inside each surah. - Audio Manager to easily download and delete the recitations. - Note section: read all your notes at once. Limitations of the free version * The search function returns only the first 50 results. * You can add up to 5 favorites. * Non-intrusive ads. * Download recitations surah by surah. Extra fetures of the PRO version (Türkçe Kur'an-ı Kerim PRO) * For a comfortable read, choose between three different contrast modes: default, green or black & white. * Read Quran in portrait or landscape modes. * The search returns all matches. * Unlimited favorites. * No ads. * Improved speed. * Download all recitations with a single click.

Limitations of the free version * The search function displays the first 50 results. * You can add up to 5 favorites. * Non-intrusive ads. * Download recitations surah by surah. Functionality of the professional version (Quran Hindi PRO) * For a comfortable reading, choose between three different contrast modes: default, green or black & white. * Read Quran in portrait or landscape modes. * The search returns all matches. * Unlimited favorites. * No ads. * Improved speed. * Download all recitations with a single click.
release_text: - Prayer reminders: subscribe to notifications of your local prayer times. Auto-setup available.

description: Dominate your Draft with Draft Assistant. Top 50 Apps on iPhone and iPad App Store - August 10, 2013. Featured as #3 in Android Sprint App Store Downloads Page Easy Sort by position or by MFL Top 300 Draft selection based on 100k+ Fantasy Football Players. Features: • Simple UI • Simple Intuitive Touch Controls • Easy Drag and Drop Add to My Team • Easy Drag and Drop Add to Drafted List • Fast updates • Sort by Position • Search by Name • Quick View of Draft Pool • Store multiple Draft Teams Be prepared to draft the best players at anytime during your draft for myfantasyleague.com, ESPN.com, yahoo.com, or cbssportline.com. Fantasy Football Draft Assistant 2013 App by Marvel Apps LLC fresh new unique user interface to managing your fantasy football draft blows the competition away by making the content easily consumable for playing in your fantasy football league. This fresh take allows the user to easily make quick decisions by swiping among the top players as projected by MyFantasyLeague.com (MFL) 100,000 leagues. One can view the entire Top 300 players projections or organize the players by position.  As soon as the user find who is looking for, its a simple swipe up to add him to his team. Fantasy Football Draft Assistant is organized in 3 rows.  The Top Row is your selection of players on draft night.  The Bottom row is the players drafted by other fantasy teams in your league.  Separating the two rows is the pool of the Top 300 MyFantasyLeague.com NFL Players ranked in order (1-300).  This is an aggregated list of the Top NFL Players drafted over 100,000 MFL Fantasy Football leagues.  MFL is known throughout the Fantasy Sports industry as one of the most comprehensive Fantasy Tools on the market. MFL users range from die-hard FFB players to casual players. According to the Fantasy Sports Trade Association (FSTA), the collection of hundreds of influential fantasy sports companies in the industry.   In 2008, 2010 and 2011, The MyFantasyLeague.com was awarded the Top Fantasy Tools -Fantasy Commissioner, League Manager PRoducts from all of the FSTA.  An honor that has been only given to 2 companies over the past 6 years, CBSSports.com and MyFantasyLeague.com. With the unique developers API from MFL, Fantasy Football Draft Assistant was created. Knowing players name is typical, but being face to face with player profile pictures tells a different story.  A story that gives every fantasy football player an edge in the draft. As the saying goes, a picture is worth a thousand words.  Well with Draft Assistant, relating faces with names and names with faces could not be easier.  Everyone experiences making decisions with the very best information in a short amount of time. Users will select NFL player on a personal level since he has seen his picture before other news or articles. Simply knowing if the player is injured is the one of the most important aspect of Draft night. Fantasy Football Draft Assistant simple view of injury reports have red crossed band-aids as a layer over the players profile picture.  For more details, a quick summary labeled in red is shown below the players name.  This provides a comprehensive view if the user should draft the player. The UI of Fantasy Football Draft Assistant is designed to be Clutter free to satisfy that 10 second need to know who to select during my Live Fantasy Draft.  Swipe up is my team, swipe down means he’s not available.

description: Ever wonder what the capital of Tennessee is or what the flag of New York looks like? Find out this information and more with the US States app! US States contains very basic information for each of the 50 states of America, such as the capital city, time zones, and population. It also shows the location of the state capital. This is a free app with no advertisements! **************** This is a demo app that accompanies the source code that can be found here: https://github.com/marwfair/USStates . Its purpose is to demonstrate how to load bitmaps efficiently in Android, especially very large ones. ****************

description: Ingenious! Very simple rules, just getting you addicted to the game – there's really no more ingenious thing to do! PLAY ONE OF THE WORLD's MOST SUCCESSFUL BOARD GAMES! Millions of players worldwide have either played Reiner Knizia's award winning strategy game in the original board game format or on one of the online sites in the 10 years since launch of the board game. INGENIOUS is HOURS of SHEER FUN. The already addictive nature of the Ingenious board game is greatly enhanced on the Android phone, giving the user a really exciting- and graphically stimulating-experience every time. Build lines of colour tiles, try and block your opponent, and remember that the winner isn't necessarily the player with the highest scores in only a few colours! You must excel in all your colours. EASY ACCESS. The rules are really easy to learn and a comprehensive tutorial will introduce you to the game. Within minutes you'll be playing effortlessly, even as a first time player of the game. YOU'LL NEED STRATEGY to beat the AI opponents. But you have a choice of easy, medium or hard. You choose! And the app will record your best scores and best performances. There is room for up to 3 different player profiles. PLAY TOURNAMENTS if you are feeling competitive. You can also choose to play against the clock in some of the rounds. PLAY the SOLITAIRE game: This is a seriously satisfying feature! Instead of playing against opponents you use all your skills to create a really high score. ***** Available languages: English, German, French, Spanish ***** FIND US: Facebook.com/pages/INGENIOUS SEE THE VIDEO on Facebook and YouTube! VISIT US: www.ingeniousgame.com Suggestions for improvements and feature requests? Mail to android@usm.de . We are looking forward to your feedback!
release_text: - Improved replay option - Various smaller optimizations

description: MasterCard® Controle CARTÕES ELEGÍVEIS. O cadastramento de MasterCard Controle está atualmente disponível para cartões CAIXA. Em breve este serviço será ampliado para outros emissores. SUAS COMPRAS NO SEU RADAR Agora você não vai mais perder de vista as transações que realiza no dia a dia com seus cartões MasterCard. O MasterCard Controle oferece segurança e controle de despesas em tempo real. Tudo fica no seu radar. São diferentes tipos de alertas, enviados via e-mails ou push em seu smartphone, que facilitam o controle do uso de seus cartões e de seus adicionais de uma forma rápida, fácil e segura. E para sua maior segurança, você ainda pode contar com Números de Cartões Virtuais que protegem os dados dos seus cartões de crédito reais nas compras pela internet ou pelo telefone. Confira. RECEBA OS ALERTAS DO MASTERCARD® CONTROLE Você pode definir 4 tipos de alertas para cada cartão cadastrado: • Controle de Orçamento: saiba quando seu gasto acumulado no mês ultrapassar o valor estabelecido por você. • Alerta de Compras: receba quando uma compra for realizada acima do valor que você escolheu. • Alerta de Compras pela Internet ou pelo Telefone: saiba quando seus cartões forem usados em lojas na Internet ou em compras pelo telefone. • Alerta de Compras Internacionais: para quando seus cartões forem usados no exterior. CRIE NÚMEROS DE CARTÕES VIRTUAIS Proteja seu cartão de crédito: utilize números de Cartões de Crédito Virtuais para realizar compras pela Internet ou pelo telefone. Você mesmo define o valor máximo de compras e a data de validade de cada um deles. Assim, não expõe o seu cartão de crédito real e fica mais seguro, sabendo que nenhuma compra será feita após a data de validade e nem acima do valor já estabelecido. Todas as compras efetuadas com um Cartão Virtual serão direcionadas para o seu cartão MasterCard cadastrado. Você poderá conferir todas as suas compras realizadas nos últimos 60 dias no Histórico de Compras do MasterCard Controle.
release_text: Novidades no seu Aplicativo! -Acompanhe seu gasto vs. orçamento. Veja em “Orçamento” no menu de navegação. -Acompanhe seus gastos por categoria de comércio. Veja em “Por Categoria” em Compras Recentes. -Acompanhe seus alertas por tipo de alerta. Veja por “Por Tipo” em Alertas Recentes.

description: MasterCard Nearby™ is a next generation mobile app from MasterCard. Building on the features of the ATM Hunter and PayPass Locator, Nearby offers additional services and improved functionality. Whether you’re looking for a place to use your contactless device, reload your prepaid card, get cash back with your purchase, or use an ATM - MasterCard Nearby can help. • Locate two million ATMs worldwide with 30 street level and 210 city level countries and territories with our ATM Locator functionality. • Find contactless acceptance locations worldwide where you can make everyday purchases quickly and safely with just a tap of your contactless-enabled MasterCard® or Maestro® card or device. • Seek out cash back at participating U.S. merchant locations when you make a purchase using your debit or prepaid card. • Search for over 100,000 participating merchants in the U.S. where you can add money to your eligible MasterCard® or Maestro® prepaid card using the MasterCard® rePowerTM network. Even when you’re far from home, MasterCard is always nearby.
release_text: • Improved look and feel, usability and navigation. • New report a problem capability for cash back and MasterCard rePower® locations. • Additional MasterCard rePower® details including load types and fees. • Linkage to MasterCard App Launchpad for easy viewing and download of other MasterCard apps. Click on the Other Apps icon from the map or list view.

description: Pre-Algebra calc brings a simple way to check your answers and get help with Math. It was designed to help adults returning to college but would be great for anyone taking a pre-algebra course. It has formulas to help you solve equations as well as calculators. This program will do: • Rounding numbers to a specified place • Solve trinomial equations and factor basic ones • There is a calculator • Will find the “Least Common Multiple” and the “Greatest Common Divisor” of two numbers • Will solve linear equations • Solves the basic Graphing formulas o Slope, equation of a line, distance, midpoint, x and y intercepts • Change percent to decimal or fraction • Will solve perimeter and area for basic shapes • Will do the FOIL method on binomials
release_text: Updated the Calculator: Added more features, does inequalities and other algebra functions

description: MathAlly Graphing Calculator is quickly becoming the most comprehensive free Graphing, Symbolic, and Scientific Calculator for Android. Here are some of our current features: Basics: -Enter values and view results as you would write them -Swipe up, down, left, or right to quickly switch between keyboard pages. -Long click on keyboard key to bring up dialog about key. -Undo and Redo keys to easily fix mistakes. -Cut, Copy, and Paste. -User defined functions with f, g, h Symbolic Calculator: -Simplify and Factor algebra expressions. -Polynomial long division. -Solve equations for a variable. -Solve equations with inequalities such as > and < -Solve systems of equations. -Simplify trigonometric expressions using trigonometric identities. Graphing: -Graph three equations at once. -View equations on graph or in table format. -Normal functions such as y=x^2 -Inverse functions such as x=y^2 -Circles such as y^2+x^2=1 -Ellipses, Hyperbola, Conic Sections. -Inequalities -Logarithmic scaling -Add markers to graph to view value at given point. -View delta and distance readings between markers on graph. -View roots and intercepts of traces on graph. -Regression Calculus: -Differentiation. -Definite integration. Other Features: -Complex numbers -Hyperbolic functions -nCr and nPr functions -Change numeric base between binary, octal, decimal, and hexadecimal -Bitwise operators AND, OR, XOR, and NOT -Matrices. -Vector dot product and norm. FAQ’s Q. Is there are tutorial anywhere explaining how to use the graphing calculator? A. There are three into tutorials in the app for the calculator, graph equations, and graph screens. Additional tutorials can be found on our website http://www.mathally.com/ Q. How do I get to the keys for pi, e, solve, etc? A. There are four keyboard pages. Each swipe direction across the keyboard moves you to a different page. The default page is the swipe down page. To get to the page with trig functions, swipe left. To get to the matrix keys, swipe up. To get to the last page, swipe right. No matter what page you are on, the swipe direction to move to a specific page is always the same. Q. What do you have planned for future releases? A. You can keep up to date on the latest news on our blog at http://mathally.blogspot.com/ . This news will include what is coming up in future releases. Also feel free to leave comments and let me know what you think! If you find a bug or have questions, please email me. Math Ally
release_text: -Added Correlation Coefficient reading to Regression Graphing -Replaced Scientific Notation settings with Numeric Notation Setting. This setting can be changed between Normal Decimal, Scientific, and Engineering. -Bug Fixes For a complete list of changes see http://mathally.com/version_history.php

Challenge and upgrade your algebra skills while having mega fun playing a game that takes you through intermediate algebra practice including factoring, polynomials, rational expressions, all the way to sequences and series and even matrix manipulation and calculation!! College level questions get you ready for ACT, SAT and GCSE tests while you train your math brain!!!

Join thousands of precalculus students who love to use games + learning to prepare for algebra, trigonometry, geometry and calculus. description: Manage your financial needs on the go! The Riskflow Cashflow application allows beginners and novices to log-on on a mobile device, tablet or the web and manage their financial needs anytime and anywhere. It has an easy to use interface that allows a user to add their values and assumptions for income, expenses, assets, debt or resources and then it calculates your results and displays them on your income statement, balance sheet and cash flow statement. The results can be viewed either month-to-month or year-to-year for a 5 year period. There are many features: selecting specific assumptions and adding multiple entries to get the desired results. All statements can be shared via email. There are 2 versions of the application available. CFO4i (Cash Flow Optimiser for Individuals) is purely created for an individual that wants to manage his or her own personal assets, income, expenses & liabilities. CFO4b (Cash Flow Optimiser for Business) is focused on the financials of a business and provides more features, such as staff, stock turnover, aging of debtors and creditors. Both applications are available for a 14 day trial period. For more information see http://app.riskflow.net

description: Download Silent Scheduler if you have ever missed an important call because your ringer was off. Most people forget their phone on silent. Now you can set the start and end time for your phone to be on silent automatically. When the silent period of time has passed, your ringer will be automatically turned back On. Unlike other apps, Silent Scheduler allows you to set a different start and end time for each day and automatically silences your phone based on your weekly schedule (UNLIMITED NUMBER OF SCHEDULES). Silent Scheduler also includes an ON/OFF WIDGET. You can create event schedules which can be saved (for example: save a schedule for the whole week when you are working, and save another schedule for when you are on holiday). Includes On/Off widget for Silent Mode which you need to add to your home screen. Supported in 20 languages: 中文（繁體）, Čeština, Dansk, Deutsch, Español, Français, 日本語, 한국어, हिन्दी, עברית, Italiano, Magyar, Nederlands, Norsk, Polski, Português, Pусский, Suomi, Svenska, عربي NOTE: If you wish to add exceptions to let important callers through when on silent, or to block unknown or unwanted callers, then download Advanced Silent Mode by Matrix Mobile Applications. Please contact our team if you have any problems/suggestions: info@matrixmobileapplications.com Keywords: silent scheduler, silent mode, automatic silent, silent widget, scheduler, event, event schedule, silent call, silent text, quiet call, silent, quiet, ringer, duration, widget, unlimited schedules, advanced silent mode.

description: NO push notifications NO spyware, NO malware Free bonus - cracked glass and squashed mosquitoes backgrounds. Active live wallpaper showing the downward-flowing green characters, letters and numerals that are representing the code that comprises the Matrix itself, also known as digital rain. A great application for all Matrix fans and those who miss early monochrome monitors. After the download you don't need internet connection to enjoy the application. This free app is ad supported. This application will not download videos from the internet. Download once and enjoy for ever. Note: Application can not be moved to SD card. Application is a live wallpaper, to access it on your phone, read your phone manual. Application is intended for display in portrait mode, it will work in landscape mode but display may not be optimal. Rotating the device while in preview of live wallpaper may cause application to crash. Application does not require internet access for primary usage, however internet connection may be required to access some functions (for instance link to More free apps and similar).

description: Hip Hop Air Horn lets you instantly add endless amounts of swag to any song on your Android phone! Just load a song, and press the "Swag Out!" button to unleash the ultimate in remixing coolness. With Hip Hop Air Horn, you could find yourself impressing: Your parents! Your friends! Your kids! Your pets! Your boss! Fellow bus passengers! Fellow subway passengers! Your cab driver! Your music producer! The possibilities are endless! NOTE: Hi everyone! Thank you all very much for your support of Hip Hop Air Horn. It's been forever since I've looked at this page and I was very happy (and surprised!) to see all of the awesome reviews. I would love to provide an update to all of you kind folks, but I have unfortunately lost the source code to Hip Hop Air Horn. But with all bad news, is some good news: It's very likely that I will be putting out an update as a new app – built from scratch with all kinds of silly new features – later this year. I'll provide a link to the new version here when it's ready! Swag on! -Matt

description: Match Up Fruits Memory Game is a Fantastic game to train your memory.Memory Test is perfect for kids to learn fruit and numbers and for fully grown people to keep trained the memory. ★ONLINE SCORE ★HD GRAPHICS ★FANTASTIC MUSIC AND SOUND Match Up Fruits Memory Game includes tre addictive games: ★Number Game When you start to play a set of random numbers will appear on the screen. Then a keypad will appear to ask you the set of random numbers. The set of random numbers increases after each round. ★Fruit Game ( The classic Memory ) When you start twenty cards will appear on the screen. Touching the cards you can see the fruit drawn on them. The target is to match the cards with the same fruit in the shortest possible time. ★Letters Game When you start to play some letters will appear on the screen. Then you have some seconds to learn the position of the letters. When the time ends you have to touch in alphabetical order the letters in the less time you can.

description: Mountaineering or mountain climbing is the sport, hobby or profession of hiking, skiing, and climbing mountains. While mountaineering began as attempts to reach the highest point of unclimbed mountains, it has branched into specialisations that address different aspects of the mountain and consists of three areas: rock-craft, snow-craft and skiing, depending on whether the route chosen is over rock, snow or ice. All require experience, athletic ability, and technical knowledge to maintain safety. This field manual details techniques soldiers and leaders must know to cope with mountainous terrain. These techniques are the foundation upon which the mountaineer must build. They must be applied to the various situations encountered to include river crossings, glaciers, snow-covered mountains, ice climbing, rock climbing, and urban vertical environments. *** This application is completely based on the United States MILITARY MOUNTAINEERING Field Manual FM 3-97.61. *** Features ******** - Both Portrait and Landscape modes are supported. Landscape mode is preferred for better reading experience. - Zooming is supported in order to see the text/images better. List of Contents **************** CHAPTER 1. MOUNTAIN TERRAIN, WEATHER, AND HAZARDS CHAPTER 2. MOUNTAIN LIVING CHAPTER 3. MOUNTAINEERING EQUIPMENT CHAPTER 4. ROPE MANAGEMENT AND KNOTS CHAPTER 5. ANCHORS CHAPTER 6. CLIMBING CHAPTER 7. ROPE INSTALLATIONS CHAPTER 8. MOUNTAIN WALKING TECHNIQUES CHAPTER 9 MOUNTAIN STREAM CROSSING CHAPTER 10. MOVEMENT OVER SNOW AND ICE CHAPTER 11. MOUNTAIN RESCUE AND EVACUATION APPENDIX A. LEVELS OF MILITARY MOUNTAINEERING APPENDIX B. MEASUREMENT CONVERSION FACTORS APPENDIX C. AVALANCHE SEARCH AND RESCUE TECHNIQUES Note: Ad supported application. For ad free version buy Mountaineering Pro

description: The Let's Master English podcast is for ESL (English as a Second Language) learners! This podcast has many features--news, Q&A, English learning advice and other fun sections. You can join the Let's Master English community on Google+ and see the full transcripts as in this app. Transcripts are made by you, the listeners! I hope you enjoy my podcasts. The first part will be news. I’ll give you a headline or an interesting story, something that’s not too serious, and you’re going to learn some vocabulary, some pronunciation. And hopefully, it improves your listening skills; The next section will be Q & A – questions and answers. In this section, I’ll take your questions and I’ve already have a lot of them. And I do my best to answer them; And the final section will be English tips, advice on how you can study English, according to the title of the Podcast, I’ll guess that your goal is to master English. And that’s the Podcast number one for Let’s Master English. Once again, my name is Coach Shane. . I hope you enjoy the Podcast. I’m very curious as to whether you like it, how were your criticisms, your comments, and I’d also like to tell you there will be a transcript. Everything I said you can read it. And I will put this on my website and in this app. Thank you for listening! I really hope to hear your feedback! I’ll be back again next week and Let’s Master English! Coach Shane

description: -------------------- UPDATE (March 24, 2014): This application is now 100% free, no more in-app purchases to activate any features! If you have an older version of the application, please un-install and re-install the latest version. All options should now be activated by default. -------------------- Your flashcards in your pocket! Study anytime, anywhere! Create and organize your flashcards from your device, or browse and download any of the hundreds of thousands of publicly available flashcards. Private access is supported so you can log-in to your (Quizlet, FlashcardExchange, StudyStack, Braineos, or Google) account and import your flashcards for offline viewing. Convenient! Features: - Flashcards are stored in your device for offline viewing - Flashcard images are supported - Intuitive card swipe navigation - Animated card flipping - Smart Study Mode - Customizable look and feel Web Services Supported (Unlocked via an In-App Purchase): - quizlet.com - flashcardexchange.com - studystack.com - docs.google.com - braineos.com Support: For support, bug reports, or feature requests, please email inc.snapshots@gmail.com . If you like the app, please give it a rating in the Android Market. Share the app with your friends and collaborate on creating and sharing flashcards! -------------------- RESPONSE TO USER COMMENTS: @jols: Pictures are fully supported in Quizlet. You might not see them immediately after importing them as they are still being downloaded in the background. Also, reversing the card sides is supported (answers first then questions). Just press the menu button on your device and you should see that option. -------------------- DEVICE-SPECIFIC PROBLEMS: - Samsung Infuse 4G (SGH-I997): Under investigation: Force-close issues.

description: When connecting your Android device to an external USB or Bluetooth keyboard a US-English layout may be used as default. Use this app to get support for additional keyboard layouts or to switch between different keyboard layouts. The way of using the app depends on your system. For Android up to 4.0 (Ice Cream Sandwich) the app adds to your device a new input method "External Keyboard" that needs to be enabled in the settings first. Afterwards you can switch between internal and external keyboard as needed. Please follow the on-screen instructions shown by the app. For Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean) and newer physical keyboards are already supported by the system and can be configured in the system settings. A corresponding notification will be shown if you connect a keyboard. In this case please do not use the input method "External Keyboard". The app provides additional keyboard layouts to the system. Please take a look at the screenshots for hints on how to use the app on different versions of Android. The app is compatible with many Android devices and keyboards made by MEDION®. Owners of a MEDION® LIFETAB® do not need to install the app, because it comes preinstalled. Should the app not work as expected with your MEDION® device or your MEDION® keyboard, please let us know. You can either contact us or write a review including the product information and a short problem desciption. Please note: The input method "External Keyboard" requires a MEDION® device or a MEDION® keyboard in order to work properly. If your combination of device and keyboard is supported this is being indicated by a green checkmark in the settings.
release_text: Update to version 2.3: - Solved problems using CAPS LOCK. - Solved problems detecting Bluetooth keyboard on a Google Nexus 7. - Integrated support for Android 4.1 (Jelly Bean) and newer.

description: "A Must Have! I have suffered with very bad anxiety for years and this app has been a wonderful help." --rallylou, app user This application by Meditation Oasis™ contains a unique approach to relieving anxiety and worry which combines voice-guided breathing meditations, exercises and journaling. At Ease is intended to make deep and lasting change rather than applying a temporary “band aid”. Most people will experience immediate relief using the guided breathing meditations, but the long term benefit of At Ease will come from using the breathing meditations, exercises and journaling regularly over time. GUIDED BREATHING MEDITATIONS "I was extremely impatient and nervous and my breath became short and quick. I used the “breath aware” guided meditation on the At Ease App and felt an almost immediate relief of my nervousness. Many thanks for designing this application with wonderful guided meditations and sweet instrumental music." --Eleanor The meditations are the core of the At Ease program. When we are anxious, our breathing becomes shallow and constricted. You will learn to deal with anxiety by breathing in an easy, natural way that makes you feel more relaxed. In addition, the meditations will also train you to let go of worry and find the pleasure in breathing. At Ease contains three easy, effective breathing meditations: -- Deep Breathing Guided Meditation -- Breath Awareness Guided Meditation -- Belly Breathing Guided Meditation MUSIC: You can listen to the meditations with or without music. There are three different selections of music to choose from. JOURNALING & EXERCISES The At Ease journaling process is designed to increase self-awareness -- the foundation of all meaningful change. It will also help you develop some important strategies for dealing with anxiety. You will be given exercises to do during the day, and questions to write about as you reflect on your experiences with the exercises. ---------------------- "I am a very anxious, nervous person but thanks to you I am becoming relaxed and finally sleeping enough." -- Sophie "Mary Maddux is able to bring her listener to a state of calm and relaxation quickly and easily. Her voice and the music behind her is so soothing to a tired soul and bring you to a quiet level of relaxation." -- Kim "A couple times at work, I could feel panic attacks coming on so I went to a conference room and listened to one of the meditations... I was able to calm down significantly and get through the day. Pretty amazing!" -- SH "The words and music...work together in a synergistic way to create a feeling of comfort, peace, and reassurance that has been very effective for me in reducing the anxious thoughts and increasing the joy and well being." -- CP ---------------------- ABOUT MARY AND RICHARD MADDUX Mary Maddux, MS, HTP and Richard Maddux are best known for their popular Meditation Oasis podcast and CDs. They bring over 30 years of meditation practice and teaching to the creation of their guided meditations and music. In addition to teaching meditation, Mary has worked in both conventional and alternative settings as a counselor and healing arts practitioner. Richard has played and composed music all of his life. His music is composed especially for meditation, relaxation and healing. Note: This application is not a substitute for professional counseling or medical advice.
release_text: Improved interface. Compatible with Nexus 5.

description: The Skyscape Medical Library (SML) app is used by more than 2.6 million healthcare professionals (HCPs) to access the medical resources they know and trust at the point of care. This valuable decision-support tool helps physicians, nurses, students and other HCPs find the right answers, right away. EVERYTHING YOU NEED IN ONE APP The free Skyscape app comes loaded with a valuable package of medical resources, including drug information, medical calculators and clinical information on over 850 topics. •More than 600 premium resources in 35 medical specialties are available for purchase from within this one convenient app. •Robust features include SmartLink™, Skyscape’s proprietary cross-reference functionality; medical calculators; algorithms; interactive images; flowcharts; and frequent content updates. INCLUDED FOR FREE •Skyscape Rx: Comprehensive information on thousands of brands and generics, with interactions (including multi-drug analyzer tool), pill images and over 400 integrated dosing calculators. •Skyscape Clinical Calculator: Medical calculator with more than 200 interactive tools, organized by specialty. •Skyscape Clinical Consult: Evidence-based clinical information on hundreds of diseases and symptom-related topics, presented in convenient outline format. •MedBeats™: In-context and specialty-focused journal summaries, trial results, breaking clinical news, drug alerts and other information, fully integrated with the app’s global search and SmartLink. PREMIUM RESOURCES Skyscape has partnered with more than 50 respected publishers and content providers to offer a virtual “greatest hits” of the most trusted medical resources, regularly updated to ensure you have the most current information at your fingertips. Popular premium resources include: •5-Minute Clinical Consult (5MCC) •Diseases and Disorders: A Nursing Therapeutics Manual •Davis’s Drug Guide for Nurses •Rosen and Barkin's 5 Minute Emergency Medicine Consult •Taber's Cyclopedic Medical Dictionary •Netter’s Atlas of Human Anatomy •Fitzpatrick's Color Atlas and Synopsis of Clinical Dermatology •The Merck Manual of Diagnosis and Therapy •Diagnostic and Statistical Manual of Mental Disorders •Journal Watch POWERFUL TOOLS TURN INFORMATION INTO ACTION •SmartLink™ – Empowers your natural thought process by cross-referencing all consulted resources, from initial patient interaction to diagnosing, treating and prescribing. •Content Updates – Skyscape resources are continuously updated so you can be confident that you have the most up-to-date available. •SmartSearch™ – Patented dynamic search finds the information you need, even when you don’t know where to look. •Algorithms – Clinical decision trees guide diagnosis and treatment choices. •Integrated Calculators – Power on-screen calculations directly from your research topic. •Flowcharts – Transform complex algorithms and protocols from static images into dynamic step-by-step decision support tools. •Full Color Images – Bring conditions to life and incorporate clickable “hotspots” to identify structures. •Signs & Symptoms Index – Matches a comprehensive checklist of symptoms with possible diagnoses. CUSTOMER SUPPORT Skyscape customer support is always available to help get you up and running, available by email or phone (see http://www.skyscape.com/support ).
release_text: 1. Enhanced User Experience for InApp purchases. 3. UI enhancements. 4. Bug Fixes.

description: ★★★ Buy with confidence. There is a free 3 day trial version ("Meeting Minutes Trial") available on Google Play that you can try first before purchasing this app ★★★ ★★★ Now with enhanced language support. HTML and MS Word XML formats support all languages that use the Unicode encoding. PDF format supports all languages that use the Latin, Greek or Cyrillic scripts ★★★ Meeting Minutes Pro is a simple but powerful, user-friendly and intuitive app to Organize, Store and Track Meetings, Participants, Agenda, Discussion and Action Items. It has a simple easy to use UI coupled with rich functionality and features to increase your productivity and make you a pro at organizing, tracking and managing meetings. It supports the following features: 1) Create, Update, Import and View Meetings, Participants, Agenda, Discussion and Action Items 2) Import Meetings and Participants from Calendar to save time and improve efficiency(requires Android ICS or above) 3) Sort and Filter Meetings, Contacts and Action Items based on different parameters 4) Export/Email Meeting Minutes into a professional, simple and clear PDF, MS Word XML or HTML format. Custom Labels feature within settings allows you to generate meeting minutes in multiple languages (please note that all languages might not be supported). 5) Export/Email Action Items into a comma separated values file that can be used with any spreadsheet software 6) Sync Action Items to Calendar 7) Export the full database or a single meeting for backup/recovery purposes.Exported files are encrypted to protect the contents. 8) Import database or meeting backup. Backup from the Free version can also be imported. 9) Schedule Automatic Backup. Note that automatic backups are only taken when the app is running. 10) Integration with device contacts. No need to enter all participant information manually anymore. Can just select the desired contact that is already present on the device. 11) Settings to control and make the app work the way YOU want. 12) Sync data between multiple devices (requires the add-on app Meeting Minutes Sync) Please refer the About page/screen of the app for license and copyright information.
release_text: 1. Easily Schedule a Follow Up to a Meeting 2. Link multiple Discussion/Action Items to an Agenda Item 3. Move Action Items from one Meeting to another in addition to copying 4. Delete Multiple Items in one shot 5. Option to exclude participants from the exported Meeting Minutes/Agenda 6. 12 Hour Time Format across the app (in addition to exported Meeting Minutes/Agenda) 7. Word Suggestions enabled for Meeting Subject 8. Usability Improvements 9. Bug Fixes & Stability Improvements

description: Souriez ! Des milliers de blagues hilarantes qui viendront égayer votre journée ! Vous attendez le bus ? Vous faites la queue ? Vous n'avez rien à faire ? Partagez-les avec vos amis par e-mail, Facebook ou Twitter. Amusez-vous bien ! Exemples de blagues : --------------- Pourquoi les esquimaux adorent-ils aller au cinéma ? Parce qu'ils se font sucer à l'entracte. --------------- Madame téléphone à son mari de son lieu de vacances : - Tout va bien ? Le chat est en forme ? - Non, il est mort ! - Tu pourrais me ménager, me préparer à cette terrible nouvelle. Tu aurais pu me dire qu'il se promenait sur le bord du balcon. Et maman, elle va bien ? - Elle se promenait sur le bord du balcon... --------------- - Chéri, tu ne trouves pas que j'ai des petits seins? - Non non... Réponds le mari : mais si, mais non... - Bon écoute je vais te donner une astuce, tu te frottes les seins tout les matins avec du papier cul. - Ha bon !? réponds madame, tu es sur que cela va marcher? - Ca a bien marcher pour ton cul ! --------------- Quelles sont les mensurations de Maïté ? 90 - 60 - 90. Même chose pour l'autre jambe. --------------- Bonne rigolade ! Smile! Thousands of hilarious jokes that will brighten your day! You wait for the bus? You make the tail? You have nothing to do? Simply use this app to cheer you up or provide a good laugh at your buddy. The jokes are classified into 22 categories: Animals, Belgian, Belle mother Joking short, Blonde, Chuck Norris, Attic, spoonerisms, riddles, Child, Female, funny History, Human, Humor Black, Famous People, Jokes, long Crafts Mr. and Mrs., Elderly Population, Religion, Sex, Humor SMS, Your mother ... Toto, Cars. Share them with your friends via email, Facebook or Twitter. Have fun! Examples of jokes: --------------- Why Eskimos adore they go to the movies? Because they are sucking at intermission. --------------- Mrs. telephone her husband to his vacation spot: - Are you okay? The cat is in good shape? - No, he's dead! - Could you spare me, prepared me for this terrible news. You could have told me he was walking on the edge of the balcony. And mother, she okay? - She was walking on the edge of the balcony ... --------------- - Honey, do not you think that I have small breasts? - No no ... Answer husband: but if, but not ... - Good listening I'll give you a tip, you rub your breasts every morning with toilet paper. - Ha good!? answer madame, you are sure this will work? - It has work well for your ass! --------------- What are the measurements of Maïté? 90 - 60 - 90. Same for the other leg. --------------- Good laugh!

description: The TOTALLY FREE addictive color-matching puzzle game you won't be able to put down. Crystal Caverns is an addictive color-matching puzzle game. Shoot glowing gems to match colors and clear the board. The puzzles start off easy, but the more you play the more devious they get! You can play the game in Endless mode, where like Tetris the puzzle is never ending, and you can keep playing for as long as you can keep up. It really keeps you on the edge of your seat! If you still need more puzzles, Random mode will randomly generate as many as you want in each of the three levels, so no matter how addicted you are, you will never run out! ★ 150 FREE puzzles to solve ★ Random mode ensures you never run out of games ★ Endless mode keeps you on the edge of your seat ★ Tracks your stats ★ Beautiful glowing gems ★ A bubble shooter puzzle game like snood ★ Designed for tablets like the Nexus 7

Melimots is a game of words and letters amusing halfway between crosswords and mélés words. You have to find clues through several words mixed in a grid composed of two letters blocks. No penalties in case of error, no timers, no stress: Melimots allows you to relax with the words, simply.

description: مفاتيح الجنّة ٫٫ هو تطبيق إسلامي لهواتف الايفون و الاندرويد ٫ يمكن المستخدم من الاستماع الى سور مختارة من القرآن, بالإضافة لإمكانية الإستماع للاية التي يريدها بمجرد النقر عليها و هذه قد تعتبر مفيدة لتحفيظ الأطفال القرآن و تعليمهم اللفظ السليم للآية القرآنيّة, كما و يحوي التطبيق على الاذكار والأدعية من الكتاب والسنة التي يحتاجها المسلم في حياته اليومية, كما و سيشمل التطبيق الاجراءات المتبعة لأداء مناسك الحج والعمرة بإذن الله. نحن بهذا التطبيق نهدف لتوفير تطبيق إسلامي مجاني يمكّن كل من يحمل جهاز محمول من تنزيله واستخدامه بيسر وسهولة ولكي نجعل من ذكر الله جزءا من حياتنا اليومية. description: ***"A Parents' Choice Recommended Award Winner! ***"Apps for Literacy and Learning, Special Education" - Apple. Freefall Money is a fun educational app for kids to learn how to count money. The app supports practicing with either US or Euro coins. Kids will keep coming back to this learning tool to fill their fish tank with new fish. The more time they spend learning about coins and the math of coins the more fish they will earn. *** Freefall Money continues the #1 ranked Freefall series, including Freefall Spelling *** *** Practice in US or Euro coins *** Three modes of coin math practice: 1. Fill the piggy bank (Scatter Mode) 2. Enter the amount (Type Mode) 3. Add up groups of coins (Cluster Mode) ***TIP*** In the Scatter and Type Modes coins can be stacked on top of one another. Move coins around to be sure you haven't missed one. *Sophisticated fish tank reward system - Earn Fish - Feed Fish - Clean the tank Also, see our award winning app series, ClickySticky™ Follow us on twitter @MergeMobileInc for news and updates.

description: ****IMPORTANT: Your device must have MAGNETIC SENSOR inside to detect metals. If your device does not have magnetic sensor will not work as it should. PLEASE DON’T WRITE BAD COMMENTS, IT’S NOT OUR FAULT!**** Metal Detector app uses your devices magnetic sensor to measure magnetic field values and turns your phone into a real metal detector. Data is displayed in µT (micro Testla). 1µT = 10mG (milli Gauss). The magnetic field in nature ranges from 25 to 65 µT (0.25 to 0.65 G). Any higher measurement is an indication of metal in the area. When there is metal in the area, magnetic field increases. App works best detecting ferromagnetic materials, such as iron and can’t detect non-ferromagnetic materials such as aluminum. App works best detecting metals up to 15cm away. Metal Detector app is simple to use, just open it and move it around. If the magnetic field values rise there is metal in the area. Accuracy of the app is entirely dependent on the magnetic sensor in your device and is affected by electrical equipment such as TVs, PCs… due to electromagnetic waves. If the app does not work as it should then the problem is in your magnetic sensor. Maybe your device does not have one. Or try to initialize the sensors by pointing your phone up and rotate it in a figure 8 pattern. If your device's case has magnets or contains metal elements remove the case before using the app. We were told ghost hunters use our app to use it for ghost detection :)

description: Fast paced block busting fun in this super action packed game! Test your skill and reflexes as you race to complete the level before the blocks overpower you. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous levels as you try your hardest to master the game. Beat your friend's scores on the leader board and share your successes with them on Google Game Services! From the makers of the incredibly popular Gem Collapse! * Super-charged match 3 puzzle game play with a gorgeous Halloween theme. * Stunning graphics, fully optmised for small, medium, large and extra large screens. * Three addictive modes; Frenzy, Panic and Collapse. * Daily bonus. * Multiple block types; pumpkins, skulls, vampires, spiders, ghosts, goblins and much, much, more. * Awesome power ups; nuke, destroyer, colour matcher, vaporiser, rocket, thunder wrath, block crush and many more. * Achievements and leader board - can you beat your friends? * Easy to learn, yet hard to master. * Infinite levels in Panic and Collapse mode. * Create combo chains to boost the colour match meter as these will massively help you in your quest to score big time! PANIC MODE Fast and furious is the name of the game. Speed Demons, Block Storms, Frozen Blocks and the occasional Virus will all conspire to hinder your progress! Fear not, help is at hand in the form of volatile bolts of energy, which will violently strike down from the heavens above, and blast a random number of blocks from the board. FRENZY MODE Now is your chance to collect a large amount of treasure! Lucky stars, magic keys and frozen power ups will all appear in the feeder. You've got a 60 second mad dash to grab as much as you can … but it wont be an easy ride. Every second the feeder will speed up and pile on the pressure - just don't flunk it! COLLAPSE MODE This is classic Collapse at its best. Sit back, unwind and enjoy a relaxing game of match making fun without the chaos! GAME PLAY Coloured blocks randomly fill the board, rising from below. Match a group of 3 or more blocks of the same colour and the whole group disappears in a collapse, and any blocks stacked above fall down to fill in the empty spaces. Clearing a complete column will cause the other blocks to slide into the centre of the board. If one or more blocks rise beyond the top row of the board, the game is lost. If the player manages to survive a specified number of lines without losing, they win the level and are awarded bonus points for each empty space. Higher points are awarded for spaces at the bottom of the board. A level usually begins with a few rows of blocks using a starting set of colours. One after the other, new blocks are added to a "feed" row below the board. When the feeder row has filled, all of its blocks are moved up, to the active board, shifting the field of remaining blocks higher. As the levels get harder, the rate of new blocks entering the feed increases. New colours are also introduced, making it more challenging for the player to find groups that are large enough to be collapsed. Swipe up from the piece feeder or swipe left/right along the piece feeder, to immediately insert another row into the board and receive a score bonus. The sooner you swipe the higher the bonus. Be careful that you don't get overrun with blocks! GUARANTEE The loyalty and trust of our customers is very important to us. If you are not completely satisfied with a MeYuMe product then please contact us at meyume-games@xtremics.biz . JOIN US! * Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/meyumeapps * Twitter: http://twitter.com/MeYuMeApps * Tweet: @MeYuMeApps * Web: http://meyume.com
