description: Save My Pets, brand new puzzle game comes on Android Market! Several pandas, foxes, bears, bunnies, tiny frogs and many other cute animals are trapped in a lightning house, and it's up to you to rescue them! You have bombs to aid you! How to play: - The squares go up for every three clicks - Tap a group of two or more same squares - Get animals away from the lightning line - Use props at the right time Features: • Stunning graphic • Vivid sound effects • 80 challenging levels • Easy to play but hard to master Come to rescue your cute pets, challenge yourself to finish all 80 levels to get the golden cup!

description: With this plug-in, you can now see your Evernote action items, tasks, to-dos, in the exclusive ZenDay 3D timeline. This plug-in is now FREE. This plug-in for ZenDay ( http://bit.ly/zenday ) will sync with your Evernote account. Notes with a Reminder will be automatically sync'd as Tasks in ZenDay. And when you set your Evernote account as the "Default task list" in ZenDay, any new Task in ZenDay will be sync'd as a new Note with a Reminder in the Evernote Notebook of your choice. How is each note's Reminder date sync'ed to ZenDay? Version 1.0.3 allows you to choose between ZenDay's Deadline or Starts After. How often does ZenDay sync with Evernote? ZenDay syncs with Evernote every hour. You can change this default setting to 15 minutes or 30 minutes. You can also sync manually by choosing "Refresh" from the ZenDay menu. The Evernote platform may limit the number of syncs done hourly. Notes: - If the Note content has been edited in Evernote, you will need to use the Evernote app or web app to edit it again. - ZenDay will display text as html, but without the specific Evernote features (images, checkboxes, etc) - Having Evernote installed on your mobile is not mandatory, but highly encouraged for advanced Note editing. Evernote is a trademark of Evernote, Inc.
release_text: Users can now choose how to map Evernote's Reminder Date, either as ZenDay's Starts After or ZenDay's Deadline date.

description: The Muscular System Manual by Dr. Joseph E. Muscolino makes the study of musculoskeletal anatomy easier and more engaging with a highly visual approach! This innovative, vibrantly illustrated atlas details the muscles and bones of the human body with unrivaled clarity and helps you build the strong anatomic understanding needed for success in practice. ***This is a fully functional trial!*** * A full-color, student-friendly design * Notes on Functions section explains each muscle's mover, antagonist, and stabilization functions to help you learn and retain content instead of just memorizing it. * Palpation boxes include numbered steps instructing how to palpate each muscle so you can apply this assessment skill in practice. * Expert author, Dr. Joseph E. Muscolino, shares his 24 years of experience as an educator to make this the most complete resource on musculoskeletal anatomy available. * Full-color anatomic illustrations drawn onto photos of the human body present muscles and bones in physical context to help students confidently identify musculoskeletal structures. * Content organized by functional group mirrors the way this material is most often taught, making this book more user friendly for the classroom. * Expanded coverage of muscles, including new content on eccentric and stabilization functions, myofascial meridians, pelvic floor muscles, and more make this the most A search tool Featuring various search options to help you find the words you need more easily, including: * A quick search of words while you type * A 'fuzzy filter' for when you are not sure of the correct spelling of a word * A 'keyword' search for finding key words within phrasal verbs * A wild card search facility which can replace a letter or a group of letters A learning tool The dictionary app includes a number of features which help you to expand your vocabulary further: * A 'Favourites' feature allows you to create your own categories and lists of words * Your last visited words are all saved in your 'History', so that you can quickly look back at recently checked words * Discover a new word every day with the 'Daily' feature * Ability to have dictionary Word of the Day as a widget on the device home screen * See words in context with example sentences * Online and offline modes supported, the offline mode allows you to download the whole dictionary and work independently from data connections

description: This is the first EMS pocket drug guide that contains the detailed information typically found only in much larger reference books. EMS Pocket Drug Guide is a true must-have for any level EMS provider from basic to advanced. Small enough to fit in a shirt pocket, it should always be with you for quick, reliable reference in the field. Features: * The detail you need without sacrificing ease of use * Essential information on 1000 of the most commonly prescribed medications and more than 70 drugs most often used in the pre-hospital setting * Drug-specific EMS pearls, including signs and symptoms of overdose and specific overdose management * Sections on street drugs and medicinal herbs * Quick field reference tables, including cardiac algorithms, weight conversion, and injury severity scores An amazing amount of content packed in this excellent reference: EMS Field Medications, Commonly Prescribed Medications: Classificaton, Commonly Prescribed Medications: Generic and Selected Brand Data, Commonly Used Medicinal Herbs, Common Street Drugs, Reference Tables, Adult Emergency Cardiac Care Medications A search tool Featuring various search options to help you find the words you need more easily, including: * A quick search of words while you type * A 'fuzzy filter' for when you are not sure of the correct spelling of a word * A 'keyword' search for finding key words within phrasal verbs * A wild card search facility which can replace a letter or a group of letters A learning tool The dictionary app includes a number of features which help you to expand your vocabulary further: * A 'Favourites' feature allows you to create your own categories and lists of words * Your last visited words are all saved in your 'History', so that you can quickly look back at recently checked words * Discover a new word every day with the 'Daily' feature * Ability to have dictionary Word of the Day as a widget on the device home screen * See words in context with example sentences * Online and offline modes supported, the offline mode allows you to download the whole dictionary and work independently from data connections

description: Webster's New World ®College Dictionary and Roget's A-Z Thesaurus is a software bundle of the Webster’s New World ® College Dictionary and the Webster’s New World ® Roget’s Thesaurus. This package is the perfect reference to use at school, at the office, or at home! WEBSTER'S NEW WORLD ®COLLEGE DICTIONARY The 5th edition combines the most up-to-date information about our language and our world to present a completely revised, updated and expanded reference. Millions of users worldwide value this unique combination of features, found in no other dictionary:  • Clear, readable definitions that provide instant understanding  • More than 160,000 entries with abundant synonym notes, full-page tables and charts, and authoritative guidance on usage and style points  • Over 800 illustrations, biographical photographs and maps  • 12,000 specially identified Americanisms  • 4,700 terms from the areas of arts and sports, science and medicine, computers and the Internet, food, business, politics, and law  • Thousands of well-revised examples of current word usage Webster's New World College ® Dictionary is the most useful and authoritative dictionary you can own. More than 4,700 entries and senses have been added, including terms from the areas of arts and sports, science and medicine, food, computers and the Internet, business, law and politics. Thousands of revisions have been made to existing senses to reflect current usage. About 12,000 Americanisms have been included to extensively cover the words, phrases, and senses first used in the United States. This dictionary features advanced word definitions, complimented with abundant synonym notes, full-page tables and charts, drawings and authoritative guidance on usage and style points, all well-organized in a clear and accessible defining style. Webster's New World College ® Dictionary, 5th edition is selected by leading newspapers as their official dictionary of choice. It is a favorite of newsrooms and copy editors nationwide and it is the official dictionary of The Associated Press Stylebook. WEBSTER’S NEW WORLD ® ROGET’S THESAURUS This reference opens up the world of words and leads you to more precise and effective communication. Thousands of synonym entries include the broadest and most useful word comparisons and the greatest number of examples of any thesaurus, with more grammatical and usage information and a greater variety of related terms. Entries are arranged in alphabetical order, so synonyms are easy to find. A SEARCH TOOL featuring search autocomplete to help you find words quickly by displaying predictions similar to the terms you're typing. You also get enhanced search extras including:  • A quick search of words while you type.  • A 'fuzzy filter' for when you are not sure of the correct spelling of a word.  • A 'keyword' search for finding key words within compound words.  • A wild card search function ('*' or '?') which can replace a letter or entire parts of a word.  • Download dictionary definitions locally for offline word lookup. A LEARNING TOOL including a number of features that help you further enhance your vocabulary:  • A 'Favorites' feature to create custom folders with lists of words from the extensive library, including cross-curriculum words.  • History list to help you easily review looked-up words.  • Discover more using the included special language notes.  • See words in context with example sentences.  • 'Word-of-the-day' feature with dedicated homescreen widget.
release_text: Version 4.3.131: * Revised and expanded database, based on Webster’s New World 2014

description: PHOTOSUITE 4 OUT NOW WITH BRAND NEW INTERFACE FOR EASY YET POWERFUL PHOTO EDITING From Photoshop essentials such as fun picture editing effects, image collages and sketching to advanced photo art tools such as working with layers and masks as well as complex object selections, PhotoSuite 4 allows you to create astonishing images. Edit then share images in full resolution easily with your friends and family, with quick export options of your creations to social networks or cloud storage accounts. ADVANCED IMAGE MANIPULATION :  • *NEW* Pro Filters – Choose from a wide range of new filters to enhance your images in even more ways: Auto Fix, Cross-Process, Documentary, Fill Light, Black and White, Grain, Sharpen, Temperature, Tint, Vignette, Lomo-ish, Posterize, Gaussian Blur, Bilateral Blur. (Available in PhotoSuite Pro only)  • *NEW* Heal, Clone, Splash and Flood fill tools.  • Improve your photos - Perform a wide range of image adjustments including hue, saturation, brightness, and contrast manipulation to get the best out of your photos.  • Use advanced photo designer tools – work with layers to combine pictures and create work-of-art collages.  • Enhance your images with text-based graphics and freehand drawing.  • A wide selection of shape stencils combine with the freehand shape tool to offer unparalleled creativity.  • Work with a wide range of new brushes - Pencil, Ink Pen, Brush pen, Crayon, Airbrush and Watercolor.  • Work with text and shapes gradients and shadows.  • Easy-to-use effect filters with adjustable intensity - Invert, Color Matrix, Gamma, Grayscale, Highlight Shadow, Monochrome, Pixelation, RGB, Rainy day, Sharpen, Sketch, Exposure, Posterize, Sharpen, and Edge.  • Use comprehensive selection tools and group objects to easily handle different parts of an image. CAMERA AND PHOTO ENHANCEMENT:  • Take advantage of your device camera to capture photos (also available as Sony Xperia camera plugin), apply real-time camera filter effects, and include them in your image projects.  • Real-time filters such as Highlight Shadow, Pixelation, Sketch, Sharpen and many more.  • Position your working canvas with a just one finger.  • Flip and Rotate transformations via layer or selection dragging.  • New support for Sony Remote Cameras in the PhotoSuite Camera app. ROBUST FILE MANAGEMENT:  • New Homescreen to easily manage your projects, as well as create new projects from the images on your device.  • Supports numerous file formats – PhotoSuite works in its own native format but can open and export images to the commonly used PNG and JPEG formats.  • Save a project onto Internal Memory or External SD Card.  • Share images – PhotoSuite allows you to export and share images easily – over social networks such as Facebook, Google +, Picasa or Twitter; in your cloud accounts like Dropbox (via third party applications); or as email attachments.
release_text: Version 4.3.688: * Heal tool (available only for pro version) * Clone tool (available only for pro version) * Splash tools (available only for pro version) * Flood fill tool * Text and shape gradients * Text and shape shadows Version 4.1.649: *New filters added: Auto Fix, Cross-Process, Documentary, Fill Light, Black and White, Grain, Sharpen, Temperature, Tint, Vignette, Lomo-ish, Posterize, Gaussian Blur, Bilateral Blur. *New Liquify tool.

description: Don't spend hundreds on Golf GPS hardware! With Mobitee get not only a GPS, but a scorecard keeper, a distance calculator, a rangefinder and a virtual coach, all rolled into one amazing app. Save up to 95% and get more than any GPS hardware has to offer! -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This version includes unlimited access to a course of your choice. Get any additional course by in-app purchase. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- * Precise GPS with moveable target to estimate distances * Satellite, aerial view of each hole * Flyover videos of each golf course * GPS Rangefinder * Shot tracking * Virtual Coach * Interactive scorecard up to 4 players * Scorecards shared via email * Complete golf guide for 34,000+ courses * Simple, truly spectacular interface * Free updates ★★★★★ “Excellent! It’s fast and accurate and I like The Rangefinder and Satellite View Incorporated! Does not waste much battery life.” - Jack_Wilson ★★★★★ “Worth every penny, great features like logging every shot with the ability to look back at the end of the round. Scorecard, guide, rangefinder, contact details... Money very well spent.” - Rem Dog10 Yes, this application was made for you! Mobitee is your personal, portable golf caddy developed by golfers for golfers. Want to check more about the awesome Mobitee key features? Estimate accurately the distance to green with a full-featured GPS rangefinder! It also helps to locate any hazards on the course. By having Mobitee at hand you will always avoid bunkers, lakes, streams and paths as the distance is calculated automatically. Use Mobitee GPS Rangefinder and your game starts getting smarter and better. See an aerial shot of the hole you’re about to play! The app’s satellite images and flyover videos are incredibly helpful and cool. Follow your progress with the shot tracking tool! It enables you to record and track all your hits, shows you the covered distances and calculates your average hitting distance with each club. Be advised which club you need and how hard you have to hit the ball! Your virtual coach provides you all of these data in a flash, so that you can perform your best on the course. Record your score with an automatic and interactive scorecard! The scorecard is completed with handicap scoring. Play anywhere thanks to the global selection of 30,000+ golf courses and counting! Go ahead and use one of these, or add your own via the Mobitee website from your PC. Whichever golf course you decide upon, the built-in guide offers you the address, lets you know what’s nearby, gives you route guidance and prices. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- This version includes unlimited access to a course of your choice. Get any additional course by in-app purchase. -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Please note that if your device does not embed a camera, you won’t be able to enjoy the Mobitee Rangefinder feature.

description: Nyt on loistava aika aloittaa sieniharrastus! Mobiili Sieniopas on kätevä sienikirja puhelimellesi! Sienien tunnistaminen on mukavaa ajanvietettä lenkillä ja muuten ulkona oleillessa - vaikka jättäisikin sienet maahan. - 140 lajin kuvat ja tiedot aina mukanasi - Intuitiivinen hakujärjestelmä - Tarkat, zoomattavat kuvat - Ei vaadi Internet-yhteyttä Sienikirjailija Lasse Kosonen on tuottanut sisällön mobiilikäyttöön sopivaksi. Selaa helposti kaikkia lajeja tai etsi havaitsemasi laji tuntomerkkihaun avulla. Katsele laadukkaita lajivalokuvia, lue niiden esiintymisestä ja valmistuksesta. Ohjelma on erinomainen käsiopas joka on aina mukanasi! ------------ Kuten mikä tahansa julkaisu, myös tämä ohjelma voi sisältää virheitä, esimerkiksi teknisestä viasta johtuvia. Joidenkin sienilajien syöminen voi olla hengenvaarallista, joten muista aina tarkastaa sienten syötävyys myös muista lähteistä. Now is a great time to start a fungus hobby! Mobile Mushroom Guide is a handy sponge book on your phone! Identifying mushrooms is a nice pastime jogging and other outdoor oleillessa - although jättäisikin mushrooms on the ground. - 140 species of images and data always with you - Intuitive search system - Detailed, zoomable pictures - Does not require an Internet connection Mushroom Author Lasse Kosonen has produced to fit the contents of mobile use. Easily browse or search for all the species observed into kind of a hallmark search. Other species of high-quality photos, read their presence and manufacturing. The program is an excellent hand guide that is always with you! ------------ As with any publication, including this program can contain errors, for example due to a technical fault. Eating some mushroom species can be life-threatening, so be sure to always check the edibility of mushrooms from other sources.
release_text: Uudistettu käyttöliittymä! -Nyt 140 lajia! -Valitse listanäkymään kuvalliset listaukset -Selaa lajien välillä pyyhkäisemällä

description: #################### IMPORTANT #################### IF YOU WANT TO UNINSTALL, USE "Uninstall" MENU OF THIS APP. You can log in using existing Google account of your Android. □ FULL featured √ SIM card change notification √ Accurate phone locator √ Siren √ Screen lock with lost message (NEW Feature!) √ Wipe out SD card (NEW Feature!) √ Reset to factory setting √ Take a picture from your lost phone (NEW Feature!) √ Record audio from remote (NEW Feature!) √ Toggle GPS/WIFI/Bluetooth remotely (NEW Feature!) √ Backup call log & SMS √ Push a message to phone √ Control phone via SMS Locate phone : ## locate password Siren : ## siren password Lock screen : ## lock password screenlockpassword Factory reset : ## wipe password Reset and format SD : ## wipeall password Toggle GPS : ## gps password Toggle WIFI : ## wifi password Toggle Bluetooth : ## bluetooth password √ Protect removal of app using password √ Hide this app from app drawer (no one can find this app) □ FREE essential features Core functions which can be are used FREELY √ SIM card change notification √ GPS based phone locator √ Web console access □ VERY LOW resource usage It uses network or CPU resource, ONLY when you request location or some commands. Permanently, you can delete all the date on your phone by access “Wipe out” command in case you can’t get a phone back. ========= Note ================== IF YOU WANT TO UNINSTALL, USE "Uninstall" MENU OF THIS APP. Visit http://www.mobiucare.com for more information MobiUcare provider complete and unique features compare to existing apps in market with minimum price.

description: The Keypad Screen Lock app simulates a screen lock which can be unlocked using a pin code. Pick a pin code when first starting the application then use the code to unlock your phone or tablet. Best feature, after 3 or more failed attempts(based on the selected option), the app will set the alarm off! This should not be used as a primary security measure for your device rather as a backup to your native lock screen.

description: Pop WordZ Word Game This fun and addictive word game will challenge you. Find words using the given letters. Press the check button to check your word or press the "x" button to clear it. Find the longer words to get the bonus points and star awards. Do not forget the timer. You have 3 minutes to finish the game. Your score will be based on how many words you find with the given 6 letters. Compete with others based on your score! Up for a challenge ? Show your friends how many words you can find with the given 6 letters! Features: * Challenging and fun word game * Country and Global Score board * Compatible with phones and tablets

description: Give your a brain a workout with this fun, addictive, and challenging word association game. Be prepared to think outside of the box and make associations you normally wouldn't connect. If you like fun games like Scrabble, Wordfeud, Words with Friends, Word search, Hangman, 7 Little Words, and crossword, you will love this new twist in association fun. Frigid... Fiery. Laugh... Giggle. Apple... Sauce Dog... Cat. Surf... Wave. They can be antonyms. They can be synonyms. They can be compound. They just have to be related! Be careful though! A word can have multiple correct associations so you'll have to get the right combination of matches to complete each wall puzzle and solve all 16 pairs. Take your time and enjoy associating, or push yourself and get 3, 2 or 1 stars based on how fast you complete each puzzle! Word Wall comes with 40 free wall puzzles, and you also have the option to buy more wall packs. Enjoy! -Kyle and Howard http://facebook.com/MochiBits http://twitter.com/MochiBits
release_text: Thanks for playing Word Wall! We really appreciate you playing our games. :) Version 1.1.0: -- Fixed the missing packs bug! Sorry! Version 1.0.9: -- Added Barricade Pack (40 Walls) -- Added White Pack (40 Walls) -- Added Fire bonus Pack (40 Walls)

description: Connect to the new Mobesto Bee Newspaper’s Android app wherever you are. Receive the latest local and breaking news from Modesto and the Central Valley in California. The Modesto Bee and ModBee.com reports on the local topics you care about including local, weather, traffic, crime, sports and national news. Features of the app include: • Breaking news alerts and real-time updates. • The local news and sports topics you care about from around the Modesto area. • View stunning photos and galleries of news coverage and events. • The Modesto Bee opinions, editorials, and columns you love. • Ability to share stories and galleries on Facebook, Twitter, or by email.

description: Mix and try different hairstyles in seconds with our NEW HairMixer app! The app provides numerous celebrity hairstyles, accessories, photo filters, and magazine covers for you to try out. You can also upload your own "hair" photos or those of a friend and mix them on your face. It's easy, quick, and fun! The new version comes fully loaded with a celebrity hairstyle gallery AND accessories AND photo filters AND magazine covers!!! Start mixing now and see what hairstyle suits you best ! Features: -Instant hairstyle visualization -Mix and try different hairstyles -Celebrity hairstyle gallery -Accessories -Filters AND Magazine Covers -Save the result to your iphone or ipad, email it to a friend, or upload it on Facebook HairMixer is based on the www.hairmixer.com webtool, and is powered by ModiFace Inc.
release_text: bug fixes

description: Instant Celebrity Makeover Pro is an one-touch photo editing app that lets you try out different celebrity looks. It is simple. It is elegant. It is instant. Try out your favorite celebrity looks with a tap of finger! All you have to do is upload a photo, adjust a few points that define your facial features, and then tap on a celebrity look. Instant Celebrity Makeover Pro is a quick photo editing app that lets you apply makeup as well as the hairstyle of a popular celebrity. When you are happy with your makeover, you can save your new look on your device, email to your friends, and share on Facebook. Our celebrity database is growing everyday and you will be able to update as soon as it becomes available! Some of the celebrity looks include: Kim Kardashian, Selena Gomez, Taylor Swift, Jennifer Aniston, Katy Perry, Miley Cyrus, Rihanna and more! This app is a must have! Try it out today! ★ Celebrity Makeup ★ Each celebrity look comes with a combination of makeup that is visible on them. The type of makeup includes eye shadow, eye liner, mascara, blush, lipstick, lip gloss, lip liner, contour, foundation, and many more. We have a team of makeup artists who perfect the makeup combination for each look. All you have to do is tap on your favorite celebrity look. It is that simple! ★ Celebrity Hairstyles ★ Each celebrity look comes with their hairstyle perfectly cropped for you to try-on. If the hairstyle is not perfectly fitted to your face, you can use one finger to reshape or two fingers to move, zoom, and rotate. If you prefer to not show the hairstyle, there is an option for you to turn on and off the hairstyle. ★ Features ★ ✔ Try on new celebrity looks on your own photo (supports gallery, camera, and Facebook) ✔ 100+ celebrity looks to choose from ✔ State-of-Art facial recognition technology ✔ Before vs. After comparison ✔ Share results with friends and family ★ Quick FAQ ★ Q. Face detection seems very off... A. In order to benefit from our latest facial recognition technology, you must be connected to internet. Q. Face point adjustment is difficult... A. Did you know you don’t have to touch the point to move it? Say you want to move a point on your lip. You don’t have to touch ‘on’ the point. You can simply touch the ‘near-by’ region and drag your finger to move that point. There will be a line drawn from that point to your finger in order to assist you with the process. This should make it easier for you to adjust the point! Q. What do you mean by “Would you like to save this photo as private model”? A: By saving a photo as a model photo, you can access it quickly from your model library. This photo *will not* be shared with anyone else. You can remove this model as well so don’t be afraid to use this feature! Q. I want to know the name of the makeup products I have applied. A. When you choose to share your new look through email, you will have a list of makeup products automatically included in your email body. Some of them will even have links to the products! Q. Where are the photos saved to? A. Saved photos can be found in ModiFace folder here: /mnt/sdcard/Pictures/ModiFace/. ✔ Support: Android 2.2 (Froyo) to Android 4.x (Ice Cream Sandwich & Jelly Bean & KitKat) ✔ Publisher: ModiFace - the Virtual Makeover experts

description: Requires Poweramp 2.x! Only compatible with Poweramp, no other players! This is a simple application that allows you to add shortcuts to Poweramp's music controls. You can add a shortcut for previous song, next song, and toggling playback. The main reason this was developed was to replace the media controls provided by CarHomeUltra, as per screenshots above, their media controls emulate generic headset buttons which was a bit slow for Poweramp, so this uses the Poweramp API instead.

description: Requires Xposed Framework (needs ROOT) & S-View Mods for Note 3 module. If you're not willing to root your device, do NOT buy this. This will no add S-View functionality to a ROM without that, thus you'll need a Samsung-based ROM for this to work. Do not contact me for support if you're running CyanogenMod. S-View Mods for Note 3 is a collection of modifications for the Note 3's S-View screen. Before purchasing this unlock key, you'll need to download the module from the Xposed Repository, after installation, activate it in Xposed Installer and reboot, if the settings app doesn't show you a dialog after you open it, then this is compatible with it. Features: - Appearance: * Background: custom background image, solid color * Animated time changes * Change text colors - Music*: * Music player to use (Google Play Music, PowerAMP, Spotify for metadata, others for controls). * Use blurred album art as background for S-View screen when music is playing from supported players**. - Shortcuts: * Add up to 6 contact shortcuts, apps or other shortcut functions may be added later. - Notifications: * Secure notifications: you can now see call and SMS notifications when the screen is password locked. Permissions: - Write external storage: save the custom background after it's cropped. - Read contacts: for quick dial shortcuts. * Uninstalling the Samsung music app will remove the widget, you need to keep the app installed and not frozen. ** PoewrAMP users, go to Settings -> Album Art -> Enable 24-bit album art
release_text: [1.0.4] * Added activity to explain how the key works, open it once to hide it forever. [1.0.3] * 4.3 support -- Accompanying update from Xposed repository change log: * Spotify support * 4.3 support * You can now disable pattern overlay over colours. * Read-only music widget mode for Samsung music player. * AM/PM no longer animated if 24-hour mode is selected. [1.0.2] * Removed DPI limitations.

description: trainchinese will teach you Chinese, with a free and complete dictionary, thousands of vocab lists, example sentences, audio recordings, measure words and character animations - and a powerful flash card system featuring handwriting training! ★ We're using our very own dictionary, and search algorithms that prioritise words that you'll actually want to learn! For example, try searching for "tree" in your existing Chinese dictionary. More than likely you'll see 木 - not helpful at all! Search with trainchinese and you'll get 树 first and 一棵树 second - just what you were after. ★ Partial searches start returning results as soon as you begin typing. If you make a spelling mistake, you'll get suggestions for words you might have meant. ★ Get measure words for thousands of nouns. Tap measure words for full details and access to related searches. ★ Search for words by type! Add "n." to your query to prioritise nouns, for example. ★ trainchinese is great for study, because our words are organised into more than 1,000 word lists covering topics from International Relations to American Football Teams and more. Feel like something's missing? Users often get in touch to ask for lists on the topics the're studying, and we're happy to oblige! ★ Highlight words with your finger for super-fast access to character animations, related searches and more! ★ Whether you're studying the Simplified (mainland China and Singapore) or Traditional (Hong Kong and Taiwan) variants, we've got you covered! Easily switch between them or choose to display both in dictionary results and on flash cards. ★ Create flash cards with audio and animation from dictionary entries. Organise them into lists, and share them with friends (or students). ★ The Spaced Repetition system ensures you'll memorize those words for good. ★ Train however you want: each card is available in four different modes to test different aspects of Chinese study. See Chinese, Pinyin or English and get tested on translation, and even compare your handwriting to a stroke-order animation side-by-side, synchronized! ★ Flash cards are saved on your device and synchronized with trainchinese.com, where you can also train with them and find more great content. ★ Add study notes to your flash cards - they're saved and backed up at trainchinese.com.
release_text: 4.4/5 update: ★ Thousands of new dictionary words ★ Thousands of new character animations ★ Registered users will enjoy the new "Discussions" feature on details screens ★ Related words show on details screens ★ Traditional-mode users will see traditionally-ordered strokes in character animations

description: Do you enjoy sitting around a campfire, bonfire, or relaxing in front of a cozy fireplace. If so, then this app is for you. Maybe you have a romantic evening planned at home, but don't have a fireplace. Well, you do now. These videos are real with real sound, nothing is animated. This free version has 42 different fires you can choose from to watch on your smart phone or tablet. We have even added a nice fireplace with soft Jazz music playing in the background as well a holiday Yule Log fireplace, which plays Christmas holiday songs. All 42 videos are FREE and accessible now for download within this app itself. Our website (monoridernet.com) is complete with pics of all the fires. This is an evolving mobile application with new features and videos coming soon. Note: This app was developed for the Android OS version 2.2 or higher. So far it works on lots of phones, but we can't guaranty it will on all Android smart phones and tablets. But it's free, so why not try it. This FREE version download file is @9.65 MB, which is really not a lot of storage since most smart phones have at least 2.0 GB. It takes 1000 MB to make 1 GB. On 3G phones it may take an average of 2 to 4 minutes to download. 4G phones download in about 30 seconds or less. So, download and enjoy! Fireplace Fireplaces Campfire Campfires Yule Log Holidays Fire Fires Flames video Flame On
release_text: Update (version 4.0) This FREE app now has all 42 fireplace and campfire videos for you to enjoy. You can download as many of them as you want for FREE within this app itself. Yes, that includes all three versions of our Yule Log Fireplace (short, medium, long). Great for Holidays. If you already have this app, then just update it to this new version to have access to all our fires. If you don't have it yet, then install it and check it out. It's FREE!

description: Flame On Demo - Back by popular demand. This was the original FREE version of our "Flame On" mobile app. Some people really liked it, so we are bringing back just for you. It will NOT replace any other "Flame On" apps you may have already downloaded, it will be a separate app install on your device. So, download and enjoy. 'Flame On Free' and 'Flame On Pro' are now available. Check them out and let us know what you think. Our 'Flame On Pro' app now has 42 fireplace and campfire videos to choose from. All 42 videos are on our website (www.monoridernet.com), which are downloadable from within the app itself. Descriptions and pics of each fire will be available on our website soon. fireplace campfire fireplaces campfires Flame On flames fire

description: Do you enjoy sitting around a campfire, bonfire, or relaxing in front of a cozy fireplace. If so, then this app is for you. Maybe you have a romantic evening planned at home, but don't have a fireplace. Well, you do now. These videos are real with real sound, nothing is animated. And It's completely Ad FREE. No pop up Ads! This 'Flame On Pro' app (Now Available) has 42 fireplace and campfire videos you can download FREE from within the app, which gets them from our website (www.monoridernet.com). We have even added a nice fireplace with soft Jazz music playing in the background as well a holiday Yule Log fireplace, which plays Christmas holiday songs. All 42 videos are accessible now and our website is complete with pics of all the fires. This is an evolving mobile application with new features and videos coming soon. Everyone getting 'Flame On Pro' now will continue to get FREE updates with new functions and videos in the future. We also have a FREE version (Flame On), so if you want to download and check that out before buying please do. Note: 'Flame On Pro' was developed for the Android OS version 2.2 or higher. So far it works on lots of phones, but we can't guaranty it will on all Android smart phones and tablets. But, if you try our FREE version (Flame On) first and it works then the 'Flame On Pro' will work also. The download file is @9.65 MB, which is really not a lot of storage wise since most smart phones have at least 2.0 GB. It takes 1000 MB to make 1 GB. On 3G phones it may take an average of 1 to 3 min to download. 4G phones download in about 30 seconds or less. So, download and enjoy! Fireplaces Campfires fireplace campfire Fire Fires Flames Flame On Pro video

description: This app contains 5 free fonts compatible with the FlipFont program that is installed on most Samsung Galaxy devices. This app is designed to be used with Samsung Galaxy devices that are using the TouchWiz interface and have the FlipFont program. NOTE: This App is NOT sponsored, endorsed, or affiliated with Monotype Imaging, Inc, the owner of the FlipFont trademark and technology. Fonts for Android Samsung Galaxy FlipFont Free have spent the last year gathering free fonts and creating Android apps to provide users with the ability to change their device’s typeface for free. Using the FlipFont font changer program installed on your Samsung Galaxy phone, you can use this application to customise your device to one of the many beautiful fonts that we have collected. Each Bundle of fonts is a random selection of 5 typefaces that have been optimised for use on Samsung Galaxy Android devices. Please browse through our many FlipFont packs to find the perfect font styles that fits your taste. To change fonts on your Samsung Galaxy device, navigate to the display settings in your device's system settings. In the display settings you can change the font style to any of these 5 new fonts for Android. This font pack should work on all Galaxy brand phones and will provide fonts for Samsung Galaxy 3 (S3), fonts for Samsung Galaxy 4 (S4), and fonts for Galaxy Note 3. This app will not work on developer devices, such as the Galaxy Nexus, because it does not have the FlipFont program. Please verify that your phone can change its font. Look for the font style option in the display or screen display section of your device settings. This app is not designed as fonts for root and does not require root permission to change your font, nor will it require you to restart your phone.* Also, you will be able to enjoy your fonts for texting and messaging, however the typeface used on your device will not be sent to people that you send a text message to. We love fonts and love to personalise our Android devices with unique typefaces. We hope you enjoy all of the fonts that we have collected for use on FlipFont free. Please let us know if you have any issues using a font or any suggestions on fonts that you would like to see. * Phone restart will not be required for devices running Android 3.0 or later. Devices such as the Samsung Galaxy Y and Samsung Galaxy Ace will still require a restart to apply the new font. This android application is not affiliated with FlipFont or Monotype Imaging Inc. All functionality, trademarks and copyrights remain the property of their respective owners.
release_text: null

description: Monsters are coming! You have to kill them all! Everyone knows the rules – kill or die hard. Become a professional monster contract killer and download ‘Monster Killer – Shooter Mayhem’ for free! The monster apocalypse has come and you are one of the survivors. The world has been infected with monsters and your only task is to stop this major breakout. The world needs a hero like you more than ever. Summon your inner monster terminator! Choose any weapon that comes across and shoot them, stab them, blow them up, burn them down to the ground with the truck or launch that bloody monster high above the sky!! Let the monster mania begin! Don’t have mercy on them because they won’t have any on you. This is one of those Android games that will become your new favorite time killer, and you can get it with free download. This unique shooter game offers you plenty of excitement on twelve different levels. Each level is harder than the last, and each one with a new monster in the company of the monsters from the previous levels. The last mission is an endless monster swarm where you have to shoot all the evil creatures that are in the game and survive for as long as possible! Isn’t this exciting? Download and play now one of the best monster killing games there is! Monster Killer – Shooter Mayhem offers a bevy of fabulous features that make it (literally) mind-blowing. Choose between two heroes whose catch-phrases like “I like big guns and I cannot lie” and “I eat those like you for breakfast” will get you in the monster shooting mood and will make you feel like you are in a real action movie. Also, choose one of three additional bonus powers that can boost your health, attack or defense. In addition to all this the players will find all sorts of different weapons such as knives, swords, axes, guns, flamethrowers, laser guns and many more. But keep your eyes open! These tricky monsters are coming from both sides, so you must attack them to the left and to the right if you want to stay alive! Join one of those fun addicting games that you won’t be able to let go of! Fear not – Slay away! Although Monster Killer – Shooter Mayhem appears as one of those cool games for kids only, played by boys 10 or above, it can also be placed in the category of shooting games for adults! But there is no reason why girls won’t like it as well; after all, we all share a passion for shooting, killing and maiming monsters! Finally, the realization of this game would not be possible without the help of a 12-year-old boy, named Luka Pavlovic, whose brilliant ideas were used in the creation of this fun kids game. So download it now and play it on your Android phones or tablets! Enjoy going through all twelve levels with different background design and amazing sound effects! Play it whenever you want and share your score on Facebook, or go to Google + and compete with numerous other players all over the world on the game’s leaderboard. So what are you waiting for? Download it now, and hurry up, because those monsters won’t shoot themselves! ** This game is an intellectual property of Peaksel LLC – copyright 2015

description: Are you looking for a great game that will allow you to test your dancing skills and take them to the next level? Welcome to Beat It, the ultimate multiplayer dance-off for Android! In Beat It you will be able to dance on numerous fun tunes, while also having the opportunity to test your skills against people from all over the world. Dancing in Beat It is very easy, all you have to do is to swipe the screen while following the directions presented on-screen. Your 3D avatar will then move according to your instructions! You need to get the timing and moves just right, because the better you dance, the higher your score will actually be! The game comes with a multitude of dance moves that you can show off, and depending on your score you will gain experience and virtual money. Beat It also allows you to gain a better spot on the leaderboard by continually challenging yourself to learn new dance moves and showcasing them in front of your opponents. Be a part of this unique virtual world filled with passion and love for dancing, just download Beat It right now and take your entertainment to the next level! Features: • Multiplayer dancing competition • 3D avatars • Unlock items with virtual money • Easy to learn gameplay • Connect with social media and share your results • Take photos in-game with your skills and scores

description: aCal is a Calendar and Tasklist application which you can use if you have an account on a CalDAV server, such as DAViCal CalDAV Server, or with a CalDAV calendar provider such as dotCal.com, Famjama.com, Yahoo, Google or iCloud, allowing you to share your calendar and todo list across several CalDAV clients, on other phones, or with partners, friends or co-workers. aCal can also sync from a CardDAV addressbook on the server into your android Contacts (read-only at present). Calendar clients you could use to access CalDAV calendars on other computers are Apple iCal, Mozilla Lightning, EmClient, Evolution. The iPhone & iPad also natively support CalDAV calendar servers. aCal is NOT functional as a standalone calendar app: it REQUIRES a CalDAV server connection to work, though it will cope just fine with periods of temporary disconnection. If you don't want to pay the price to download this pre-built version, the source code for aCal is available on Gitorious and is licensed under the GPL v3, but by donating us this small amount along with your download you will sleep better at night, relaxed in the knowledge that you have helped give us some time to spend on this, rather than being distracted by having to be moneygrubbing capitalists quite so often. Except for those nights where you set an alarm in aCal to wake yourself up, of course!
release_text: Version 1.36 is a minor revision: * Fix 'Digest' authentication (Apple CalendarServer) * Handle multi-host CalDAV servers (iCloud) Version 1.35 is a minor revision: * Fix a force close processing some VCARD records. * Fix an occasional force close in the Widget Please email if you have problems.

The free version offers 12 strokes suitable for beginners to intermediate players, the full app is available for a small fee and includes advanced strokes and techniques. We provide Professional coaching, accurate motion-capture based performance, and interactive control over the playback. Develop your technique, footwork and general court strategy at your own pace. Major Features *3D visualisation showing accurate movement from any angle *Professional Tennis Instruction *Breakdown of strokes with step by step analysis *Slow motion Replay Full – Half – Quarter speed *Language selection for English, French or Spanish. Tennis Edge Academy App will improve your technique, consistency which will accelerate your ability and confidence as a better tennis player. description: Thank you for your interest in our product AfterFocus.:) Pro version has the following additional features! 1. Hi-resolution image up to 3264 pixels 2. Smooth transition from the focused area to the background by adjusting edge-feathering level 3. Can apply different filter to foreground image and background image 4. Brightness/Contrast (can also supply different values for FG/BG) 5. More filters 6. Can select focus spot when applying fading background 7. Double photo Feel free to email to the developer for any bugs, suggestions and comments. ==================================================== With AfterFocus, you can create DSLR-style background blurred photo by simply selecting focus area. Also, various filter effects offer you to create the most natural and realistic photo. Selecting a focus area more precisely, you can achieve more natural and professional image. Just mark the areas you want, AfterFocus automatically recognizes the focus area precisely even for an object with complex shapes. This auto function allows you to work faster on smart phones with small screen. Also, background blur effect of AfterFocus gives a photo the realistic look between the edge of the background and the focus area. With our realistic filter effects, you will enjoy photographing and photo editing even more, and share them on SNS easily. 1. Smart focus area selection Simply draw some lines inside a focus area and the background, then AfterFocus will automatically recognize the focus area. You can also select the area with traditional finger painting. 2. Background Blur effect You can create the most realistic blur effect with various aperture styles just like DSLR camera. To emphasize that certain things move, Motion blur effect is also available. 3. Filter effect AfterFocus offers from basic effects to professional effects like Cross Process without looking artificial. Also, you can emphasize the spot light on the background using Bokeh effect. 4. Double photo (Pro version only) Take a picture of one object and move slightly to the right to take another picture of the same object, and it will analyze the images and recognize the nearest object, so there is no need to draw the focus area. (Make sure that the background and the distance of the object are far enough and have clear texture to get a great result.) 5. Easy share You can share through e-mails and SNS easily and simply.
release_text: 1. Faster save speed in multi-core device 2. Smooth pan and zoom for ICS+ 3. Larger preview resolution for hi-res device 4. More filters

description: Discover how you and your friends might look like decades down the line. HourFace transforms your portrait photo into amazing interactive 3D movie that show aging effects on your face. Turn your friends into wrinkly old people right in front of their eyes, then poke, prod, and make them go back and forth in time! ☆☆☆ How to use the app ☆☆☆ ✓Take a portrait shot (or upload one from the photo library), and immediately see the aging process begin. ✓Reverse the aging process by turning the phone upside down. ✓ Flip the phone back up to start growing old again. ✓ Pause the aging process by holding the phone sideways. ✓ Swipe the screen side to side to turn the face ✓ Tap to enter full screen mode ✓ Share your 3D faces via email. ✓ Save your 3D faces in your library Capturing optimal portrait photos for this app: * The subject should look straight into the camera with head held straight. * Forehead should be visible. * Avoid shadows by taking the photo in bright natural light. HourFace is powered by MotionPortrait technology. See more at http://motionportrait.com/e/

description: Android Widget for Fitbit® devices with Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2 Now you can have a SmartWatch 2 watchface with Fitbit data shown using this widget. Your SmartWatch 2 acts like a mini dashboard for your Fitbit! Smart FitIt Pro widget is built on top of our popular FitIt Pro widget. You have all the widgets on your Home screen plus now you can have a SONY SmartWatch 2 to display your Fitbit progress. The ultimate widget for Fitbit android users to keep track of progress in the Home screen and in the SONY SmartWatch 2. We own ourselves the Fitbit gadgets (eg. Force, Flex, Aria ) and SONY SmartWatch 2. FitIt-Pro Widget is helping us to monitor our progress and activities with ease in both Android Home screen and SmartWatch 2 simultaneously. WHAT'S NEW: - support Fitbit SURGE, CHARGE HR, CHARGE, FLEX and more. On Android device: 1) FitIt Pro widget (Automatically rotates every 20 sec; tap this widget opens Settings) 2) Device widget (Displays the last sync, alarm & battery status for tracker) 3) Steps widget 4) Distance widget 5) Calories burned widget 6) Sleep widget 7) Food Calories intake widget 8) Water consumption widget 9) Active Minutes widget 10) Weight widget 11) Floors widget 12) Scale widget (Displays the last sync, & battery status for scale) On SONY SmartWatch 2: - FitIt Activity - FitIt Calories - FitIt Distance - FitIt Food - FitIt Sleep - FitIt Stairs - FitIt Steps - FitIt Water - FitIt Weight Installation setup: Smart FitIt Pro is a set of widgets. You will find the widgets under App/Widget tray after installing from Google Play. (tap on "App" button from Home screen and select 'WIDGETS' tab). Drag & drop one of Smart FitIt Pro widgets onto the Home screen will initiate the installation process. Please follow the instruction. Once linked, then your FitIt data is available for your SONY SmartWatch 2. The widgets are extension for SmartWatch 2. Please install SONY SmartConnect from Google Play Store. Recommendation: - We recommend to have a good internet data connection at initial setup. Smart FitIt Pro Widget may experience timeout due to poor connection and results to an incomplete setup. If happens, then uninstall the Smart FitIt-Pro Widget from Google Play and wait few minutes before download the widget from Google Play. Note: Some Android device manufactures modify the Home Screen so the widget tray may be hidden and hard to find. Please consult your device's user guide for widgets. Note: If you don't see the Smart FitIt widget after installation, please uninstall and reinstall again. Some devices, most notably Samsung devices, fail to register the Smart FitIt widget at the first time. It needs to be reinstalled to recognize the widgets. *** If you have suggestions, email us and help us take the app to the next level. Your email will be promptly responded to and acted on! We work hard to improve our apps and we value your inputs. Disclaimer: No warranty is expressed or implied that the application or its author is liable in any manner for any direct, incidental, indirect or punitive damages arising out of your access, use or inability to use this application, or any errors or omissions in this information on this application. Author shall not be liable to you or to any other third party for any additional, modification, suspension or discontinuance of the application. *** Only compatible with SONY SmartWatch 2 Liveware extension for SmartWatch 2 Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2

description: The Find™ App by realtor.com® is an agent tool designed exclusively for real estate professionals in specific participating MLSs only. In order to use this app, confirmation that you are an active member in your MLS, as well as a realtor.com® Control Panel login, will be required. For Associations and Multiple Listing Services interested in providing the Find™ App by realtor.com® to their membership, please contact your realtor.com® Industry Relations Representative. Combining the best of everything you love in the realtor.com® Real Estate App with the professional tools you trust in Find, the Find™ App is the perfect partner for a busy professional on the go. MLS members will have access to classic features like searching by school and school district, drawing your own custom search, and making personal notes on listings you love. The Find™ App also delivers specific enhancements exclusively for agents, including: -Mobile Collaborative Search automatically enabled • Invite and connect with clients right away • Receive agent-side notifications when consumer-side collaborative search actions occur, including “ask my agent” messages and showing request messages -Private listing information to help you do your job, including: • Agent remarks • Agreement type • Compensation details • Agent showing instructions • Number of days the listing has been on realtor.com • Short sale and bank owned status • Single-click access to contacting listing or selling agent or broker directly • Driving directions • Other MLS -specific private data The Find™ App is not a consumer-facing app, though it leverages the best of the consumer app. If you are not an agent, please download the realtor.com® Real Estate App if you are a home buyer or seller.
release_text: Find App v1.5 integrates agent profiles. In Member Directory, the View Profile button opens agent photos, biographies, areas served, current listings and recent sales, and more. For more info or to claim your new profile, visit http://www.realtor.com/profile/ Additionally, you can search for members by broker and office name within Member Directory, view recent contact cards, and cross-share private data between partner MLSes. Thanks for making Find App your mobile professional tool of choice!

description: Anglicko Český slovník offline Offline English Czech dictionary * Over 164.000 words and expressions * Bookmark your favorite translations for fast reference * Works offline! No Internet connection needed, perfect for your trips or when no data connection is available * Listen to the correct pronunciation in British or American English and Czech (if installed) using Android's built-in Text-to-speech synthesizer. * Share translations by SMS, email, etc. This version is supported by ads. If you like the application, please consider upgrading to the ad-free version to support the development. Thanks :) FAQ: Q: How can I share a translation? A: Just press 2-3 seconds over the translation and you will be presented with a menu with all available sharing options based on the apps installed in your device (Email, SMS, Facebook, etc) Q: How can I change the speed of the voice? A: The speed of the speech is controlled by the TTS engine installed with Android. It can be set up by going to: Settings --> Voice input & output settings --> Text to speech settings --> speech rate Q: I don't like the voice. How can I improve it? A: The default text-to-speech engine installed with Android is Pico TTS, it’s pretty simple and sometimes may sound a bit electronic. You can always install alternatives like eSpeak, SVox or IVONA from Google Play. Please check our blog post about this subject: http://www.movinapp.com/talking-android Q: How can I change the speech language? A: Just go to Menu --> Settings and select the language. Currently, 3 languages are available: * English (US) * English (GB) * Czech (if installed) DISCLAIMER: The text-to-speech (TTS) technology may not be available in some devices. To check if your phone is able of speech synthesis: Menu -> Settings -> Voice input & output -> Text-to-speech settings. If not installed, your device may ask you to install the TTS engine. An internet connection may be required. We recommend installing it before traveling as roaming data tariffs may be very expensive.
release_text: Bug fixes

description: Mit einem Tastendruck zu allen punktgenauen Unwetterwarnungen für jeden Ort in Österreich, inklusive vielen Wetterfilmen. „wetter.at – Unwetter“ – die neue Wetterwarn-App der Nr. 1 in der Kategorie Wetter!“ Die neue Unwetter-App von wetter.at, der meist geladenen Wetter-App in Österreich, ist eine kostenlose Informations-App für alle Personen, die von Unwettern in Österreich betroffen sein können. Die rechtzeitige Information über einen aufkommenden Sturm, über ein drohendes Gewitter, über Hagel, Starkregen oder Eisglätte - soll dazu beitragen, dass Schäden so weit wie möglich vermieden werden können. Die Unwetterzentrale( UWZ) von wetter.at warnt Sie stets über aktuelle Unwetterwarnungen in Ihrem Ort und Ihrer Region. Zusätzlich können Sie selbst auch Warnungen für alle anderen User eingeben, sowie von Ihrem Handy eigene Fotos des Unwetters zu Ihrer Meldung hochladen. UNWETTER WARNSTUFEN: • Warnstufe 1 – gelb – potentielle GefahrWarnung vor möglichen Wetterereignissen – kleinere Schäden möglich • Warnstufe 2 – orange – GefahrWarnung vor starken Unwettern – Schäden sind wahrscheinlich • Warnstufe 3 – rot – extreme GefahrWarnung vor extrem heftigen Unwettern oder Gefahren – Schäden sind sehr wahrscheinlich Funktionen und Inhalte der Wetterwarnung-App: • Übersicht über Wetterwarnungen in gesamt Österreich mit Unwetterkarte • Unwetterwarnungen für jeden Ort und jede PLZ • Absetzen Ihrer eigenen Unwettermeldungen in Textform • Hochladen von aktuellen Unwetter-Fotos mit Ihrem Handy • Aktuelles Regenradar – alle 15 Minuten aktualisiert • Aktueller Satellitenfilm • Vorhersagefilm Niederschlag • Vorhersagefilm Bewölkung • Vorhersagefilm Temperatur • Vorhersagefilm Wind • Suche nach Ortsname, PLZ oder GPS Position • Festlegung von Favoriten uvm. „Sei mit der Unwetter-App von wetter.at immer top-informiert und lade Dir die App kostenlos auf Dein Handy“. Selbstverständlich werden die Features dieser App ständig aktualisiert und erweitert. Du hast Fragen, Verbesserungsvorschläge oder Feedbacks? Sag uns bitte Bescheid: iphone@mowis.com Dein wetter.at Team With one keystroke at all precise weather alerts for any location in Austria, including many weather movies. "Wetter.at - storm" - the new Weather Alert App No. 1 in the category Weather "! The new storm app from wetter.at, the most frequently downloaded weather app in Austria, is a free information app for all persons who may be affected by natural disasters in Austria. Timely information about a coming storm, about an impending thunderstorm, about hail, heavy rain or icy roads - should help to ensure that damage can be avoided as far as possible. The Severe Weather Center (Central Resettlement) of wetter.at always warns you about current severe weather warnings in your place and in your area. Additionally you can enter yourself warnings for all other users, as well as upload your own from your mobile photos of the storm to your message. UNWETTER warning levels: • Warning level 1 - yellow - potential danger  warning of possible weather events - minor damage possible • Warning Level 2 - orange - hazard  Warning of severe storms - damage is likely • alert level 3 - red - extreme danger  Warning of extremely severe storms or dangers - damage is very probable Functions and contents of the Weather Warning App: • Overview of weather warnings in total Austria with severe weather map • Severe weather warnings for each location and each location • Sending your own Storm Reports in text form • Upload of current severe weather photos with your mobile phone • Current Rainfall radar - updated every 15 minutes • Current satellite image • Forecast film deposition • Forecast film cloudiness • Forecast film temperature • Forecast film wind • Search by place name, postcode, or GPS position • Definition of favorites and much more. "Be with severe weather app from wetter.at always top-informed and invite you the app for free on your mobile phone." Of course, the features of this app are constantly being updated and expanded. You have questions, suggestions or feedback? Please tell us about: iphone@mowis.com Your wetter.at Team

description: Frustrated that you have to crop your portrait and landscape photos before posting them to Instagram? Insta Square Maker is an easy and fast way to upload your entire photo to Instagram or similar social networks without having to crop away any piece of it. It puts frames around your photos to make them square shaped. Key features: - post entire photos without cropping. - choose any color for background. - change image position inside the square frame. - crop tool - shadow effect - make blurred background from photo - more than 20 filters to make your photos more beautiful - share created square photo directly to Instagram with just one click of a button. Never crop photos again to make them compatible with Instagram. Follow us on Instagram and add #InstaSquareMaker hashtag to your photos before posting to get more likes and followers!

description: Amsterdam Metro and Tram Map is a simple free and offline map of Amsterdam Public Transport, very useful for tourists and visitors. There are four lines in the metro system. Three lines start at Amsterdam Centraal, of which line 53 and 54 connect the city centre to Diemen, Duivendrecht, and Amsterdam Zuidoost in the southeast, and line 51 connects the city centre to Amstelveen in the south. The Ring Line, line 50, connects Amsterdam Zuidoost to the west without crossing the centre of the city. The North/South line is currently under construction and will connect the north with Amstelveen and crosses the historical city centre.

description: ---- ATTENTION ------ Highly recommended you try 'Solar 2 Demo' first to make sure the game works on your Android device! If you are unfortunate enough to have a hardware issue with the game, please contact me at jay@murudai.com and I'll see what I can do to help. I can't contact you or give a refund if all you do is leave a review! ------------------------------ Solar 2 is an open-world, sandbox game set in an infinite abstract universe. Play constructively: grow your system, nurture life on your planets and attack enemy life in huge space battles. Play destructively: crash into other objects and cause chaos, use your orbiting objects like wrecking balls, steal planets from other systems.
release_text: Latest Patch, v1.13: - Added safe mode. A common issue was the game freezing after the loading screen, this was due to a hardware bug compiling the particle shader. If this occurs, activate safe mode on the bottom right of the opening splash screen. - Orientation options. In the Options screen you can lock the orientation to either landscape orientation, or default to sensor landscape.

description: Awesome guitar & chromatic tuner for free or upgrade for advanced functionality. Designed for novices and pros, fully featured, easy to use. This is *NOT* the old PitchLab tuner app, it is a ground-up rework of everything that was in the old app, plus improved accuracy, multi-core support for fast, smooth tuning response, increased spectrogram resolution and multi-view tuning. Old tuning views have been merged to improve usability and completely new tuning views have been added, along with improved temperament, calibration, transposition support and user-interface design. Live demos of all the tuning screens are built into the app (go to the in-app shopping screen and tap on the thumbnail images). Unique features help you work out the chords to new tunes, visualize the pitch and consistency of the human voice, violin or other instrument, or answer the questions "what notes am I humming", "what are those chords", "am I hitting all the notes in tune", "is my vibrato consistent" etc. Multiple visualization modes: Instrument: Combination chromatic ribbon tuner and string/note display for easy instrument tuning. Includes standard Guitar tuning for free with a custom tuning editor and database of common tunings for Guitar, Violin/Fiddle, Mandolin, Ukulele, Banjo, Bouzouki and Pedal Steel available as an upgrade. Stage Tuner: A large, clear tuning display, optimized for hands-free operation at a distance and incorporating a true radial and waterfall strobe for unbeatable fine-tuning accuracy and responsiveness. Tap the display to change modes. Chord Matrix (upgrade): Grid-based estimation display of common chord types (maj/min, maj7/min7, dom7/dim7), ideal for quickly determining the 'strum along' chords for a tune where the chords are reasonably clear. Polyphonic Tuner (upgrade): A multi-mode polyphonic tuning display, showing either 12 simultaneous dial tuners, optimized for fine tuning, or 12 simultaneous 'ribbons', optimized for the visualization of rapid note/pitch changes such as vibrato, arpeggio, portamento, glissando etc. Tap the display to change modes. Pitch Spectrogram (upgrade): Scrolling display of live sound analysis, showing the polyphonic perceived pitch of a wide range of sound types (including human voices and singing). Tone Generator (upgrade): An 8-octave, polyphonic keyboard display that enables you to play reference notes in the musical scale. Includes a selection of tone waveform types and the ability to quickly switch between single-note or multi-note mode. Strobe Tuner (upgrade): A true 6-band, multi-mode strobe display combined with a chromatic ribbon tuner for rapid and extremely accurate hands-free instrument tuning. Tap the display to change modes. Split Screen (upgrade): Split the screen and use any two tuning views at the same time (e.g. Pitch Spectrogram plus Chord Matrix for transcription work). Please note, this upgrade is only recommended for tablets or devices with large screens and only for users who have purchased one or more tuner view upgrades. These visualization modes are easily accessed by swiping the screen left/right (or up/down, depending on the screen orientation). When available, split-screen mode is enabled/disabled by pressing a toggle button on the main display. Please rate or review, check for updates regularly and email pitchlabapp@gmail.com to report issues for quick resolution.
release_text: Fixed crash when changing some configuration settings.

description: With this application you will be able to recognize guitar chords (first 40 seconds) extracted from any song stored on your android device. Upgrade to PRO version (from main menu) enables full song processing. Imagine that you have a guitar and burn with the desire to play one loved song. But you don’t know the chords. One of the first ideas that can come up to your mind is to surf the Internet. If the song is quite popular, it is likely that you will find numerous versions of guitar chords and tabs. But sometimes, the quality of the chords produced by an amateur leaves much to be desired. You can find yourself in a more difficult situation if the song is not among the latest hits from the top charts, or has just been released. There is always an alternative solution – to ask a professional musician to pick up the guitar chords by ear, or to do it yourself. Fortunately, there is a better, faster and more reliable solution now! Recognize guitar chords to your favorite songs on your Android device with a new application - AnySong Chord Recognition. Just choose an audio file from your music collection, wait a little, and get the desired guitar chords! AnySong Chord Recognition automatically analyzes audio, extracts the chords and shows the appropriate guitar tabs on the screen while the track is playing! For sure, you will be amazed with the user friendly interface and appreciate the quality of the recognized chords! AnySong Chord Recognition! Any song, any place, any time!
release_text: version 2.0 -- Support for YouTube media -- Support for mp3, mp4, ogg, wma, flac, aac, 3gp, wav formats -- Extended customizable chord dictionary (maj, min, aug, dim, 7, maj7, m7, m6, 6) -- Rendering three subsequent chords at a time -- Tonality/Tempo controls

description: RATED 7.2 "GREAT" BY APPSZOOM.COM "FUN,FUN,FUN" READ THE REVIEW HERE: http://www.appszoom.com/android_games/arcade/battlelines-ww2-arcade_jeryv.html Vodka. Guns. Explosions. And more vodka. Welcome to Battlelines: WW2 Arcade, a vodka-induced rage of bullets and explosions. Shoot, explode, and electrocute the Axis infantry, jeeps, and tanks to win the war in this action-comedy shootemup! Insane vehicle upgrades, hysterical characters, and hilarious physics. Shoot some, laugh some, drink some vodka, and do it again! Challenge your friends to beat your highscore, and earn your name on the boards for the whole world to gloriously see! Hill Climb Racing with Zombies and Guns! Hill Climb and kill Nazi Zombies in this great World War 2 Themed Hill Racing game! Features: - Hilarious physics! Send your enemy flying off screen, while you achieve insane stunts! - 3 different vehicles with 9 upgrades per vehicle (Mini nukes, Tesla cannons, Rocket engines, the list goes on!) - 9 Different levels in 3 different terrain types. (Western Europe - Plains, The Pacific - Desert, Eastern Europe - Snow) - Endless Nazi Zombies mode - Endless Survival mode - 4 types of Axis infantry as well as Axis jeeps and tanks - Worldwide highscore boards - Beautifully crafted levels, with stunning backgrounds, explosions, and enemies! Oh my! - 4 hilarious characters to choose and play from! Unlock your way through 3 vehicles: Motorcycle - Quick and Light Jeep - Fast with Moderate Armor Tank - Slow but Powerful -Each with 9 unlockable upgrades, everything from miniguns to missiles to tesla cannons to mininuke launchers...ever want to drive a tank with monster truck wheels while shooting nukes? Now you can! Play as one of the 4 characters: Yuri the drunk Russian, Sarge the retired war hero, Agent K the double agent, and The Canadian the Canadian Mountie - all hilariously stereo-typically voiced! 3 ways to play: CAMPAIGN: Try to finish all 9 maps, use points to buy upgrades to help you get closer to reaching the end. SURVIVAL: Endlessly blow apart Axis infantry and vehicles. Use points to upgrade your vehicle as you go, upgrades reset when you fail the mission. ZOMBIES: Its like Survival, but better, because zombies. Always remember: Never take your foot off the gas, Never release the trigger, and most importantly, NEVER SPILL YOUR VODKA. Minimum requirements: - 1GHz dual core processor - 500 MB RAM - Multitouch device with an accelerometer. - At least 300 MB of free space Questions, comments, concerns? Please contact us at mwgd10@gmail.com ! Find an issue with the game? Let us know before leaving a bad review, we'll fix it ASAP.

description: OverSkreen is the best floating browser on Android! With OverSkreen, you can do multiple tasks at the same time! You don't have to switch from one application to another anymore. OverSkreen Browser can live on top of your screen! You can check a video on the right side of your screen and write a message at the same time! ★★★ SATISFIED OR REFUNDED ★★★ View and interact with multiple screens at once. OverSkreen enables true multi-tasking. ● Features : ★ Floating browser: you can move, resize or minimize your browser ★ Adobe Flash support (*) ★ Tabbed browsing ★ Private browsing (*) ★ Access to your bookmarks/history ★ Built-in Desktop/iPhone/iPad/Honeycomb/Froyo user-agent ★ Suggest-while-typing URL bar ★ Quick Hide (double tap the title bar) ★ Chrome keyboard shortcuts ★ Bookmarks folder support (*) ★ Synchronisation of your Chrome Bookmarks (**) * Android 3.0 and above ** Android 4.0 and above ● Known limitations - On Android version 2.2.x / 2.3.x only, Adobe Flash plugin doesn't support floating applications and may crash. This is an Adobe bug. Some customers reported it as working though. Please upgrade your device to Android 3.0/4.0 or above. Please note that mobile version of YouTube doesn't requires Flash at all. ★ ★ ★ If you have any question on the app, send us an email: support@myboyfriendisageek.com . We respond personally to every single email we receive ★ ★ ★ ● FAQ ★ Can I watch YouTube ? Sure. You can do whatever you do with your stock browser.

description: 100% free Dots And Boxes game. Ad-free. Hit the game and play with your friend, or enemy, or whoever you like. Game is optimized for 2 human players. Dots and Boxes (also known as Boxes, Dots or Smart Dots) is a game for two players. Game starts with empty grid of dots. Each turn players add line between them. Player who close box in his turn get point and extra move. When grid is full, player with more boxes wins. 2 Player: Dots And Boxes supports 3 grids: 2x2, 3x3 and 4x4. On the beginning each player choose grid to reject and final grid is activated. If you have any trouble or request, I would be pleased if you let me know via review or email button down below.
release_text: -Update 1.21- - Fixed bug that caused sometimes application crash. - Clicking lines should now be more accurate. - You can now close boxes by clicking on them.

description: 100% free Isolation game. Ad-free. Hit the game and play with your friend, or enemy, or whoever you like. Game is optimized for 2 human players. Isolation (also known as Isola) is two-player strategy game. Players have one pawn. Each turn players make a move and destroy one block of the board. First player that can't make move in his turn lose the game. 2 Player: Isolation supports 3 grids: 6x6, 7x7 and 8x6. On the beginning each player choose grid to reject and final grid is activated. If you have any trouble or request, I would be pleased if you let me know via review or email button down below.
release_text: -Update 1.21- Fixed bug that caused sometimes application crash.

description: 100% free Mastermind game. Ad-free. Hit the game and play with your friend, or enemy, or whoever you like. Game is optimized for 2 human players. Mastermind (also known as Code breaker) is a game for two players. At the beginning each player creates a code with four dots for opponent. Each turn players try to break that code putting color dots on the grid. For each dot which is correct by both color and position player gets red peg, and when dot is in good color but not in the right place gets white peg. Player who first breaks the code wins the game. If you have any trouble or request, I would be pleased if you let me know via review or email button down below.
release_text: -Update 1.21- Fixed bug that caused sometimes application crash.

description: Probably the best SoundCloud client with ChromeCast, Upnp/Dlna and Last.fm support. If you want to contact us or participate in beta testing of the app, join here: https://plus.google.com/communities/113819735478774735842 *** To all new users *** - If you don't know what SoundCloud is, read here before asking for full albums and commercial tracks: https://soundcloud.com/pages/contact After received notice from SoundCloud: From version 13 this app will NOT ALLOW Caching or Downloading of ANY tracks or content from SoundCloud Basic Features: - ChromeCast support with continuous playback - UPnp/Dlna support with continuous playback - XBMC support with continuous playback - Search tracks, sets, users and groups - Listen Stations (radios) created by users - Explore by preset or custom genre - Explore tracks (recent/trending/featured) - Explore users (who to follow/friends/by activity/by favorites/latest users) - Browse user's tracks, likes, sets, groups, followings and followers - Shuffle and Repeat mode - Equalizer - Manage current playlist (drag artwork to reorder, fling to remove track) - Playback control widget - Remote media buttons support - Low battery comsumption - Automatic play/pause on headphones jack plugged in/out - Automatic play/pause on incoming call - Search suggestions, voice search - Save state, the player will continue where you've been before (even after reboot) - Material, Dark and Light themes Advanced Features: - Login with SoundCloud account (web connect or 'In App' username/password) - Get updates from your Dashboard, Stream, Activities - Integration with Simple Last.fm Scrobbler (supports Last.fm and Libre.fm) - Charts, most played tracks in week, month or custom time range - Play history - Manage likes, reposts, followings, joined groups - Add track to playlist - Add track to set - Manage set tracks - Manage playlist tracks If you want to join beta testing, share your experience, report bugs or problems, suggest a new feature, join our Google+ community: https://plus.google.com/communities/113819735478774735842 If you want to help with translation, join here: https://plus.google.com/communities/113760367268050274310 * My Cloud Player for SoundCloud is not affiliated with or endorsed by SoundCloud.

description: Sokoban is a type of transport puzzle, in which the player pushes boxes around in a warehouse, trying to get them to storage locations. Only one box can be pushed at a time. A box cannot be pulled. The puzzle is solved when all boxes are located at storage locations. Features: - 15 categories with different degree of complexity - 90 levels in each category
