description: Find this family oriented hidden object adventure and journey around the world! Solve puzzles, seek and find clues and hidden items, search the world's secrets to reveal the mystery of Sandra's hidden past! Embark on a secret puzzle story with Sandra, who when she was little girl survived a car crash that killed her family and damaged her memory. She spent the rest of her youth at an orphanage. One day, Sandra received a mystery invitation to take part in a race around the world that promised a one million dollar prize for the winner. But the adventure started to trouble Sandra, because many of the objects that she encountered were like related to the puzzle of her hidden past and family. Search and find clues and hidden items, solve puzzles, and play mini-games to unlock the adventure! Features: - more than just a family oriented hidden object adventure - original script with a mystery to solve out; - a variety of classic mini-games and puzzles from all over the world; - picturesque locations of famous tourist attractions; - great graphics, music and voice over; Solve Sandra's hidden mystery from her childhood and find the main prize of the game!

description: Pirate Adventures 2, the second part of the gripping game Pirate Adventures series, is a new adventure full of dangers and risks. This time, the desperate pirate Sharpshooter Jack will encounter the undiscovered secrets of the cursed island with its lost treasures and jewels. Every dashing pirate dreams of becoming a ship's captain and finding an island overflowing with treasure. But where can Jack assemble a band of fearless scoundrels to man his vessel? What do the ancient spirits' predictions mean? And how can he get his hands on the ghost's limitless treasures? He'll need to put his honor and true love on the line and take big risks to answer these questions. Key features: - A gripping adventure in 18 chapters - Search for objects in the pirates' den, the fortune-teller's home, and on the cursed island - New characters and unpredictable plot twists - An unexpected ending Is Jack capable of conquering fate's new trials? He'll need your help to succeed!

Be sure to aim, shoot, and target all of the free and unlocked hunting rifles and weapons in the new armory. app_name: Free Your Card for MTA NYC
description: This is one app that will pay for itself in the first use! Tired of ending up with Metrocards that have a balance, but not enough for a ride? Unless you can calculate a 7% bonus in your head, figuring out the right amount to add to your card to get down to $0 is a challenge. Instead of throwing that card away, let Free Your Card solve that challenge and save you money! Enter your current card balance (or 0.00 for a new card) and we'll let you know how much to add so that you don't end up giving away your change to the MTA! The last swipe on your card will be within four cents of zero (since the MTA only lets you add value in five cent increments). Copyright (C) 2012 New Rich Communications Corp. All rights reserved. This app not sponsored or endorsed by the MTA. App Development by: FourTen Technologies, Inc. Need an Android app? Contact sales@fourtentech.com . description: **Experience the newly redesigned KineMix 2.0!** **User-friendly interface with simple and elegant design** **Enhanced user experience provides comfort in step-by-step editing process** KineMix 2.0 features improvements based on our users’ feedback, including an upgraded UI/UX and an easier and faster step-by-step editing process. With KineMix, a new breed of clip-based video editing, you can quickly trim those long videos into shorter highlight reels featuring your favorite moments. Video editing is a breeze with the simple movements used to clip and mix videos with KineMix. When you’re finished, share your new KineMix videos with friends and family on your favorite social networking sites! [Features] * Unique and simple user interface * Clip manipulation: duplicate, mix and delete clips * Multi-video trimming * Soundtracks: choose from nine KineMix music tracks or choose music from your personal device * Sound effects (various sound effects like Laughter or Cheering are available) * Audio mixing (merges soundtracks with the original sound) * Video snapshot: capture any key frame to create an image clip * Split trimmed video into multiple short files [Uses] * Edit multiple videos simultaneously * Trim your videos to the best scenes and get rid of all that extra content! * Mix clips into a different order to create a more interesting video * Duplicate clips to add humor and make a funny video * Combine multiple videos from different angles of the same event to add depth and creativity (i.e. at a football or baseball game, live concert, etc.) * Use videos from family and friends to make a unique compilation of a trip or special event * Split longer, larger videos into a small set of files with pre-defined duration for easier sharing * Supports up to 4K Ultra HD recorded video [Notes] * Supports all smartphones and tablets running Android 3.0.x (Honeycomb) and above. * Supports video content recorded with device cameras. Other video content, such as AVI, MKV, MOV, etc., are not supported. * For multi-video editing, all videos need to be in the same video format (codec, resolution, etc.). * KineMix supports MP3 and AAC audio file formats. * If the soundtrack or the sound effect is shorter than the length of the video, it will play repeatedly until the end of the video. * Audio mixing related volume controls are only available on devices running Android 4.1(Jelly Bean) and above. * Use of commercially copyrighted content may result in copyright issues if the video is shared on social networking sites. ** We would love to hear from you. Please email us at support@kinemix.com with any questions or feedback you may have. Thank you! ** Tag #KineMix on Instagram and Facebook for a chance to be featured on our official accounts, @kinemixapp page! ------------------------- Find us online! http://www.instagram.com/kinemixapp http://www.facebook.com/kinemixapp http://www.youtube.com/kinemixapp

description: The rough play, the dust, the nostalgia of cricket in your own gully; that is what Street Cricket is all about! In this version the rules are modified to suit the ground situation while the usual excitement of the game remains intact. Overs: You can play 5, 10, 15, 20, 25, or 30 over match. Toss: By winning the toss you have the option to bat or bowl first. Your Team: There are five players to a team. Batsmen are predefined but you can select your bowlers from the players available. After finishing one game you can start another. How to Score: You can score single runs by running between the wicket If you hit over the building you score 2 runs If you hit the wall you score 1 run **Following software and hardware requirement is needed for better game play, - Android OS 2.0 or later - Device powered by an ARMv7 (Cortex family) CPU - GPU support for OpenGLES 2.0 is recommended
release_text: New batting and bowling animations Added swing bowling

description: Particle Beat is a music-based arcade game, with colorful and minimalistic graphics! YOU choose the music, and the music changes the gameplay! This is a game, but made to feel like an MP3 Player : you can choose to play single MP3 songs, M3U playlists, or even whole folders ! You can even choose a sequential playback mode, or a shuffle one. In Noise Mode, enemies will chase you. Only the black Beat Particles can destroy them. In Entropy mode, you become the hunter : the enemies wander in the stage, and it is up to you to drive them towards their end! All of this happens to the rhythm of your music : colorful transitions and pulses mark every beat of the song, and you will be rewarded only if you can follow the rhythm. Even the game's speed changes according to the song! Do you find a song too hard, or too easy? You can choose between three difficulty levels, and also trigger a special, extra-hard Dark Mode ! Follow us at https://www.facebook.com/particlebeat ! FAQ : Q : Why does the game run slow on my device? A : Particle Beat involves a lot of audio processing, to obtain the result you see. The game runs fine on most devices, but in general, I would advise running the game on a device whose CPU is at least Dual Core. Q : Why do the loading times vary so much ? A : Particle Beat implements a caching system. Meaning, once you play with a song, its data will be stored in memory for future use. This means that upon replaying that same song, you will get almost instant loading times, and the CPU load will be a lot lower. Every song data file weighs around 40KBytes, so you don't have to worry. If you want to clear this cache, you can do so from the Options menu. Q : I can't find my External SD Card! A : It is simple : open the file choosing dialog in Song Selection screen, and hit the ".." button on top of the list until you reach the "storage" directory. From there, you can find you external SD card in one of the sub-directories. Q : Why does the game crash on my smartphone? A : Please note that Particle Beat needs Google Play Services to run. If you encounter different issues, feel free to send me an email. Q : I don't like this feature! Or that one! This doesn't work! A : I made Particle Beat in my free time, so it is a work of passion. Before leaving a 1-star review or uninstalling the app, try to contact me : I will try my best to solve your issues, or to listen to your advice.
release_text: 1.0.3 : - Slight difficulty tuning for Entropy mode; - Minor bugfixes. 1.0.2 : - New icon. 1.0.1 : - Completely revamped Guide Menu; - Minor bugfixes.

description: CVGA Finalist - "Best Innovation", "Best Indie Game" & "Best Game On The Go" [90/100] ArcadeLife - "Astonishing. One of the best original games I’ve played in quite a while." [90/100] IGM Mobile - "Not only is Infinite atmospheric, entertaining, and challenging, it’s addictingly fun." [4/5] AppSpy - "Infinite is simple, visually and aurally appealing, and has plenty of modes to unlock." AppStorm - "Infinite is a stellar experience that should not be missed." Explore the cosmos with infinite. Journey across the galaxy, forming solar systems and surviving black holes. Arcade style gameplay, stunning abstract visuals, and a cosmic soundtrack that is out of this world. Use your orbiter to harness spatial matter to form planets and new systems while avoiding the dangers of space. Your efforts of creating new star systems help grow your own unique galaxy. Planetary and star physics affect the movement of matter, changing the play field dynamically. Features: ★ Addicting arcade style gameplay. ★ Randomly generated waves provide a new challenge every level. ★ Evolve your own unique galaxy based on how you play. ★ Stellar cosmic soundtrack. ★ Unlockable game modes and theme packs. Create the cosmos. Explore the infinite.

description: How to install: long press on the desktop -> Set Wallpaper -> Live Wallpaper. Wallpaper optimized for phones and tablets! Cute branched plant with small blue flowers - forget-me- it . Its very name suggests that this flower is a symbol of love and memory parting . Forget-me- about a lot of legends . One of them says that lived on earth couple in love, Egle and Likas . They herded sheep together and planned a happy future. But once Likas received an inheritance . He had to leave the city for its financial affairs, and his bride was very worried because after urban beauties he said to her not return. Talk about their fears she could not because she did not want him to worry and hurt . At the moment of parting she cried , her tears falling on the ground , turned in blue flowers. To set the mood, you can configured to include soaring bubbles, as well as to include the possibility of burst touch on the bubble.

description: Ram cleaner users: this apps seems to "kill my service" so use ignore list or maybe remove the Ram cleaner or task killer otherwise my app will not work well. If you like the app please consider rate with 5 stars. "THIS APP DONT REPLACE THE STOCK LOCKSCREEN" and YOU DONT NEED ROOT this app will not work for Long press power button since its hardware related. "Ideal for avoiding shut down the device in the pocket" Smart lockscreen protector will TRY to block the "power menu option" so you can avoid people turn off, mute,set to airplane your device from your lockscreen, Battery Friendly even with pin or password a thief can power off easily without unlock the phone. If You have a Security app like Cerberus to find your phone, you dont want people can turn off the device in a easy way. This App Could work or could NOT work (working on 90% of devices),if the app its not working try modify Delay time if the app, this will give some time before closin power menu. Root its not needed,its only if you want custom "Power Menu" with Reboot or Power off working. NOTE: Airplane mode its not working on android jelly bean 4.2 because google change the seurity behavior. if you have any doubts, bugs or feature request email me to n3zdroid@gmail.com before leave a bad feedback please Uses the next Open Source software: Android-ViewPagerIndicator and ActionBarSherlock by: JakeWharton Project home: https://github.com/JakeWharton/Android-ViewPagerIndicator http://actionbarsherlock.com/ Permission explained android.permission.PREVENT_POWER_KEY and android.permission-group.HARDWARE_CONTROLS <-- need for receive long power button event to show power menu android.permission.INTERNET <--ads android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE <--ads android.permission.WAKE_LOCK <-- "wake up" to show custom menu (if its enabled) android.permission.DISABLE_KEYGUARD <-- disable lockscreen or keyguard to show custom menu android.permission.WRITE_SETTINGS <-- to put in airplane mode the device android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED <--start the service on boot android.permission.ACCESS_SUPERUSER <-- SuperUser for "reboot" and "power off" in menu.

description: 南方周易程序系列之：批八字算命，最传统、准确、详实的八字批命软件。十几年周易类软件编程经验的体现，富贵贫贱不再神秘，吉凶祸福不必烦恼，一切皆有命。 批八字算命的内容有：八字大运、五行得分与喜用神、称骨论命、古诗词论命、穷通宝鉴和三命通会论命、终身卦、一生重大关口、鬼谷子论命、一掌经论命、日干论命、年月日时论命、后天补救、性格、婚姻、兄弟姐妹、子女、财运、功名事业、健康状况、祖业父母、80年流年运程等。 Southern Book of the program series: horoscopes fortune, the most traditional, accurate, detailed character batch command software. Book of ten years of experience in software programming reflects class, rich and poor no longer a mystery, good and bad fortune do not worry, everything is life. Content horoscopes fortune are: horoscopes Grand Canal, Five Score and joy with God, said bone on life, ancient poems on life, poor reign of Stephen and three life will pass on life, lifelong Gua, and his significant mark, Guiguzi fateseal , beat up by the theory of life, life on dry day, when the date on life, remedial measures, character, marriage, siblings, children, wealth, fame, career, health, ancestral parents, 80-year fleeting fortune and so on.

description: M&C! Comics is a comic publisher under Books Publishing Division of Kompas Gramedia Group, the biggest publishing company in Indonesia. Kompas Gramedia Group started the venture focusing in the printing media. In its development, the company has expanded into a business group with various divisions. In the information sector, the group has also spread out to the electronic media and multimedia. Today M&C! Comics has published a wide range of titles from various publishers all over the world. With a mission to build a smart and creative generation, we publish high quality books from top international publishers. We also have Koloni, the imprint of the publisher M&C!, which specifically for comics published by Indonesia comic artists.

description: [설명] 네이버 뮤직앱으로 언제 어디서나 원하는 모든 곡을 바로 즐기세요! 네이버뮤직의 최신앨범, Top100, 추천음악, 뮤직비디오 등을 모두 즐길 수 있으며 PC에서 만들어놓은 내 리스트와 관심음악까지 모두 손쉽게 사용 가능합니다. 네이버뮤직 이용권을 보유하면 스트리밍 뿐만 아니라, 이용권 종류에 따라 노래끊김 현상이나 데이터 요금 부담이 없도록 안드로이드 폰에 다운받아 즐길 수 있습니다. 네이버뮤직의 자세한 기능이 더 궁금하신가요? Top100 : 지금 가장 인기있는 최신곡을 Top100으로 만나세요 추천음악 : 오늘의 뮤직, 테마채널, 명예의 전당, 온 스테이지 등 네이버 뮤직이 추천하는 다양한 음악을 만날 수 있습니다 무료음악: 매월 새롭게 공개되는 30곡을 '무료음악' 메뉴에서 무료로 들을 수 있습니다. 뮤직비디오 : 최신, 인기 뮤직비디오도 모바일로 편리하게 즐기세요 플레이어 : 랜덤/반복듣기, 가사보기, 앨범정보, 아티스트정보, 뮤직비디오 보기, SNS공유하기 등 보다 다양한 옵션들로 음악을 더욱 풍부하게 들어보세요. 미니 플레이어: 앱 어디서나 지금 듣고 있는 음악을 재생할 수 있습니다 재생목록 : 내가 듣는 음악들을 편리한 설정기능으로 만날 수 있습니다 장르별 음악 : 발라드, 락, 팝, 얼터너티브 등 다양한 음악은 물론 장르별 TOP100으로 잘 모르는 음악도 손쉽게 골라 들을 수 있습니다. 검색 : 추천검색어로 편리하게 음악을 찾을 수 있습니다. 마이뮤직 : 내 리스트나 관심음악을 PC, 모바일 구분없이 그대로 듣거나 구매했던 MP3를 별도의 케이블 연결없이 재다운로드 할 수 있습니다. 이제 네이버 뮤직앱으로 언제 어디서나 원하는 모든곡을 바로 즐기세요! 앱 사용 중에 궁금하신 점 또는 문제가 발생한 경우, 네이버 뮤직 고객센터로 접속하여 궁금하신 점을 해결해 보세요. release_text: [v2.11.2 업데이트] 1. 뮤지션홈 통합 - 뮤지션홈에 뮤지션리거가 통합되었습니다. 이제 뮤지션홈에서 발매곡과 뮤지션리그 컨텐츠를 감상해보세요. 2. 스킨 변경 기능 추가 - 뮤직앱에서 스킨을 설정 할 수 있습니다. (메뉴, 플레이어, 재생목록 등) [설정 > 스킨 변경] 에서 뮤직앱 스킨을 변경해 보세요. 3. 네이버 블로그, 까페 공유하기 기능 추가 4. 일부 4.4 이상 기기 웹뷰에서 '공유하기'가 안 되는 문제 수정 5. 일부 LG기기에서 5칸 위젯 크기가 4칸으로 나오는 문제 개선 6. 기타 버그 수정 및 성능 개선

description: 国内累計500万ダウンロード☆ iOS1位★Android2位★獲得 LINEキャラの天気ウィジェットも！ ******************* アプリソムリエで紹介されました。 http://appsomm.jp/feature/2013/01/31/53932/ AppBankで紹介されました。(動画付き) http://www.appbank.net/2013/01/28/iphone-application/537755.php ******************* LINEの人気キャラクターが 毎日の天気をお知らせ♪ 雨降りや災害情報もこれ1つでOK！ LINEの天気予報・災害情報アプリ「LINE 天気」。 ■使い方はかんたん♪ 1. 天気を見よう！ 今日と明日、週間の天気予報を表示。 LINEの人気キャラがお知らせします。 2.詳しい天気も確認しよう！ 「3時間ごと」をタップすると詳しい天気を表示。 通勤・通学、おしゃれ、洗濯のときに便利♪ 3. 地域を登録しよう。 学校・会社・習い事など5つまで地域を登録可能。 スライド操作で表示切替も簡単です。 4. 友だちに送ろう♪ LINEの友だちに天気を送信できます。 お出かけ場所の相談にも使えます！ 5.通知を使いこなそう。 毎日の天気や降雨情報、災害情報をプッシュ通知。 あなたの安全・便利をサポートします。 6.ウィジェットを設定しよう。 アプリを起動しなくても天気の確認OK。 毎日簡単に天気のチェックができます。 ■主な機能 - LINEキャラクターの天気マーク - 今日と明日の天気 - 全国の災害情報（地震、津波、台風、洪水、火山） - LINEキャラクターのコメント - 週間天気 - 3時間ごとの天気、降水量、気温、湿度、風向、風速 - 現在地の天気 - 地域登録（最大5件） - 日本地図ボタンから登録地域以外の天気も確認可能 - LINEの友だちに天気を送る機能 - 通知1：天気の定期配信（今日または明日） - 通知2：雨の予想（雨降り、強雨） - 通知3：全国の災害（地震、津波、洪水、火山） - ホーム画面表示（ウィジェット）に対応 ■注意事項 - 災害情報はlivedoor天気情報に移動します。 - 日本気象協会(JWA)のデータを利用しています。
release_text: 【1.3.0】(2013/06/20) 1.端末インストールのみ有効へ変更 2.現在地のページを右端から左端へ変更 3.登録地域数、通知のオン/オフを設定一覧で可視化 * その他の改善・不具合修正 【1.2.1】(2013/05/15) 1. LINE天気の画面をキャプチャ共有 2. 3時間天気で現在の時間をハイライト表示 3. 休日を赤で表示 * その他の改善・不具合修正 【1.2.0】(2013/04/16) 1.現在地の天気を表示時、地域名の左側に現在地マークを表示 2. 「LINEへ送る」「設定」ボタンのタップできる領域を拡大 3.通知バーのマークをアイコンと同じ絵柄に変更 4.新しいお知らせのときにNewマークを表示 5.ポップアップウィンドウによる重要なお知らせ * その他の不具合修正

description: Epic spaceship battles, Fight with lasers, missiles and a wide array of weapons to conquer the GALAXY Make your ship stealth and hide from enemies. Fight the battles on your terms. *Open galaxy Conquer the galaxy at your own pace. As your character gets stronger your ability to travel across space to new places increases dramatically. By the end of the game there are over 100 different locations and an endless assortment of missions and space battles. Fight in strategic conflicts with lasers, missiles, nano missiles, special cannons, an acid ray, antimatter beams, and more. *Battle System The unique battle system combines quick thinking, accurate timing, and analysis of your enemy to decide the best way to defeat them. The battle system itself has a very small learning curve while your overall strategy in battle can be very complex. *Weapons and Equipment There are 32 different weapons and 32 different equipment items to aid you in battle. The combinations are practically endless since you choose which items to load and use in battle. Even the choices of items to use in battle require some strategic thinking. With equipment items like: nano repair bots, fusion missile warheads, shock razors, a variety of lasers and missiles, and a lot more equipment and weapons. Of course, there is always stealth. Spaceships there are over 30 starships available to own. New starships are unlocked as you progress through the game. These starships all vary in appearance, armor, shields, and energy output. In addition to all of that they differ in the amount of weapons that you can load onto your ship. As you battle through the galaxy you will have the opportunity to upgrade your characters ship traits. These traits apply to any and all of the spaceships that you own. Upgrade energy, shields, armor, defense, offense, and recharge. All of these traits help you out in battles in different ways. *Maintaining your Empire When you conquer a colony that colony has an allegiance to you. In order to maintain that allegiance over time, you’ll have to complete missions. Also, if you are defeated in battle, your overall allegiance in all of your colonies is weakened. Quests As a sort of side game there are 12 quests that can be completed. These quests will each take you to five secret locations where hidden data boxes are stored. These quests have no effect on the overall game, they do reward you with constellation credits that can be used to purchase weapons, equipment, and ships. *Good or evil? In battle you can decide to spare your enemies for a bonus to your in game funds, or you can choose to destroy your enemies for a boost in bonus. Fight with one style long enough and you'll get the paragon or tyrant bonus. *Made to Play. The interface for Incognito: Interstellar Empire is designed so that you can play the game immediately without much learning. There is plenty to learn in this game, you just learn progressively as you play. Find additional Support and Info at www.nibbdigital.com/incognito
release_text: This version has been through a major debugging overhaul. Sorry it took so long, there were some complicated bugs (and some stuff I should have seen before.) Thanks for sticking it out if you have. I appreciate all the patience. I'm being honest. This is my first game and I've had some hard lessons. But fear not! not matter what the bug, I'll get this thing running smooth. Especially considering you've paid for this. Thanks for that. I'll keep at it. Thanks all - Nibb

description: Watch the Earth live right now with ISS HD Earth Viewing Experiment App.(HDEV). Now you can receive directly from space (NASA) to your device screen, a beautiful, live and HD streaming from the International Space Station. ***QUICK NOTES ABOUT HDEV VIDEO*** Black Image = International Space Station (ISS) is on the night side of the Earth. Gray Image = Switching between cameras, or communications with the ISS is not available. No Audio = Normal. There is no audio on purpose.
